With this profits from the loan, Eugenie would like to satisfy the basic needs of her family, reinvest in the businesses and start saving for the future.

loan.use: To purchase more sugar, cooking oil, salt, water, juice, etc.

loan.name: Johnstone

texts.en:
Johnstone is a married man. He has 3 children and all are currently enrolled in school. Johnstone and his wife are both musicians and sell their recordings. He's worked in this business for 7 years and his primary customers are church members. Johnstone also owns a side business farming local crops. He rents a house that has electricity but no piped water. He describes his greatest business challenge to be piracy and his largest monthly expenses are school fees and rent.
Johnstone will use the Kes 20,000 loan to record another CD. Johnstone aspires to have his own recording studio in the future. He joined Yehu because of their efficient loan products.

loan.use: To record another CD.

loan.name: Cissy

texts.en: Cissy lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married and has 4 children, all of whom are in school. She also takes care of additional family members (father). Cissy has a business of selling second hand clothes. She has been in this business for 1 year, and she works 7 days out of every week. Cissy sells her products in a shop, by means of retail. Cissy has requested for a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan Shillings from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy more bales of second hand clothes. The main business challenge(s) for Cissy include transportation and thieves. Her goals and aspirations for her business are to start selling on wholesale only and also to open up another shop selling clothes. Cissy lives in a home that she rents; she has access to electricity and has access to piped water. Her major monthly expenses include school fees and rent.

loan.use: To buy more bales of second hand clothes

loan.name: Margaret

texts.en: Margaret lives in Uganda. She is married and has 7 children, six of whom are in school. Margaret has a business of a pub. She has been in this business for 10 years, and she works 7 days out of every week. Margaret sells her products at the market, by means of retail. Margaret has requested for a loan of 700,000 Ugandan Shillings from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy more jerycans of local Gin and crates of Beer. The main business challenges for Margaret include rainy season and thieves. Her goals and aspirations for her business are to own a fully stocked pub. Margaret lives in a home that she rents; she has access to electricity and doesn't have access to piped water. Her major monthly expenses include school fees and feeding family.

loan.use: To buy more crates of beer and jerycans of local Gin

loan.name: G.s. Los Amigos Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario Los Amigos lo conforman Jorge Luis, Mariela, Ana y Francisco. El seor Jorge tiene 27 aos. Solicita un crdito para invertirlo en su negocio que es la venta de huevos al por mayor y al detalle, sus ventas las realiza en su casa de habitacin y de manera ambulante, tiene 6 aos de tener este negocio. Mariela tiene 28 aos se dedica a la venta de artesanas de manera ambulante, sus compras las realiza en el mercado. Ella dio inicio con el negocio desde hace 2 aos, fue con ayuda de sus familiares que la apoyaron con el capital inicial para que saliera adelante y adems recibi ayuda de otros comerciantes que tenan experiencia en este medio. Ana Patricia tiene su negocio que es la venta de nacatamales, frijoles y elabora sopa, esto varia diariamente buscando lo que el cliente quiera. Su mayor desafo es realizar la compra de equipos para el negocio debido a que actualmente no tiene y tiene que usar los utensilios de su casa. Ella inicio el negocio con ayuda de su papa que le aparto capital de trabajo para que ella trabajara y saliera adelante debido a que en nuestro pas es difcil conseguir empleo. Francisco el seor se dedica a la venta de huevos de manera ambulante y en su casa de habitacin. El seor solicita este nuevo crdito para invertirlo en su negocio y surtir mas el mismo, adems que al realizar compras grandes obtiene descuentos que no tiene cuando compra al por menor.
texts.en: The communal bank "Los Amigos" is made up of members Jorge Luis, Mariela, Ana and Francisco. Jorge is 27 years old. He requests a loan to invest in his business selling eggs at wholesale and retail. He makes his sales from his house, and also in an itinerant manner. He has had this business for 6 years. Mariela is 28 years old and has a business selling handicrafts. She buys her products in the market and sells from place to place. She started up this business 2 years ago; her relatives helped her by contributing the startup capital so that she could get the business going. She also received help from other merchants who had experience in this line of work. Ana Patricia has a business selling nacatamales (a traditional Nicaraguan tamal), beans and soup. Her menu varies daily in order to accommodate the demands of her customers. Her main challenge is to buy equipment for the business. At this time, she does not have this equipment and so she uses utensils from her house. She started this business with the help of her father, who set aside working capital so that she would be able to work and get ahead, since in this country it is difficult to find work. Francisco has a business selling eggs from place to place, and also from his house. He requests this new loan to invest in his business and stock it with more eggs; the loan will also allow him to make a big purchase and obtain a discount that he could not get if he buys the eggs at retail.

loan.use: to buy eggs

loan.name: Zoraida

texts.es: La socia Zoraida est solicitando el prstamo para abastecer su pequea tienda de abarrotes y desea comprar por ejemplo sacos de arroz, sacos de azcar, tarros de leche, menestras y otras cosas ms. El anterior crdito a la socia le ayudo para incrementar sus ventas por lo tanto obtuvo buenas ganancias de la cuales lo destino para la alimentacin y educacin de sus hijos. La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Zoraida is asking for a loan in order to supply her little grocery store and she wants to buy, for example, bags of rice, bags of sugar, large containers of milk, beans and other items.
The last loan helped her to increase her sales, which increased her profits and enabled her to feed and educate her children. She is very grateful for the loan and she promises to make her payments on time.

loan.use: to buy bags of rice, bags of sugar, large containers of milk, beans and other items to supply her grocery store

loan.name: Fatima Del Rosario

texts.es: Ftima Del Rosario tiene 44 aos, su actividad es la venta y destace de cerdo. Hace ms de 10 aos que tiene este negocio, ella tiene ciertas dificultades como es el tiempo pues tiene que realizar los quehaceres del hogar adems de esto tiene que dedicarse a su negocio pero la amplia experiencia obtenida le ha brindado la ayuda para mejorar cada da. El motivo del crdito es para la compra de cerdos.
texts.en: Fatima Del Rosario is 44 years old, and she has a business butchering and selling pigs. She has had this business for more than 10 years. She faces certain difficulties, such as managing her time, because she must carry out the household chores as well as dedicating herself to this business. However, the ample experience that she has obtained in this line of work helps her to improve each day. The reason she is taking this loan is so that she can buy some pigs.

loan.use: to buy pigs.

loan.name: Oscar

texts.es:
Oscar de 37 aos de edad, vive en su casa propia con su familia, cuenta con todos los servicios bsicos, ubicada en la zona urbana del departamento de la Cajamarca. Esta zona se caracteriza por su actividad principal es la minera, comercio, agricultura, ganadera y turismo.
Oscar tiene como actividad laboral la confeccin y venta de prendas de vestir, desde hace varios aos, su negocio lo tiene en su casa, cuenta con su propia clientela y tambin realiza trabajos a pedidos, la competencia en el rubro no es mucha, con los ingresos que obtenga podr cubrir sus necesidades familiares.
Ha solicitado un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa mediante Capital Semilla de 2000 para comprar material y dar mantenimiento a su mquina, ha as puede seguir brindando un buen servicio y cumpliendo con los pedidos que le han hecho sus clientes, lo que le permitir tener ms ganancias para mejorar el nivel de vida de su familia. Oscar con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo a sabido sacar su negocio y a su familia adelante y a que se superen en la vida.
texts.en:
Oscar is 37 years old, he lives with his family in a house of his own equipped with the basic services and located in the urban area of the Cajamarca department. The main activities of the area are mining, trading, agriculture, livestock breeding and tourism.
Oscar created and sells clothes and he has been engaged in this activity for various years. His workshop is located in his house, he can count on recurring customers and he also makes clothes to order. The competition in this field is not tight, and with the money he earns he is able to pay for the necessities of his family.
He has requested a loan to Edpyme Alternativa though Capital Semilla de 2000 to buy materials and to pay for maintenance works on his sewing machine, so that he can continue providing a good service to his customers and realizing the clothes he has been requested. In this way he will be able to earn more in order to improve his familys standard of living. With great effort and hard work Oscar has been able to make his activity progress and to provide for his family and for them to become someone in life.

loan.use: To buy materials to create clothes and to pay for maintenace works on his sewing machine.

loan.name: Juliet

texts.en: Juliet lives in Uganda. She is married and has 2 children, all of whom are in school. Juliet has a business of a pub. She has been in this business for 3 years, and she works 7 days out of every week. Juliet sells her products at the market, by means of retail. Juliet has requested for a loan of 700,000 Ugandan Shillings from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy more bales of second hand clothes. The main business challenge(s) for Juliet include rainy season and thieves. Her goals and aspirations for her business are to start importing clothes. Juliet lives in a home that she rents; she doesn't have access to electricity and doesn't have access to piped water. Her major monthly expenses include school fees and feeding family.

loan.use: To buy more bales of used clothes

loan.name: Rosenda

texts.es:
Rosenda de 53 aos de edad. Vive en su casa propia con sus familiares, cuentan con servicio de luz solamente, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura. Los pobladores de esta zona se dedica a la agricultura, ganadera y artesana.
Desde hace varios aos, cuenta con su propio negocio que lo a colocado en su domicilio, por tener ms seguridad, donde ofrece a sus clientes todo lo que es productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes. Cuenta con una clientela establecida, con los ingresos que obtenga podr solventar sus necesidades de su casa.
Rosenda se a dado cuenta que su negocio va creciendo favorablemente en el transcurso de los das. Desea seguir ampliando su negocio con la compra de ms mercadera como productos de consumo diario y abarrotes en general para satisfacer la necesidad de sus clientes. Por ello, ha credo conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito de 1500 nuevos soles. Rosenda es muy trabajadora y responsable, desea lograr mayores ingresos para tener ms comodidades y tener mejoras econmicas en la vida.
texts.en:
Rosenda is 53 years old. She lives in her own house with her family. They have only electricity. The house is located in the rural part of the Tambogrande district in the department of Piura. The people of this area dedicate themselves to agriculture, ranching, and handcrafts.
For several years, she has had her own business located in her home, in order to have more security, where she offers her clients all staple items and groceries. She has an established clientele, and with the income that she may earn, she will cover her household needs.
Rosenda has realized that her business is growing favorably as time passes. She wants to continue adding to her business with the purchase of more merchandise, such as everyday products and groceries in general, in order to satisfy the needs of her customers. For that, she has decided to ask Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1500 nuevos soles. Rosenda is very hard-working and responsible. She wants to achieve greater income to have more comforts and economic improvement in her life.

loan.use: to purchase more everyday products and groceries in general to satisfy the needs of her customers

loan.name: Felipa

texts.es: La Sra. Felipa es clienta antigua D. la institucin, mostrando responsabilidad en los pagos D. sus cuotas cuenta con una buena actitud moral, ella tiene la determinacin D. mejorar el negocio D. comida, y que este sea conocido por la variedad D. platos que ofrece. La seora Felipa es emprendedora, el puesto D. venta se encuentra en la zona D. villa Tunari D. la ciudad D. el Alto, Bolivia, la seora se esfuerza por superarse ya que trabaja desD. la madrugada hasta que se pone el sol, el esposo ayuda en la atencin D. la pensin el apoya ese sueo D. convertirse en una empresaria, con el dinero del crdito ampliara su pensin, comprando mesas y sillas ya que tiene mucha clientela, el mayor anhelo D. la clienta es llegar a ser reconocida por la sociedad en su lucha D. mejorar su calidad D. vida.
texts.en: Felipa is an old customer of this institution. She has proven herself to be responsible in the repayments of her dues and she is of good moral values. She is determined to improve her food production activity in order to become popular for the variety of dishes she offers. Felipa is a resourceful person, and her stall is located in Villa Tunari, a neighbourhood of El Alto, Bolivia. She works hard to improve herself, working from dusk till dawn. Her husband helps her tending to the caf and he also supports her dream of becoming an businesswoman. The loan she is requesting will be used to enlarge her caf by buying tables and chairs as they have many customers. Her main wish is for people to acknowledge her efforts to improve her standard of living.

loan.use: To make improvements to her caf.

loan.name: Migdalia Del Carmen

texts.es: Migdalia Del Carmen tiene 41 aos, su actividad es la pesca artesanal. Tiene ms de 15 aos en este negocio esta es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos pues a pesar de que no es fcil sacar adelante su negocio debido a los diferentes problemas que atraviesa esto no la desanima a seguir adelante con este medio de vida. El motivo del crdito es para la compra de una lancha para proporcionar ms ingresos a su hogar.
texts.en: Migdalia Del Carmen is 41 years old and she is a fisherwoman, an activity she has been engaged in for 15 years. This is the first time she is requesting a loan, and even though it is not easy to carry on her activity owing to the different problems she has to face, she is not discouraged and she keeps on engaging in this activity. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy a small boat in order to earn more money for her family.

loan.use: To buy a small boat.

loan.name: Vctor Guadalupe

texts.es: El Sr. Vctor, es un empleado de una tienda de auto partes, l y su apreciable esposa acudieron a la institucin para solicitar un prstamo para comprar un portn para su vivienda ya que su casa actualmente no cuenta con uno y nos comenta que desea brindarle ms seguridad para su nio pequeo de cinco aos, posteriormente quieren pintar el exterior de su domicilio, agradece el apoyo brindado para la realizacin de su proyecto.
texts.en:
Victor is an employee in a repair shop.
He and his sensible wife came to the institution for a loan to buy a gate for their house as they currently do not have one. He tell us that he wants to give his little five year old son more security.
At a later time he wants to paint the outside of his house.
He is grateful for the support that helps him with this project.

loan.use: to buy and to pay for installation of a security gate for his house.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy cooking utensils and supplies in order to continue making her tasty food so she can give her clients good service

loan.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es: Julio Cesar tiene 49 aos, su actividad es la venta de mercadera en general. Hace ms de 3 aos que tiene este negocio, Julio tiene 3 hijos de 16, 21 y 27 aos. El no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar una carrera profesional ha sido por este negocio que el mantiene a su familia. El motivo del crdito es para la compra de bolsos, calzado, cosmticos, sabanas, prendas de oro y plata.
texts.en:
Julio Cesar is 49 and sells general merchandise. He has had this business for three years. Julio has three children, ages 16, 21 and 27. He didn't have the opportunity to study for a professional career, and it has been through this business that he supports his family.
The purpose of the loan is to buy purses, shoes, sheets, as well as gold and silver items.

loan.use: To buy purses, shoes, cosmetics, sheets, as well as gold and silver items.

loan.name: Luis Javier

texts.es:
Luis de 25 aos de edad, vive junto a su familia en su casa propia, cuentan con servicio de agua y luz, ubicada en el distrito de Tambogrande, una zona agrcola y ganadera que se encuentra situada en el departamento de Piura.
Luis brinda servicio de transporte de pasajeros en su mototaxi, un vehculo que consiste de una moto y una cabina para movilizar personas en su interior (mximo 3 personas), la actividad que realiza lo hace durante todo el da hasta las 6 de la tarde, a pesar de la competencia en el rubro trata de obtener los ingresos necesarios para solventar su necesidades familiares.
Desea solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito de 800 nuevos soles para usarlo en el mantenimiento y cambio de llantas a su mototaxi. Necesita mantener sus mototaxi en buenas condiciones para seguir ofreciendo un buen servicio a sus clientes. Con la ayuda del prstamo, espera aumentar sus ingresos y seguir ayudando econmicamente a su familia.
texts.en:
Luis is 25, and lives with his family in their own house, which has water and electricity service. It is in Tambogrande district, an area known for farming and livestock-raising, located in Piura department.
Luis transports passengers in his moto taxi (motorcycle taxi), a vehicle that consists of a motorcycle and a cabin for carrying passengers (maximum of three persons). He does this work all day long until six in the afternoon.
In spite of the competition in this sector, he is trying to earn the necessary income to meet his household expenses. He wishes to apply to Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 800 nuevos soles to use for maintaining his moto taxi, and changing the tires. He needs to maintain his moto taxi in good condition to continue offering a good service to his customers. With the help of the loan he hopes to increase his income, and continue helping his family financially.

loan.use: To maintain his motorcycle taxi, and change the tires.

loan.name: Abel

texts.es: Abel e Iris son una pareja que tiene cuatro aos D. casados y tienen un pequeo hijo el cual es lo mas importante en su vida, da con da ellos se esfuerzan por brindarle a su pequeo una excelente estabilidad, en esta ocasin ellos solicitan D. nuestro apoyo para L. realizacin D. su proyecto el cual consiste en realizar una mejora en su vivienda tal como colocar vitropiso en el interior D. su casa, ve en el crdito L. posibilidad D. ofrecer a sus familiares y amigos una excelente estabilidad cuando0o lo visitan.
texts.en:
Abel and Iris are a couple who have been married for four years. They have a young son who is the most important thing in their lives. Day after day, they do their best to proviD. their little one with good stability.
On this occasion they are applying for our help in undertaking a home improvement project. It consists of installing tile in the interior of their house. They see in the loan the opportunity of offering their family members and friends a stable household when they visit.

loan.use: To install tile in the interior of his house.

loan.name: Nereida Del Rosario

texts.es: Nereyda Del Rosario tiene 35 aos, su actividad es la venta de helados. Tiene ms de 8 aos en este negocio el sacrificio que realiza diariamente ella es una persona muy emprendedora se siente muy feliz con este crdito pues es la primera vez que lo realiza. El motivo del crdito es para la compra de dulces, gomas, bolsas, conos de galletas, helados, entre otros.
texts.en:
Nereida Del Rosario is 35, and sells ice cream. She has been in this business for more than eight years.
She makes daily sacrifices for her business, and is a very enterprising person. She feels very happy about the loan, since it is the first time that she has had one. The purpose of the loan is to buy candy, gum, bags, waffle cones, ice cream and other things.

loan.use: To buy candy, gum, bags, waffle cones, ice cream, and other things.

loan.name: Beatriz

texts.es: La seora Beatriz es una clienta que se dedica a la venta D. condimentos y especias, estas ventas las realiza en las distintas provincias que cuenta la cuidad D. La Paz, su labor empieza D. horas 5:00 am hasta las 14: 00 pm aproximadamente. La seora Beatriz es viuda hace ya tres aos, nos cuenta que fue difcil soportar la perdida D. su esposo y que con el trabajo que realiza y el apoyo D. su familia, pudo superar esta perdida, no cuenta con hijos en edad escolar, pero si con nietos a quienes cuida y entrega su amor por las tardes. La seora Beatriz vive en la ciudad D. el Alto-La Paz, Bolivia Su mayor sueo es que algn da llegar a ser una empresaria en la venta D. especias y exportar a otros pases estos productos y estos condimenten sus alimentos con los deliciosos condimentos Bolivianos, con el dinero del crdito comprara condimentos (aj, comino, especias en general), es una persona muy trabajadora agradecida con la institucin por el apoyo.
texts.en:
Beatriz is a client who sells condiments and spices. These sales are carried out in the different provinces of La Paz department. Her work begins at 5:00am. and ends at approximately 2:00pm.
Beatriz has been a widow for three years now. She tells us that it was difficult to bear the loss of her husband. With the work she does, and the support of her family, she managed to overcome this loss. She doesn't have school age children, but she does look after her grandchildren in the afternoon, and gives them her love.
Beatriz lives in the city of El Alto-La Paz, Bolivia. Her greatest dream is that some day she will become an entrepreneur in the sale of spices, and export these products to other countries, so that people in those countries can season their food with delicious Bolivian spices.
She will use the loan to buy condiments (chili pepper, cumin, and spices in general). She is a very hard-working person, and grateful to the institution for their support.

loan.use: To buy condiments (chili pepper, cumin, spices in general).

loan.name: Odili

texts.es: Odili se dedica a la venta de cosmticos amblate. Hace ms de 3 aos que tiene este negocio. Tiene 1 hijo de cuatro aos a su cargo, pues la mayora de sus clientes le solicitan diferentes pedidos. El motivo del crdito es para la compra de cremas, tratamientos, shampoo, polvos, perfumes entre otras cosas. Suea con ampliar su negocio y al mismo tiempo obtener nuevos clientes y al mismo tiempo proporcionarle mejoras a su vivienda.
texts.en:
Odili sells cosmetics from door to door. She has had this business for more than three years. She has one four year-old son in her care. The majority of her customers place various orders with her.
The purpose of the loan is to buy creams, treatments, shampoo, powders, and other beauty products. She dreams of expanding her business, obtaining new customers and making improvements to her house.

loan.use: To buy creams, treatments, shampoos, powders, perfumes and other beauty products.

loan.name: Mwanasiti

texts.en:
Mwanasiti is a married woman with three school-going children. Her husband is a fisherman who contributes to providing the family's basic needs. She has a house with neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food for her family and school fees for her children.
She has operated a leso (kanga) selling business for the past three years. Her potential clients are her neighbors and friends. She faces a major challenge of transport charges. She dreams of establishing a wholesale shop for selling lesos.
With the KSHS 20,000, she wants to purchase more lesos and boost her business. She decided to join Yehu because of its flexible policies, which favor clients needs.

loan.use: To purchase more lesos

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: To buy candy, basic staples, soft drinks, eggs, noodles, bottled water, cream, cookies, and toilet paper.

loan.name: Angelina

texts.es:
Angelina tiene 46 aos de edad, esta acompaada, y es madre de cuatro hijos. Angelina se dedica a la crianza de cerdos y gallinas a pequea escala. Ella empez a dedicarse a dicho oficio hace treinta aos. Para dedicarse al engorde de cerdos y gallinas, Angelina compra los animales pequeos en una plaza que queda a 15km de distancia de su casa. Ella luego los vende en la misma plaza, 3 veces por mes.
Angelina ha solicitado un prstamo a Fundacin Campo para comprar cuatros cerdos pequeos y 15 pollos. Tambien ella comprar tres sacos de concentrado y los medicamentos necesarios para prevenir que los animales se enfermen. Con el prstamo Angelina podra ayudar a su esposo con los ingresos de la casa; ya que l se dedica a la agricultura y los ingresos de esta actividad se obtienen de forma estacional. Los ingresos adicionales tambin le permitirn disponer de un poco ms de efectivo para comprar los artculos de primera necesidadpara sus hijos.
En un futuro Angelina planea construir una galera pequea para los cerdos. Su intencin es comprar cerdas reporductoras, de manera que no tenga que estar comprando cerdos pequeos.
texts.en:
Angelina is 46, has a partner, and is the mother of four children. Angelina raises pigs and chickens on a small scale. She began to do this work 30 years ago.
To make a living fattening pigs and chickens, Angelina buys small animals in a square 15km from her house. Then she sells them in the same square three times a month. Angelina has applied to Fundacin Campo for a loan, in order to buy four small pigs and 15 chickens.
She will also buy three bags of feed concentrate, and the drugs needed to prevent the animals from getting sick. With the loan, Angelina will be able to help her husband by contributing to the family income, as he is a farmer and the income from this work is seasonal. The additional income will also allow her to have a little more cash available to buy basic household necessities for her children.
In the future, Angelina plans to build a small shed for the pigs. She intends to buy breeding sows, so that she doesn't have to be buying small pigs.

loan.use: To buy four pigs and 15 chickens to fatten and sell.

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: to increase the inventory of his business by buying 20 crates of beverages

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loan.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma is a single woman with two school-going children. She lives in a rental house with neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food for her family and school fees for her children.
She has operated a food stall for the past three years; her potential clients are the local area residents. She faces a major challenge of seasonality. She dreams of opening another type of business like a cereals shop.
With the 15,000 Kenyan Shilling (KES) loan she wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, sugar and cooking oil for her food stall. She decided to join Yehu because of easy access to loan facilities.

loan.use: To purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, sugar and cooking oil for her food stall.

loan.name: Faraja Group

texts.fr: Mutoo, leader du groupe Faraja , ge de 32 ans, marie et mre de 7 enfants dont le fils ain a 14 ans et le cadet 4 mois. Elle est vendeuse de sacs mains dans le petit march local appel TMK. Son mari est un comptable dans une division publique. Son capital initial fut de 200$. Il y a de cela 13 ans rvolus quelle exerce cette activit. Avec ce nouveau crdit, la cliente va acheter 1 ballon de sacs mains marchander. Cependant, elle souhaite voir ses enfants grandir et accroitre son entreprise. Ainsi, elle remercie lIMF Hekima, pour son appui en micro crdit.
texts.en: Mutoo, the leader of Faraja Group, is 32 years old, married and the mother of seven children. The eldest is 14 years old and the youngest 4 months. She sells handbags at the small local market called TMK. Her husband is an accountant in a public organization. Mutoo's start-up capital amounted to $200. She has been in her activity for the past 13 years. She will use this new loan to buy one bale of handbags for resale. Mutoo wants to see her children grow up and her business expand. She thanks the microfinance institution Hekima for its support with microloans.

loan.use: to buy one bale of handbags.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loan.name: Jose Luis

texts.es: El Sr. Jos es un hombre que a luchado mucho en la vida para salir adelante, gracias a su esfuerzo y perseverancia logro comprar un terrero donde desea construir su casa, es por ello que acudi con nosotros para que lo apoyemos en su proyecto , el cual consiste en la compra de material de construccin para empezar levantando las bardas de un cuarto, ve en el crdito la posibilidad de hacer su sueo realidad por lo que se encuentra muy contento de habernos encontrado.
texts.en:
Jos is a man who has really struggled to get ahead in life. Thanks to his hard work and perseverance, he managed to buy a plot of land where he wants to build his house.
That's why he approached us seeking support for his project, which consists of purchasing construction materials to begin raising the walls of a house.
He sees in the loan, the possibility of making his dream a reality; so he is very happy to have found us.

loan.use: To start the construction of a house on his land.

loan.name: Elaine

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Elaine; ella tiene 36 aos de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de repuestos de moto, ella trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,la socia ya no se dedica al negocio de tejido de chompas porque el negocio de venta de repestos de moto es mas rentable, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de repuestos de moto . La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar repuestos de moto al por mayor.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Elaine is 36, married and has three children. Along with her daily activities, she sells motorcycle spare parts. She works from 8:00am to 7:00pm.
She no longer has the sweater knitting business, because the motorcycle spare parts business is more profitable. She wants to expand the motorcycle spare parts business. She is applying for the loan in order to buy motorcycle spare parts at wholesale.
She is happy about getting the loan, and promises to make her instalment payments.

loan.use: to buy motorcycle spare parts for her business.

loan.name: Maria Nela

texts.es: Mara Nela tiene su negocio que es una pulpera, desde hace ms de 3 aos que tiene esta actividad. Inicio el negocio con un dinero que ahorro con esfuerzo propio ella ha logrado ampliar su actividad y al mismo tiempo proporcionarle a sus clientes los que ellos le solicitan. El motivo del crdito es para la compra huevos, fideos, granos bsicos, leche, refrescos, galletas entre otros productos.
texts.en:
Mara Nela has a general store business. She has had the business for more than three years. She began it with some money that she saved.
Through her own efforts, she has managed to expand her business, providing her customers with the products that they ask for. The purpose of the loan is to buy eggs, noodles, basic staples, milk, soft drinks, cookies and other products.

loan.use: To buy eggs, noodles, basic staples, milk, soft drinks, cookies, and other products.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to repair a vehicle used for work.

loan.name: Mara Clementina

texts.es:
Mara de 57 aos de edad, vive en su casa propia con su esposo e hijo, cuenta con todos los servicios bsicos, ubicada en la zona urbana del distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura. Zona de actividad agrcola, ganadera y artesana.
Mara cuenta con su negocio de comida la misma que a colocado al frente de un banco, actividad que realiza desde hace varios aos, sus clientes son las personas que trabajan en el banco y transitan por esa zona, es conocida por la limpieza y la buena sazn que tiene, con los ingresos que adquiera podr tener una mejor calidad de vida. Su esposo es zapatero actividad con la ayuda tambin econmicamente en su hogar.
Ha solicitado un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para implementar su negocio con la compra de ms insumos, mesas y sillas para seguir brindando un buen servicio a sus clientes, ya que se han ido incrementando y con sus ganancias cubrir sus gastos familiares. Mara con su trabajo y sus ganas de salir adelante se ha ganado el respeto y la fidelidad de sus clientes, con la finalidad de que ms adelante tenga su propio local y pueda brindarle otras oportunidad acadmica a su hijo.
texts.en:
Mara is 57 years old and lives in her own house, which has all the basic services, with her husband and child. It is located in the urban area of the district of Tambogrande which belongs to the department of Piura. The area is noted for its agriculture, livestock and crafts.
Maria has a food business which she has run for several years and which is located in front of a bank. Her customers are people who work at the bank and pass through the area. She is well-known for her cleanliness and tasty food. With the income she earns, she wlll be able to have a better quality of life. Her husband is a cobbler which also helps her financially with the household.
She has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1500 nuevos soles (PEN) to consolidate her business with the purchase of more supplies, tables and chairs to continue offering her customers good service, as the number of customers has been increasing and with the income she can cover the family expenses. Maria with her hardwork and desire to succeed has earned the respect and loyalty of her customers, with the view to in the future having her own premises and offering her child other academic possibilities.

loan.use: to buy more supplies, tables and chairs in order to continue offering customers good service.

loan.name: Vidal

texts.es:
Vidal tiene 56 aos, es acompaado; tiene dos hijos de cinco y seis aos, respectivamente.
Vidal trabaja como agricultor (durante la epoca de lluvia) y jornalero (durante la epoca seca, 9 meses D. ao). l se dedica a la agricultura por tradicin familiar, cultivando hasta 14,000 metros cuadrados. Vidal aprendi este oficio de sus padres. Normalmente l cultiva el maz para asegurar el alimento de su familia. Es poca la cantidad que comercializa para poder pagar por vestuario y vivienda. Para sacar su cosecha, Vidal acarrea el maz en su espalda y recorre aproximadamente 0.8 km.
Vidal ha pedido un prstamo a Fundacin Campo para comprar una motobomba y tuberias de PVC, y as instalar un sistema de riego de tipo artesanal. Con parte D. prstamo Vidal tambien quiere comprar semillas de hortalizas para formar un huerto casero. Con el sistema de riego y el huerto Vidal podr producir durante la epoca seca, y no depender solamente D. trabajo como jornalero. Tambien el podr proveer legumbres para su familia y mejorar su nutricin.
Vidal es un lder en su comunidad, actualmente esta formando una cooperativa de agricultores que el preside. El objetivo de la cooperativa es organizar a los agricultores, y juntos comprar insumos, comercializar sus cosechas, y gestionar asesora tcnica. La asesora tcnica la esta recibiendo de tcnicos agropecuarios por parte de una ONG. En la zona donde vive Vidal, la cual es a la orilla de un ro, ningn agricultor produce otros productos aparte D. maz y maicillo. Vidal quiere demostrarles a los demas agricultores que se puede hacer ms, y as motivarlos.
Con el sistema de riego por goteo Vidal espera tener ingresos constantes que le permita dar una mejor educacin y vivienda a su familia.
texts.en:
Vidal is 56 years old and he is married common-law. He has two children, aged 5 and 6 respectively.
Vida works as an agriculturist (during the rainy season) and as a farm hand (during the dry season, which is 9 months out of the year). He is an agriculturist following a family tradition, cultivating up to 14000 square meters of land. Vidal learned this business from his parents. Normally he cultivates corn to secure the family's nutrition. The amount which he sells is small to cover nutrition and clothing expenses. To sell the harvest, Vidal transports the corn on his back, traveling approximately 800 meters.
Vidal has requested a loan from Fundacion Campo (Kiva Field Partner) to purchase a pump and PVC tubing to install an artesian style irrigation system. With a part of this loan Vidal also wants to purchase vegetable seeds to start a home garden. With the irrigation system and the plantation, Vidal will be able to product even during the dry season, no longer having to depend on his work as a farm hand. He will also be able to provide vegetables for his family and improve their nutrition.
Vidal is a leader in his community. He is currently presiding over a cooperative for agriculturists. The objective of the cooperative is to organize agriculturists, to purchase materials together, to sell their harvests, and to partake in technical assistance. The technical assistance is received by agricultural technicians provided by an NGO. In the region where Vidal lives, which is alongside a river, no agriculturist products other products apart from corn and millet. Vidal wants to show the other agriculturists that more can be done, and to motivate them this way.
With the drip irrigation system, Vidal hopes to obtain a constant source of income which will permit him to provide his family with a better education and better living conditions.

loan.use: to purchase a water pump and tubing to install an irrigation system.

loan.name: Grace

texts.en: Grace has successfully finished paying her first Kiva loan and now she is requesting another one. She wants to start a new retail business. With the 35,000 Kenyan Shillings (KES) she wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour and sugar for her retail shop. She aspires to establish a wholesale shop in the future.

loan.use: To purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour and sugar for her retail shop.

loan.name: Maria Haydee

texts.es:
Mara tiene 33 aos de edad, vive junto a su familia en su casa propia, cuenta con los servicios de agua y luz, ubicada en la zona urbana del distrito de Cayalt, una zona que es conocida por la actividad agrcola y ganadera de sus pobladores.
Desde hace unos aos tiene instalado en el mercado de abastos de la ciudad de Cayalt un puesto de venta de verduras y tuberculos. Todos los das ofrece a sus clientes una variedad de vegetales y tubrculos frescos. Este negocio es una fuente importante de ayuda para su hogar. El negocio de Mara siempre cuenta con clientes que prefieren su buen trato y amabilidad.
Ella desea adquirir ms verduras y tuberculos, por ello ha credo conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito de 1500 nuevos soles. Con el prstamo pude ampliar su negocio y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia con las ganancias que obtenga.
texts.en:
Mara is 33 and lives with her family in their own house, which has water and electricity services. It is located in the urban area of Cayalt district, an area where people make their living farming and raising livestock.
For a few years, she has had a stand selling vegetables and potatoes set up in the produce market in the city of Cayalt. Every day, she offers her customers a variety of fresh vegetables and potatoes.
This business is an important source of support for her household. Mara's business always has customers who prefer her good service and friendliness.
She wants to buy more vegetables and potatoes, so she has decided to apply to Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1,500 nuevos soles. With the loan she can expand her business, and improve her family's quality of life with the earnings she gets.

loan.use: To buy more vegetables and potatoes, in order to stock her business.

loan.name: Fidencio

texts.es: El apreciable Sr. Fidencio es una persona que ya tiene laborando siete aos consecutivos de tcnico en un taller, el nos solicito el prstamo a la institucin ya que pronto recibir la llegada de su nieto, y como este acontecimiento genera gastos fuertes y en el momento no cuentan con el capital suficiente para hacerle frente, el esta muy contentos de habernos encontrado ya que gracias a nuestro apoyo pagara el parto de su nuera, en esta ocasin ella no pudo salir en la fotografa debido a el horario que tienen en sus trabajos.
texts.en:
Fidencio is an admirable person who has been working for seven consecutive years as a technician in a workshop.
He is asking the institution for a loan, since he expecting the arrival of a grandchild soon. This event will generate heavy expenses, and at the moment he doesn't have the funds necessary to cover them. He is very happy to have found us, as thanks to our support, he will pay for his daughter-in-law's childbirth expenses.
On this occasion, she was not able to appear in the photograph because of her schedule at work.

loan.use: To pay for childbirth expenses.

loan.name: G.s. La Colonia Group

texts.es: El Grupo solidario La colonia lo conforma Cristina, Ingrid y Luis. La seora Cristian tiene 41 aos de edad, es casada con tres hijos de 7, 13 y 16 aos de edad. Ella se dedica al negocio de pulpera, la tiene ubicada en su casa de habitacin desde hace ms de 3 aos. Desea este crdito para invertirlo en granos bsicos, golosinas, refrescos, pan, detergentes, papel higinico entre otros. Ingrid del Carmen es otra integrante del grupo. Ella tiene 25 aos de edad, es soltera y aun no tiene hijos. Ella se dedica a la venta de cosmticos de manera ambulante, trabaja con Vogue principalmente en la distribucin de productos. Ella desea invertir el crdito en la compra de cosmticos para distribuirlos a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The La Colonia communal bank is comprised of Cristina, Ingrid, and Luis.
Cristina is 41 years old and married. She has three children; ages 7, 13, and 16. She has had a grocery store, which is located in her house, for over three years. She wants this loan to buy basic grains, sweets, soft drinks, bread, detergent, and toilet paper, among other things.
Ingrid del Carmen is another member of the group. She is 25 years old, single, and does not yet have children. She sells cosmetics in an itinerant manner. She mainly works with Vogue in the distribution of her products. She wants to use the loan to buy cosmetics to distribute to her customers.

loan.use: to buy basic grains, sweets, soft drinks, bread, detergent, and toilet paper.

loan.name: Delia

texts.es:
Delia de 54 aos de edad. Vive junto a su esposo e hijos en casa de sus suegros, cuenta con todos los servicios bsicos, ubicada en la zona urbana del distrito de Chepn que pertenece al departamento de La Libertad. Esta zona se dedica a la actividad agrcola, ganadera y turismo.
Desde hace varios aos, cuenta con una bodega instalada en su domicilio. All ofrecen en venta a los vecinos y clientes de la zona diversos productos de consumo diario, entre productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes en general. Cuenta con una clientela establecida y no tiene otra competencia cerca de su negocio. Con esta actividad ella solventa sus gastos econmicos y ayuda su familia.
Delia observa que va creciendo favorablemente su negocio, desea seguir amplindolo con la compra de ms mercadera como gaseosa y abarrotes en general. Va a comprar sus productos en grandes cantidades lo que ayuda en bajar el precio que paga. Por ello, ha credo conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito de 1200 nuevos soles. Delia es muy trabajadora, empeosa y responsable frente a su negocio. Desea lograr mayores ingresos para brindarle mejores opciones en la vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Delia, age 54, lives with her husband and children in her in-laws house. The house has all of the basic services. It is located in an urban zone in the Chepn district in the La Libertad department. The people in this zone devote themselves to farming, livestock, and tourism.
For several years she has had a general store set up in her house. She sells diverse daily consumption products and general groceries to her neighbors and customers. She has established customers, and she does not have any competition close to her business. Through this business she pays for her expenses and helps her family.
Delia notices that her business is growing favorably. She wishes to continue expanding it with the purchase of more merchandise like soft drinks and general groceries. She will buy products in large quantities, which will help lower the price that she pays.
She therefore finds it advisable to request a loan for 1,200 soles from Edpyme Alternativa. Delia is a very hard-worker, and she is diligent and responsible in her business. She wants to manage to get greater income in order to provide better options in her familys life.

loan.use: to buy more merchandise like soft drinks and general groceries for her store.

loan.name: Ana Maria

texts.es: Ana Mara se dedica a la venta de cosa de horno, desde hace ms de 27 aos que tiene este negocio. Consiste en la elaboracin de cosa de horno que ofrece de manera ambulante a pesar que no ha sido fcil pues tiene ciertas dificultades como la falta de capital de trabajo para ofrecer a sus clientes. El motivo del crdito es para la compra de maz, leche, queso, azcar, harina, arroz, bolsas, entre otros productos. Suea con mejorar sus ingresos y adems de esto ampliar cada da su negocio.
texts.en: Ana Mara has worked selling corn-based breads for more than 27 years. She makes the bread and then sells it on the streets. This business has not been easy for her, and she struggles with certain difficulties, like a lack of capital to make enough products to offer to her customers. Her goal with this loan is to buy corn, milk, cheese, sugar, flour, rice, bags, and other products. She dreams of increasing her earnings and, in addition to this, dreams of expanding her business each day.

loan.use: buy corn, milk, cheese, sugar, flour, rice, bags, and other products

loan.name: Mario

texts.es: El cliente Mario, tiene 44 aos y esta casado con la seora, Valentina, no tienen hijos dependientes, son de familia humilde y trabajadora. El cliente se dedica al servicio de construccin, que trabaja en todos lados para sustentar a su familia, y de igual manera la esposa se dedica al servicio de comercio de frutas, que vende en el mercado principal de la ciudad de Cochabamba (la pampa), el destino del crdito es para la construccin de su vivienda, el cliente vive en la localidad denominada Pucarita Chica, de la ciudad de Cochabamba, es por lo cual reflejamos una pequea historia del cliente para el conocimiento de todos ustedes.
texts.en: Mario is 44 years old and married to Valentina. They do not have any dependent children, and are a humble and hard-working family. He works in construction all around the area in order to support his family. His wife works selling fruit in the main market of Cochabamba. He will use this loan to build his home. He lives in the Pucarita Chica zone in the city of Cochabamba. We shared a bit of his story with you all so you could get to know him.

loan.use: with the construction of his house

loan.name: William De Los Reyes

texts.es: William De Los Reyes se dedica a la venta de prodcutos veterinarios. Hace ms de 7 aos que tiene este negocio, a pesar de que no ha tenido una gran cantidad de clientes el siempre brinda el mejor servicio. El motivo del crdito es para la compra de vitaminas, pastillas, suplementos, jarabes entre otros prodcutos, la forma de William es de manera ambulante pues tiene abordar diferentes buses para ofrecer sus prodcutos. William suea con seguirle proporcionando mejoras a su vivienda.
texts.en: William de Los Reyes sells veterinary products for a living. He has had this business for more than seven years, and though he hasn't always had a large number of customers, he always offers the best service. This loan will be used to buy vitamins, pills, supplements, syrups, and other products. William's is a traveling business, as he has to take different buses to offer his products. William dreams of continuing to make improvements to his home.

loan.use: to buy vitamins, pills, supplements, and syrups for his veterinary business.

loan.name: Jose Orlando

texts.es: Entre sartenes, harina y horno caliente encontramos a Don Jose, un humilde panadero, originario Madriz departamento localizado en la zona Norte de Nicaragua, pero tiene 46 aos de vivir en la ciudad de Len, tiene 60 aos de edad, padre de 5 hijos todo ellos independientes. El tiene 45 aos de experiencia en este negocio, pues empez desde muy joven como ayudante de panaderos, el limpiaba sartenes, acomodaba el pan ,tambin venda pan despus paso a elaborar con sus propias manos el pan, mezclar los diferentes tipos de harina y as fue surgiendo poco a poco hasta que un da logro poner su negocio junto con su esposa de panadera el cual tiene 20 aos de tenerlo , ella falleci as que le toco hacerse cargo el mismo junto con sus hijos , de esta manera sobrevivi el y su familia a lo largo de estos aos. El solicita el crdito para comprar materia prima tales como harina, manteca, levadura, azcar , queso y lea. Con esta inversin podr suplir la materia prima que necesita para producir ms y mejora sus ventas. El desea hacerle unas remodelaciones a su panadera y apoyar a uno de sus hijos a poner su negocio de panadera.
texts.en:
Among pans, flour, and a hot oven we find Jose, a humble baker. He is originally from the department of Madriz in the northern region of Nicaragua, but he has lived in the city of Len for 46 years. He is 60 years old and a father of five children, all of whom are independent. He has 45 years of experience in this business as he started out as a baker's helper when he was very young cleaning pans, arranging bread, and also selling bread. Later he went on to bake bread with his own hands, mixing different kinds of flour, and from there he progressed little by little until one day he was able to start the bakery business with his wife that he's had for 20 years. She passed away, and so it was up to him and his children to take charge, which is how he and his family have survived throughout the years.
He is asking for this loan to buy raw materials, such as flour, lard, yeast, sugar, cheese, and firewood. With this investment he will be able to supply the raw material he needs to produce more and to improve his sales. He wants to remodel his bakery and to help one of his sons to open his own bakery business.

loan.use: to buy raw materials such as flour, lard, yeast, sugar, cheese, and firewood

loan.name: Daniel Natalio

texts.es: El seor Daniel vive en la zona de Villa Tunari en el Alto, el se dedica a la fabricacin de sombreros de cholitas y tambin para seores, el vive en alquiler donde tiene un taller de sombreros de cholitas y de varones para lo cual solicito el crdito ya que necesita comprar material para la fabricacin de sombreros, necesita capital para realizar sombreros mas finos, el entrega la mercadera por docena a las tiendas sombrereras de la ciudad de La Paz, hace tiempo que se compro un terreno por la zona de San Roque el mismo que lo esta haciendo amurallar y desea hacer construir unos cuartitos para irse a vivir en su propia casa y ya no pagar alquiler y desea dar a su familia mayor comodidad por eso trabaja duro y se esfuerza.
texts.en: Daniel lives in the Villa Tunari area of El Alto. He makes ladies' and men's bowler hats for a living. He lives in a rental unit where he has a workshop to make his ladies' and men's bowler hats. That is why he asking for this loan, as he needs to buy material to make the hats and he needs capital to make nicer hats. He turns his merchandise over by the dozen to hat shops in the city of La Paz. A while ago he bought some land in the San Roque area. He is building a wall around it himself and he hopes to build some small rooms so he can go live in his own home and no longer have to pay rent. He also wants to give his family more comfort, which is why he works hard and applies himself.

loan.use: to buy material to make bowler hats

loan.name: Tamara Kruspkaya

texts.es: Tamara es una joven de 28 aos de edad, trabaja en su profesion como medico en medicina interna, logro terminar sus estudios gracias al apoyo economico y moral de sus padres. Hoy en dia ha venido mejorando la vivienda de su mama, para tener mejores condiciones de seguridad, en su credito anterior logro terminar su muro, teniendo avanzado bastante, con dinero propio, de su trabajo y con el financiamiento logro terminarlo a menor plazo, ahora sera para la compra de porton grande principal el cual dara por terminado, y asi estar con mas estabilidad y seguridad, ya que hay muchos ladrones en la capital. y sus padres estaran mas cuidados. Que es muy fundamental para ella. Como planes a futuro es establecer su propia familia, estar estable en su trabajo.
texts.en:
Tamara is a young woman of 28 who is an internal medicine doctor. She succeeded in completing her studies thanks to the economic and moral support from her parents.
Now she has been improving her mothers house, to give them better security. With her last loan she was able to finish the wall and its advanced quite a bit, using her own money from her work and the short term loan. Now she will use the loan to buy a big front door which will finish the work and give her mother more stability and security since there are many burglars in the capital. Her parents will be safer which is very fundamental for Tamara.
Her future plans are to have her own family and to have stability in her work.

loan.use: to buy an iron main door to complete the wall..

loan.name: Esperanza

texts.es: La Sra. Esperanza naci en la ciudad de Potos, actualmente radica en la localidad de San Jose, ella se dedica a la venta de verduras hace bastantes aos, e casada su esposo Jess es albail cuentan con un hijo que es menor de edad, han solicitado un crdito para la compra de frutas ya que esta llegando la poca de la manga, pia, comprara con el dinero frutas de temporada, es cliente antigua y responsable por lo tanto nuevamente estn muy agradecidos con la institucion por el apoyo econmico que les ha brindado para mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Esperanza was born in the city of Potos, and now lives in the town of San Jose. She has sold vegetables for many years now. She is married, her husband Jess is a bricklayer, and they have one dependent child. They have requested a loan to buy fruit since the season for mango and pineapple is coming up. They will purchase seasonal fruit with the money. She is a former client and therefore responsible. They are again grateful to the institution for the financial support they have provided to improve their quality of life.

loan.use: buy seasonal fruit.

loan.name: Rosalia Ramona

texts.es: La Seora Rosala tiene 36 aos es casada y tiene 1 hijo de 19 aos que todava est bajo su cargo. Ella solicita este crdito para la compra 1 manzana de tierra que tiene cosecha de caa. Pues ella se dedica a sembrar caa, yuca entre otros productos. Este negocio lo inicio por la necesidad de sufragar los gastos de su hogar, pues sus padres se dedicaban a esta actividad su madre falleci y fue as que ella logro obtener este medio de vida.
texts.en: Seora Rosalia is 36 years old. She is married and has one son, who is 19 and whom she still supports. She is applying for this loan to purchase 1 mz. of land (about 1.7 acres) which has a crop of sugar cane. Then she will plant cane and yucca, among other crops. She began this business because of the need to pay household expenses, since her parents did this kind of work. Her mother has died, but this was how Rosalia learned this way of making a living.

loan.use: to buy land.

loan.name: Aquiles

texts.es: El seor Aquiles tiene 46 aos de edad, vive en el barrio el Reparto de la ciudad capital y se dedica a prestar los servicios de transporte, posee un Taxi, tiene mas de cuatro aos de experiencia con este tipo de negocio, su unidad esta asignada en un Centro Comercial de la ciudad, el cual es visitado diariamente por miles de personas y que son los que le solicitan el servicio, el credito lo utilizara para pintar su unidad ya que la pintura esta en mal estado y la entidad estatal de transportes les obliga a que las unidades esten bien pintadas. gracias a este negocio puede sostener a su esposa e hijos y cumplir con las obligaciones adquiridas.
texts.en:
Aquiles is 46 years old, lives in the Reparto neighborhood of the capital, and offers transportation services for a living. He has a taxi and more than four years of experience in this kind of business. His taxi is assigned to the city's commercial center, which is visited daily by thousands of people who are among those who use his services. He will use the loan to paint his taxi since the paint is in bad shape and the state transportation authority requires taxis' paint to be in good condition.
Thanks to this business, he can support his wife and children and fulfill the obligations he has acquired.

loan.use: to buy materials and paint for his vehicle

loan.name: Lester Roberto

texts.es: El Seor Lester tiene 1hijo el se dedica a la distribucin de productos pepsi, hace 4 aos, comenz con pocos productos pues l le compra a los camiones distribuidoras ya que el almacena sus productos y los distribuye a las pulperas. El crdito solicitado es para comprar variedad en gaseosas de diferentes sabores y tamaos. El Sueo del Seor Lester es mejorar su negocio y ampliarlo cada da ms.
texts.en: Lester has one child and he has been distributing Pepsi products for the past 4 years. He started with a few items but then he started buying from the company trucks. Now he warehouses the products and distributes them to the general stores. He is requesting a loan to buy different types of soft drinks, and different flavors and sizes. Lesters dream is to improve his business and expand it more every day.

loan.use: to buy a variety of soft drinks in different flavors and sizes

loan.name: Rene Omar

texts.es: En Subtiava un barrio muy pintoresco y conocido en la ciudad de Len, habita el seor Ren , un comerciante , dueo de molinos, tiene 54 aos de edad, casado, tiene 3 hijos de 23,22 y 17 aos de edad, el mayor de sus hijos es ingeniero en telemtica los otros dos aun estn estudiando. Este negocio ha sido traspasado de generacin en generacin, sus padres y abuelos eran quienes se hacia cargo de este negocio. Pero el tiene aproximadamente 23 aos de tenerlo por cuenta propia. El solicita el prstamo para acondicionar y hacerle reparaciones a su local, mantenimiento a su molinos donde tiene su molino, e invertir en compra de granos bsicos .Esto le ayudara a dar una mejor presentacin a su negocio y dar un mejor servicio a sus clientes. Uno de sus planes futuros es expandirse, poner otros molinos en lugares diferentes de la ciudad de Len, su meta prxima es ayudar a sus dos hijos menores a finalizar sus estudios profesionales.
texts.en:
Ren lives in Subtiava, a very picturesque and well-known neighborhood in the city of Len. He is a business man who owns mills. He is 54 years old, married, and has three children who are 23, 22, and 17 years old. His oldest son is a telematics engineer; the other two are still in school. This business has been passed down from generation to generation; his parents and grandparents were the ones who were in charge of this business. However, he has run it on his own for approximately 23 years.
He is asking for the loan to equip and repair his business, to maintain his mills on site and to invest in the purchase of staple grains. This will help him give his business a better appearance and provide better service to his customers. One of his future plans is to expand by setting up more mills in different areas of the city of Len. His next goal is to help his two youngest children finish their professional studies.

loan.use: to equip and repair his business, to maintain his mills on site and to invest in the purchase of staple grains

loan.name: Ruth Belina

texts.es: Doa Ruth, sigue al frente de su negocio, cada dia, en donde ofrece ricos platillos de comidas, asi como alquilando dos cuartos, lo que le ayudado economicamente en sus ingresos, hoy en dia a un apoya a dos de sus dos hijos menores que junto a su esposo le bridamos educacion, el sigue laborando siempre de conductor, pues lleva aos ejerciendo este trabajo. Con este nuevo prestamo, podra terminar la construccion de dos baos con inodoros, e instalar las aguas negras, ya que tiene parte de las paredes construida, pero necesita darle mejor acondicionamiento, de seguridad para una buena higiene, para sus inquilinos, como en lo personal. Materiales a comprar bloques, hierro, cemento, inodoro, tubos para agua negras, pegamento, entre otros productos que ayude a su obra. Pues esta muy contenta al poder realizar estas mejoras en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Doa Ruth continues to be in charge of her business, in which she offers delicious meals every day, as well as renting two rooms, which helps her income. With this income she supports her two younger children. She and her husband are offering them an education. Her husband continues to work, as always, as a driver, since he has been doing this work for years.
With this new loan, she will be able to finish the construction of two bathrooms with toilets and install a sewage system, since she has part of the walls already built, but she needs to do a better job, for security and for good hygiene, for her tenants as well as for her family.
She will buy materials such as concrete blocks, iron, cement, toilets, pipes for wastewater, and glue, among other products that will help this effort. She is very happy to be able to make these improvements in her home.

loan.use: to finish constructing the bathrooms, install toilets and pipes for wastewater, and finish the roof and a concrete wall for the whole project

loan.name: Jose Dagoberto

texts.es: El seor Jos tiene 46 aos de edad, vive en la colonia Vista Hermosa y se dedica a la venta de repuestos y accesorios para vehiculos como ser parabrisas, parlantes, gatas, tapasoles, alfombras, radios entre otros, cuenta con varios aos de tener su negocio, sus ventas las realiza de Lunes a sbado en una calle muy transitada de la ciudad, la mayora de sus clientes son los motoristas y dueos de taxis, todas las maanas junto con su hermano exponen sus productos en el vehculo para que todas las personas que transitan por el lugar puedan observar la variedad de accesorios y repuestos. el credito lo utilizara para la compra de accesorios y repuestos para diferentes marcas de carros. gracias a las ganancias que obtiene de su negocio puede cubrir los gastos familiares.
texts.en:
Jos is 46 years old and lives in the neighborhood of Vista Hermosa. He works selling car parts and accessories such as windshields, speakers, jacks, sun shades, mats, radios, and more. He has had his business for several years. He sells his merchandise from Monday to Saturday on a very busy street in the city. The majority of his customers are taxi drivers. Every morning, he and his brother display their wares in a vehicle so that everyone who travels by can see the variety of accessories and car parts.

He will use the loan to buy car parts and accessories for different makes of cars. Thanks to the income from his business, he can provide for his family's expenses.

loan.use: buy car parts and accessories

loan.name: Maria Santos

texts.es:
La seora Maria tiene 30 aos de edad, vive con su compaero de vida y cuatro hijos.
Ella se dedica desde hace seis aos a la venta de comida rpida como papitas fritas, hot dog, entre otros. Esta actividad la ejerce junto a su compaero de vida, y la aprendi gracias a su mam. Ella debe trasladarse a unas ciudades del oriente del pas, para comprar los insumos que necesita, aborda un autobs durante seis kilmetros, luego llega al puesto que tiene en el centro de la comunidad y empieza a prepararlos, por lo que debe levantarse muy de maana y los vende de lunes a domingo.
Maria esta solicitando un prstamo a Fundacin Campo, para comprar: pan, carne de pollo y de res, verduras, salsas, papas, mayonesa, queso, etc. Con esto ella podr tener variedad de productos y satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes, que es mucha y no da abasto, ya que es el nico puesto que vende los productos que ella elabora. Por lo que tiene un gran mercado, de esta forma recibir mejores ingresos, lo que le permitir mejorar su calidad de vida y brindarles educacin a sus hijos y salud. Ella desea que sus hijos sean profesionales, y tener una vivienda digna para su familia.
texts.en:
Maria is 30 years old and she live with her life partner and their four children. For the past six years she has been selling fast foods such as French fries, hot dogs, etc. He carries out this activity together with her life partner, and she learned the business from her mother. She needs to travel to cities in the west of the country to purchase ingredients that she needs. She boards a bus for six kilometers and later returns to the stand that she has in the community's center and she starts to prepare them. She needs to start her days very early in the morning, and she's open for business from Monday to Sunday.
Maria requests a loan to from Fundacion Campo (Kiva Field Partner) to purchase: bread, chicken and beef meats, vegetables, salsas, potatoes, mayonnaise, cheese, etc. This way she will be able to have a variety of products and to satisfy the demand of her clients. The demand is high and she is not able to respond, especially because it is the only stand that sells the products that she makes. It is the reason why she has such a large market and this is how she will have an improve income. It will permit her to improve the quality of her life and she will be able to provide her children with an education and with health care. She wants for her children to have a career, and to have a dignified home for their families.

loan.use: to purchase larger quantities fo bread, chicken and beef meats, vegetables, mayonnaise, and other ingredients to make French fries and hot dogs.

loan.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es: La seora Mara es socia del banco comunal "Mujeres Triunfadoras" del Distrito de Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 29 aos de edad, est casada y tiene un hijo. Recin lleva tres ciclos trabajando con los prstamos de Manuela Ramos. Ella se dedica a la comercializacin de pescado, los lleva a vender por la carretera junto a su esposo, l maneja su furgn que compraron especialmente para este negocio que es ir a distintas partes llevando a vender el pescado. Con su nuevo prstamo de S/. 1,000.00 nuevo soles comprar:5 tinas de pescado bagre, 2 tinas de bocachico,1 tina de sardinas, 1 bandeja de lisa. Su movilidad no tiene ms capacidad, pero es regular lo que pueden transportar, solo tiene pena cuando deja a su hijo para salir a trabajar. Agradece a Manuela Ramos por la oportunidad de ser parte de su familia..
texts.en:
Mara is a member of the "Mujeres Triunfadoras" (Triumphant Women) Communal Bank in the district of Calleria, department of Ucayali. She is 29 years old, married, and has one son. She has recently completed three loan cycles working with loans from Manuela Ramos. She works selling fish along the highway with her husband. He drives the van that they bought especially for this business, going to different locations transporting fish to sell.

With her new loan of 1,000.00 nuevo soles, she will buy 5 tubs of catfish, 2 tubs of bocachico fish, 1 tub of sardines, and 1 tray of grey mullet. Her van does not have room for more than that, but that is the normal amount they can transport. The only thing she regrets is leaving her son when she goes to work. She is thankful for the opportunity to be a member of the Manuela Ramos family.

loan.use: buy fish in bulk

loan.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es:
La seora Maria Cristina, de 43 aos de edad, habitante de la cuidad de Len, madre de 4 hijos, todos ellos independientes, ella es maestra de profesin pero al mismo tiempo es comerciante, ella tiene una mini- tienda de ropa. Ella trabajo 12 aos como maestra de una escuela primaria pero al renunciar busco otra manera de cmo ganarse el pan de cada da de manera honrada as que con el dinero que le dieron de su liquidacin puso su tienda de ropa usada para vender.
Ella solicita el prstamo para hacerles mejoras y reparaciones a su casa y darle una mejor presentacin a su tienda para poder atraer clientes, hacerles sentir confort en su tienda e invertir en mercadera nueva para vender. Le gustara dar publicidad radial para darse a conocer mas en todo su vecindario y en lo futuro poner dos tiendas de ropa usada.
texts.en:
Seora Maria Cristina is 43 years old and a resident of the city of Leon. She has 4 children, all independent. She is a teacher by profession but is also a merchant. She has mini-store selling clothes. She worked for 12 years as a primary school teacher but on resigning looked for another way to earn her daily bread in an honest way. With her severance pay, she set up a used-clothes shop.
She is asking for a loan to make improvements and repairs to her house and give her shop a better appearance to attract customers, make them feel comfortable in her shop and also to invest in new merchandise to sell. She would like to subscribe to radio advertising to be better known around the neighbourhood and in the future set up 2 used-clothes stores.

loan.use: to make improvements and repairs to her house to give her shop a better appearance so as to attract customers and make them feel comfortable in her shop and invest in new merchandise to sell.

loan.name: Hildaura

texts.es: La seora Hildaura es socia del banco comunal Las Triunfadoras del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 53 aos de edad y es soltera. Lleva 10 aos trabajando con los prstamos de Manuela Ramos, se dedica a la venta de gaseosas, cuenta con un puesto en uno de los mercados de la ciudad. Con su nuevo prstamo de S/. 1,300.00 nuevos soles comprar: 10 paquetes de gaseosas de diferentes tamaos y sabores, 1 paquete de sorbetes, 1 ciento de vasos. A sus aos todava est soltera y sin compromiso, su nico compromiso lo tiene con su hermano que es un minusvlido a quien atiende antes de ir a trabajar, espera seguir trabajando con Manuela Ramos para ir implementando ms su negocio. Su trabajo es casi de todo el da, regresa por las noches para poder descansar y ver cmo se encuentra su hermano, como buena hermana se preocupa que nada le falte.
texts.en:
Seora Hildaura is a member of the communal bank Las Triunfadoras del Distrito Calleria in the district of Calleria, in the department of Ucayali. She is 53 years old and single. She has been working with the Manuela Ramos loans for 10 years. She sells soft drinks from a stall located at one of the city's markets.
With the new loan of S/. 1,300.00 nuevos soles (PEN) she will buy: 10 cases of soft drinks of different sizes and flavours, 1 case of sherbet, 100 glasses.
At her age, she is still single and without responsibility. Her sole responsibilty is her brother who is disabled. She attends to him before she goes to work. She looks forward to working with Manuela Ramos so as to continue consolidating her business more.
She works nearly all day and goes home at night to rest and see how her brother is doing, as being a caring sister she worries that he lacks for nothing.

loan.use: to buy soft drinks.

loan.name: Lizett

texts.es: La seora Lizett es socia del banco comunal Las divinas del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 38 aos de edad, est casada y tiene dos hijos menores. Lleva cuatro aos trabajando con los prstamos de Manuela Ramos, se dedica a la confeccin de prendas de vestir, cuenta con cuatro mquinas que utiliza para realizar trabajos de confeccin, tambin trabaja sobre pedidos. Con su nuevo prstamo de S/. 2,200.00 nuevos soles comprar: 14 metros de tela, 7 kilos de tela de algodn, 2 conos de elsticos de 10 ligas, 50 metros de blonda blanca, 50 metros de pasa cinta, 3 conos de hilos. En su negocio tambin genera trabajo para otras personas, sobre todo cuando tiene pedidos por cantidad, su esposo es trabajador independiente, tiene un moto car propio que le sirve para mantener a su familia, gracias a Manuela Ramos tiene un negocio propio y lo mejor es que funciona en su misma casa.
texts.en:
Seora Lizett is a member of the communal bank Las Divinas del Distrito Calleria in the department of Ucayali. She is 53 years old, married and has 2 dependent children. She has been working with the Manuela Ramos loans for 4 years. She works making clothing. She has 4 machines used for manufacturing jobs and she also works to order.
With her new loan of S/. 2,200.00 nuevos soles (PEN) she will buy: 14 metres of fabric, 7 kilos of cotton cloth, 2 bobbins of elastic of 10 ligas (10 leagues), 50 metres of white lace, 50 metres of ribbon, 3 bobbins of thread.
She also generates work for other people with her own business, expecially when she has large orders. Her husband is self employed. He has his own motor tricycle which he uses to support his family. Thanks to Manuela Ramos she has her own business and the best thing is that it is located in her own home.

loan.use: to buy fabrics, cotton, elastic.

loan.name: Saul Alexander

texts.es: Sal tiene 19 aos de edad, es soltero y vive con sus padres. A raz de las limitantes econmicas de sus padres, l no tuvo la oportunidad de seguir estudiando quedndose nada mas con un nivel educativo bsico. Tiene 2 hermanos uno mayor y otro menor. Su padre es propietario de un taller de estructuras metlicas y su madre es ama de casa. Este joven emprendedor trabaj con su padre en el taller y se relacionaba con muchas personas y vio la oportunidad de independizarse poniendo su propio negocio LAVADO DE VEHICULO debido a la cantidad de vehculos que circulan a diario por la zona, esta actividad la inicio desde hace 3 aos y el local donde est el establecimiento es de su papa. El negocio lo inicio con fondos propios y por primera vez est teniendo la experiencia de solicitar un prstamo. El crdito ser utilizado para la compra de accesoria para vehculos (aceites, aromatizantes,etc) y tambin para reparar la mquina de lavado a vapor. El negocio es manejado por l y su hermano, las actividades las inician a las 6.00 de la maana y la finalizan a las 6 de la tarde; la ubicacin del negocio est apropiada ya que se encuentra sobre la carretera litoral y el flujo de vehculos es muy bueno y en la zona solo hay otro CAR WASH. La proyeccin de Sal es atender mayor nmero de clientes y brindar un servicio complementario como es la venta de accesorios, resulta que actualmente las personas solo llegan a lavar su vehculo y se van al otro negocio (competencia) a comprar sus accesorios y la otra limitante que tiene es que solo lava carroceras, ya que por no tener la lavadora a vapor no puede lavar motores y eso le resta ingresos. Los planes para el futuro de saul son: Fortalecer su negocio con mayor equipo y ampliar el servicio a un taller de reparacin de vehculos, tambin irse preparando econmicamente y comprar sus electrodomsticos para casarse y vivir dignamente. Finalmente tiene su sueo a largo plazo de su casa y formar una familia de xito en la sociedad.
texts.en:
Saul Alexander is 19 years old, single, and he lives with his parents. Given his parents' limited financial resources he was not able to stay in school. He only has a basic level of education. He has two brothers, and older and a younger. His father is the owner of a blacksmith shop and his mother is a housewife. This young entrepreneur started out working with his father in the shop and he got to know many people when he saw the opportunity to set up his own car wash business, given the number of vehicles that passed daily through the region. He started out this business 3 years ago and space where his business is established belongs to his father.
He started out his business with his own funds and for the first time he is requesting a loan. The loan will be used to purchase vehicle accessories (oils, car fresheners, etc.) and to repair his steam cleaning machine. The business is managed by himself and by his brother. They open their business at 6:00 in the morning and the finish at 6:00 in the evening. The location of the business is appropriate because it is found on a coastal road and the flux of vehicles is very good. There is only one other car wash in the region. Young Saul's goal is to attend to a larger number of clients and to provide complementary services such as the sale of accessories. Currently people only come to wash their car and they go to the other business (the competition) to buy their accessories. The other limiting factor is that he can only do the body wash. He doesn't have a steam cleaner so he cannot wash the motors and this represents is a loss of income.
His plans for the future for this young entrepreneur are to: strengthen his business with better tools and to expand his service to include a vehicle repair shop. He also wants to start preparing himself financially and to buy home appliances to get married and to live in a dignified way. Finally, his long-term dream is to have a house and to form a successful family in his society.

loan.use: to purchase car accessories such as oils and air fresheners and to purchase a steam cleaning machine.

loan.name: Rosa Emilia

texts.es: Rosa Emilia tiene 31 aos, es una mujer amable y muy talentosa, convive con su pareja, Ella trabaja en una pulpera en donde ofrece una gran variedad de productos como huevos, leche, carnes, pollos, cremas, golosinas, granos bsicos, detergentes, fsforos y otros. es por eso que solicita el credito para la compra de materia prima, lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que dispone de tiempo, es independiente y no tiene que rendir cuentas a nadie, ella es muy responsables, est muy agradecida pues los prstamos recibidos anteriormente le fueron de mucha ayuda y fueron muy bien invertido, espera contar nuevamente con su ayuda.
texts.en: Rosa Emilia is 31 years old and is a friendly and talented woman who lives with her partner. She works in a grocery store where she offers a wide variety of products such as eggs, milk, meat, chicken, creams, sweets, dry grains, detergents, matches and more.
