This is why she is asking for a loan to buy the raw materials for her business. What she likes about her work is that she has time, is independent and is not accountable to anyone. She is very responsible and is very grateful as the previous loans she received were of great help and were well invested. She hopes to have your support again.

loan.use: to buy eggs, milk, meat, chicken, creams, sweets, dry grains, detergents, matches and more.

loan.name: Rosini

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Rosini; ella tiene 40 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; La socia sigue con sus negocios de venta de helados y venta de repuestos de carros y tractor,ella trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,el negocio de venta de helados y venta de repuestos lo realiza en el distrito de Anta,la socia quiere ampliar y seguir mejorando en su negocio de venta de repuestos de carro y venta de helados . La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar repuestosb al por mayor y comprar insumos para preparar los helados como frutas.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sra. Rosini is 40 years old and lives with a partner. She has 3 chilldren. The member continues with her business of selling ice cream and selling spare parts for cars and tractors from 8:00 a.m. until 5:00 p.m. Both the ice cream business and the spare parts business are based in the district of Anta. The member wants to expand and continue improving her car spare parts business and her ice cream business. The member is asking for a loan to buy spare parts wholesale and supplies such as fruit to make her ice cream.
The member is happy for the loan and agrees to comply with her repayment schedule.

loan.use: to buy spare parts wholesale and buy supplies such as fruit to make ice cream.

loan.name: Hilda's Group

texts.es:
Hilda's Group est conformado por tres personas: 2 mujeres y un hombre. En este grupo Hilda es la presidenta.
Hilda tiene 45 aos vive con su hijo en La Esperanza que se encuentra a 15 minutos de Ibarra en el Norte de Ecuador. Se considera una persona trabajadora y responsable de su hijo.
Trabaja con sus sobrinas en el bordado de manteles. Es el segundo crdito que solicita a Fodemi, el mismo que va a ser invertido en la compra de materia prima como manteles, tela, hilo para bordar, lo que va a ayudar a incrementar su produccin para mejorar sus ventas e ingresos. Su sueo es que su hijo sea profesional y en lo personal quiere ser una inversionista grande para poder emplear a personal.
texts.en:
Hilda's Group has three members: two women and one man. Hilda is the group's president.
Hilda is 45 years old and lives with her son in La Esperanza, 15 minutes from Ibarra, in the north of Ecuador. She considers herself to be a hard-working person and is responsible for her son.
Hilda works with her nieces, embroidering tablecloths. This is the second loan she has requested from Fodemi. She will invest it in buying raw materials such as tablecloths, fabric and embroidery thread, which will help her to increase her production so that she can improve her sales and income. Her dream is for her son to become a professional and, on a personal level, she would like to become a big investor so that she can employ some staff.

loan.use: to buy fabric and embroidery thread

loan.name: Diamoral Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarit est cr le07 JUIN 2001. Il est constitu de dix. femmes qui habitent le mme quartier. Leur activit principale est le commerce.
Madame Fatou Bintou qui est la droite de la photo levant la main est responsable de groupe. Elle est ge de 33 ans. Elle est marie et mre de deux enfants. Elle a aussi en sa charge six autres enfants confis par ses parents.
Elle sactive dans la vente de fruits et lgumes.. Elle a une bonne exprience dans ce domaine dactivit, qu'elle pratique depuis plusieurs annes.
Ce prt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et de mieux dvelopper ses activits.
Les profits lui permettront damliorer les conditions de vie de la famille (scolarit etc.)
texts.en:
This solidarity group was created on June 7, 2001. It consists of ten women who live in the same neighborhood. Their main activity is trade.
Mrs. Fatou Bintou is the head of the group. She is standing at the far right in the photo, with her hand raised. She is 33 years old and married with two children, and she also has six other children entrusted to her by relatives.
She sells fruits and vegetables. She has a good command of this activity in which she has several years of experience.
She will use this loan to strengthen her capital and better expand her activities.
The profits will enable her to improve her familys living conditions (education, etc.).

loan.use: to buy fruits and vegetables

loan.name: Encarna

texts.es: La seora Encarna es socia del banco comunal Las Divinas del Distrito de Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 65 aos de edad, est casada y tiene seis hijos mayores de edad, solo un hijo (soltero) vive con ellos. Viene trabajando siete aos con Manuela Ramos, tiene una pequea bodega que funciona en su misma casa, que cuando ella sale a realizar sus comparas su esposo queda encargado del negocio, y lo reemplaza muy bien, es amable con sus clientes. Con su nuevo prstamo de S/. 1,000.00 nuevos soles comprara: 3 tiras de champ, 6 tiras de papitas fritas, 2 tiras de chizitos, 2 tiras de boliqueso, 1 caja de galletas soda, 1 docena de ayudin pequeo, 1 caja de leche chica. Tiene la suerte de contar con la ayuda de su esposo y de su hijo que son las personas que estn ah cuando lo necesita, agradece a Manuela Ramos por todo los prestamos que le han dado en todo este tiempo para poner su negocio.
texts.en:
Encarna is a member of the 'Las Divinas' community bank which is located in Calleria district, in Ucayali department. She is 65 years old, married, and has six children who are all grown up. Only one son (who is single) still lives with her.
Encarna has been working with Manuela Ramos for seven years and has a small grocery store in her own home. When she goes out to do her shopping, her husband looks after the business and he replaces her very well as he is friendly to her customers.
Encarna will use her new loan for 1,000 soles to buy three strips of shampoo, three strips of potato chips, two strips of Chizitos, two strips of Boliqueso, 1 box of soda crackers, 1 dozen small tubs of Ayudn (cleaning products) and 1 box of small cans of milk.
Encarna is lucky to have the help of her husband and her son, who are the people who are there when she needs them. She is grateful to Manuela Ramos for the loans that they have given her over all these years so that she can run her business.

loan.use: to buy shampoo, snacks, candies, detergents and milk

loan.name: Esperanza Imelda

texts.es: Doa Esperanza de oficio conserje con mas de seis aos, laborando en la misma empresa, tambien tiene su pequeo negocio de tortilla, en casa, quien lo ve un familiar, y que ambas se apoyan ya que ella le da, donde vivir, y asi no depender solo de su salario, ya que como objetivo es hacer las mejoras a su casa. y es madre soltera. Esperanza con el credito anterior,iva hacer la construccion de un muro, pero decidio comenzar un cuarto, para poder tener mas espacio, lo que abanzo bastante, y que con este otro financiamiento podra seguir levantando paredes, poner techo, y puertas, si le alcanza, lo que para ella es de gran sastifaccion poder culminar esta obra. Hoy en dia, esta dando educacion a su hijo menor, el cual esta en el ultino ao de secundaria. Como planes es poder dar una carrera universitaria, a su hijo, asi como poner una venta en su casa, a corto plazo, ya que hay dia, muy cansado en su trabajo, la viajadera en las rutas de tarde. Y que espera contar siempre con Afodenic, para seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Esperanza has been working as a janitor for more than six years, for the same company. She also has a small business making tortillas at home which a family member looks after. They both support each other. Esperanza gives her somewhere to live and, in turn, she doesn't have to depend on her salary alone. Her goal is to make improvements to her home. Esperanza is a single mother.
Esperanza was going to use her previous loan to build a wall but she decided to start building a room so that she could have more space. She made a lot of progress and she will use this new loan to continue building the walls, adding a roof and also doors if the money stretches far enough. She will be very happy to complete this work.
Esperanza is currently providing her youngest son with an education. He is in his last year of high school. She plans to be able to send him to university and also plans, in the short term, to set up a store in her home, as there are days when she comes home very tired from work because the trip home is very long. She hopes that she will always be able to count on Afodenic, so that she can continue growing.

loan.use: to finish building some walls, a roof and a door so that she can complete another room which will give her more space and privacy

loan.name: Lisia Milagros

texts.es: La seora Lisia es socia del banco comunal Las Divina del Distrito de Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 34 aos de edad, est casada y tiene 1 hijo. Lleva siete aos trabajando con los prstamos de Manuela Ramos, se dedica a la venta de ropa, las vende en los caseros cercanos a su casa. Con su nuevo prestamos de S/ 1,300.00 nuevos soles comprar: 1 docena de pantalones, 1 de polos para varones, 6 camisas, 6 bivirs, 6 shores de tela. Cada fin de mes tiene que venir a Pucallpa (Ciudad) para hacer sus compras, tambin atiende pedidos. Su esposo es docente de profesin y los dos trabajan y estn ahorrando para la educacin de su hijo y cualquier emergencia que se pudiera presentar. Espera seguir trabajando con Manuela Ramos, es puntual con sus pagos para que a fin de ciclo tambin pueda recibir los incentivos que dan a las socias puntuales.
texts.en:
Lisia is a member of the 'Las Divinas' community bank which is located in Calleria district, in Ucayali department. She is 34 years old, married, and has one child.
Lisia has been working with Manuela Ramos loans for seven years. Her business is selling clothes. She makes her sales in the small villages near her home. She will use her new loan for 1,300 soles to buy 1 dozen pairs of pants (trousers), 1 dozen men's polo shirts, 6 shirts, 6 undershirts and 6 pairs of shorts.
At the end of every month, Lisia has to go to the city of Pucallpa to make her purchases. She also fills any orders. Her husband is a teacher by profession. The pair of them both work and are saving up so that they can pay for their son's education and cover any emergency that might present itself.
Lisia hopes to continue working with Manuela Ramos. She is punctual in making her repayments so that, at the end of each loan cycle, she is able to receive the incentives that Manuela Ramos provide to members who make their payments on time.

loan.use: to buy clothes (tops, pants, shirts, etc).

loan.name: Karambenor Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarit est cr le 07 JUIN 2001. Il est constitu de neuf femmes qui habitent le mme quartier. Leur activit principale est le commerce.
Madame Aminata qui est la droite de la photo levant la main est responsable de groupe. Elle est ge de 73 ans. Elle est veuve. Elle a la charge quatre enfants confis par ses parents.
Elle sactive dans la vente d'huile de palme et de jus de citron. Elle a une bonne exprience dans ce domaine dactivit, qu'elle pratique depuis plusieurs annes.
Ce prt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et de mieux dvelopper son petit commerce d'huile de palme et de jus de citron
Les profits lui permettront de subvenir ses besoins personnels et damliorer les conditions de vie des enfants qui lui sont confis ( nourriture etc.).
texts.en:
This community bank was created on the 7th of June 2001. The group is made up of nine women who live in the same neighborhood. Their main business activity is buying and selling goods.
Aminata, who is on the right of the photo raising her hand, is the group's leader. She is 73 years old and a widow. She has four children in her care who have been entrusted to her by their parents.
Aminata's business is selling palm oil and lemon juice. She has good experience in this field which she has been working in for several years.
This loan will allow Aminata to strengthen her capital and better develop her small business selling palm oil and lemon juice.
The profits that Aminata makes will allow her to cover her personal needs and improve the living conditions of the children that she is responsible for (food, etc.)

loan.use: to buy palm oil and lemon juice

loan.name: Lila Yadira

texts.es: Lila, tiene 43 aos de edad, habita en Subtiava uno de los barrios mas populares y pintorescos de la ciudad de Len, esta casada, tiene 2 hijos de 17 y 20 aos de edad , el primero esta en su ultimo ao de la secundaria y el segundo lleva segundo ao de la carrera de Ingeniera Industrial . Ella es comerciante, duea de uno de los molinos mas populares de su vecindario, anteriormente se dedicaba a dar clases a nios de primaria. El negocio de molinos lo heredo de su familia, de hecho ahora son dos molinos que ella tiene en diferentes puntos de su vecindario, su esposo aporta en el hogar con lo que gana y adems le ayuda a administrar el negocio de molinos. Una dela necesidades delas cuales ella carece es de la infraestructura donde tiene sus molinos no son las adecuadas, es por ello que solicita el prstamo para hacer mejoras, pintarlo y hacer reparaciones a su local donde tiene los molinos. Pues esto le ayudara a brindar un mejor servicio y apariencia a su negocio. Por lo pronto quiere abrir otro local de molinos populares, ayudar a su vecindario brindando este servicio, y sacar adelante su mayor orgullo sus hijos.
texts.en:
Lila is 43 years old and lives in Subtiava, one of the most popular neighborhoods in the city of Len which is full of local color. She is married and has two children aged 17 and 20. The first is in his last year of high school and the second is in his second year of a degree in Industrial Engeineering. Lila owns one of the most popular mills in her neighborhood. She used to give classes to elementary school children. Lila inherited her mill business from her family. She now has two mills in different locations within her neighborhood. Her husband contributes to the household with what he earns and also helps her to run her mill business.
One of the difficulties that Lila has is that the infrastructure of the place where she has her mills is not suitable. For this reason, she is requesting a loan to make some improvements, to paint and to make some repairs to her premises. This will help her to provide a better service and give her business a better appearance. She would soon like to open another location with a mill, helping her neighborhood by providing this service, and supporting her biggest pride and joy (her children).

loan.use: to make improvements, to paint and to make some repairs to the premises where she has her mills

loan.name: Diris Carolina

texts.es: La seora Diris tiene 35 aos de edad, vive en la residencial Panchita y se dedica a la venta de productos de uso personal, ropa interior y ropa para dama. sus ventas son de lunes a sbado, sus clientes son sus vecinos y personas que trabajan en diferentes empresas privadas, sus ventas son al credito. Diris desea tener un negocio grande y surtido en el futuro, el credito lo utilizara para la compra de productos de uso personal, detro de poco comienza la epoca de navidad y desea estar preparada con una variedad de productos para ofrecerles a sus clientes. las ganancias las necesita para cubrir los gastos del hogar y para darles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Diris is 35 years old and lives in Panchita neighborhood. Her business is selling personal care products, underwear and women's clothing. She makes her sales from Monday to Saturday. Her customers are her neighbors and people who work in different private companies. She makes her sales on credit.
Diris would like to have a large, well-stocked business in the future. She will use her loan to buy personal care products. The Christmas season will begin soon and she would like to be prepared, with a range of products to offer her customers. She needs the profits to cover her household expenses and to provide her children with a better quality of life.

loan.use: to buy creams, deodorants, shampoo, hair conditioner, underwear and blouses

loan.name: Maria Mercedes

texts.es: La seora Mara es socia del banco comunal las Divinas del Distrito Calleria, Departamento De Ucayali, tiene 59 aos de edad, est separada y tiene 5 hijos. Lleva ocho aos que viene trabajando con los prstamos de Manuela Ramos, ella tiene un taller de costura,cuenta con algunas mquinas necesarias para dar un buen acabado a las prendas. Su nuevo prstamo de S/. 2,500.00 nuevos soles lo invertir de la siguiente manera: s/ 250.00 soles en hacer el piso de su taller, con lo dems comprar insumos como 10 cortes de tela, 1 ciento de botones de diferentes tamaos y colores. Con su trabajo ha podido educar a sus dos hijos mayores que ya son profesionales, solo tiene tres a su cargo, tiene el apoyo econmico de sus dos hijos. Agradece a Dios por haberle dado unos hijos que saben valorar el esfuerzo que hizo su madre para educarlos, ahora le estn retribuyendo.
texts.en:
Mara is a member of the "Las Divinas" community bank which is located in Calleria district, in Ucayali department. She is 59 years old, separated, and has five children.
Mara has been working with Manuela Ramos loans for eight years. She has a sewing workshop and has some machines which are necessary for giving her garments a good finish.
Mara will invest her new loan for 2,500 soles in the following way: she will spend 250 soles on laying flooring in her workshop and use the rest to buy supplies such as 10 lengths of fabric and 100 buttons in different shapes and colors.
Through her work, Mara has been able to educate her two eldest children who are now professionals. She only has three children still in her care. She has the financial support of her two eldest children.
Mara thanks God for having given her children who know to value the efforts that their mother made to educate them and are now repaying her.

loan.use: to buy fabric wholesale

loan.name: Luz Mara

texts.es:
Luz tiene 23 aos, es casada y tiene un hijo de tres aos; vive con su familia en Salcedo que se encuentra ubicado a 20 minutos de Latacunga en la Sierra Centro de Ecuador. Luz se considera una persona buena, tranquila, sociable y amable.
Trabaja con su esposo en la crianza de cerdos. Es la primera vez que solicita crdito a Fodemi, este crdito invertir en la compra de balanceado para la alimentacin de sus cerdos lo que ayudar a que crezcan sanos y gordos para que esten de buena calidad al momento de la venta, ya que obtendrn buenos ingresos.
Su sueo es que su hijo crezca sano y necesita tener una casa propia.
texts.en:
Luz is 23 years old, married, and has a 3-year-old son. She lives with her family in Salcedo, 20 minutes from Latacunga, in Sierra Centro region, in Ecuador. Luz considers herself to be a good, calm, sociable and kind person.
Luz works with her husband, raising pigs. This is the first time that she has requested a loan from Fodemi. She will invest this loan in buying nutritionally-balanced feed for her pigs. This will help them to grow healthy and fat so that they are good quality when she comes to sell them. This will make her good income.
Luz's dream is for her son to grow up healthy and to have her own home.

loan.use: to buy nutritionally-balanced feed for her pigs

loan.name: Misael Anani

texts.es:
Don Misael tiene 46 aos de edad, vive con su compaera de vida y sus tres hijos.
l se dedica a la albailera ya tiene treinta aos de experiencia, empez como ayudante de un albail, y hoy en da l tiene mucho conocimiento en la actividad que realiza. Al mismo tiempo le esta enseando a sus hijos este oficio para que puedan defenderse en la vida.
Don Misael esta solicitando un prstamo a Fundacin Campo, para instalar la energa elctrica en su casa, ya que nunca la han tenido de forma propia, al tenerla l junto con su esposa pretenden poner una pequea tienda, ya que su esposa se dedica a la venta de tortillas y le seria de mucha ayuda el tener energa en su casa. De esta manera mejoran su condicin de vida, l en un futuro desea ampliar su casa y construirla de ladrillo, ya que actualmente es de lmina, pero con la ayuda del prstamo y su familia dice don Misael que lo pueden lograr.
texts.en:
Misael is 46 years old, lives with his life partner and their three children.
He makes a living as a mason and already has thirty years of experience. He began as an assistant to a mason and now has extensive knowledge about his livelihood. At the same time, he is teaching his children this trade so that they can fend for themselves in life.
Misael is requesting a loan from Fundacin Campo in order to install electricity in their home, as they have never had their own means to do so. Once they get electricity, he intends to start a small shop together with his wife. His wife already makes a living selling tortillas and it would be a great help to have energy in the house. In this way, they will improve their living conditions. In the future he wants to expand his house and construct it with brick, as currently it is made of sheet metal. With the help of the loan and his family Misael says that they will be able to achieve this.

loan.use: to install electricity in his home.

loan.name: Mari Luz

texts.es: MARI LUZ La seora Mari, es socia del banco comunal Las Divinas. Distrito Calleria, Departamento De Ucayali, tiene 46 aos de edad, sola, tres hijos. Cuenta con un taller de carpintera, tiene a su cargo un maestro carpintero, un ayudante que elaboran los muebles que lo venden en blanco. Con su nuevo prstamo de S/.1,700.00 nuevos soles comprara: 6 tablones de madera cedro, 10 tablones de madera capirona, 2 kilos de cola, 2 kilos de clavos. Para mantener esta carpintera a flote tiene que salir a buscar sus clientes, y tambin se encarga personalmente en la compra de las maderas y la supervisin del armado de los mueble, el taller lo tiene en el interior de su casa por el espacio que necesita para este trabajo. Espera que Manuela Ramos sigua apoyando a las mujeres trabajadoras, que tiene que mantener a su familia solas.
texts.en:
Mari is a member of the "Las Divinas" community bank which is located in Calleria district, in Ucayali department. She is 46 years old, single, and has three children.
Mari owns a carpentry workshop and has a master carpenter and an assistant working for her who make the furniture which they sell.
Mari will use her new loan for 1,700 soles to buy 6 planks of cedar wood, 10 planks of capirona wood (capirona is a native hardwood tree), 2 kilos of glue and 2 kilos of nails.
In order to keep her carpentry workshop running, Mari has to go out and find customers. She also personally takes care of buying the wood and supervising the assembly of the pieces of furniture. Her workshop is located inside her home owing to the space that is needed for this work.
Mari hopes that Manuela Ramos will continue supporting hard-working women who have to provide for their families on their own.

loan.use: to buy wood

loan.name: Nely Aracely

texts.es: La seora Nely tiene 45 aos de edad, vive en el Barrio Victoria y se dedica a la venta de golosinas y refrescos, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitacion, ahi prepara ricas golosinas como ser tacos, enchiladas, tajaditas de platano con carne, carne asada, burritas de carne, pollo frito etc. Nely vive con su esposo y una hija, Nely es una mujer muy seria, no sonre mucho pero si tiene carcter amigable y se caracteriza por ser responsable en sus compromisos, la meta de Nely es tener un negocio grande en el futuro, en el cual pueda atender mas personas comodamente. el credito lo utilizara para la compra de alimentos para la preparacion de las golosinas. Nely tambien vende sopa de mondongo los domingos, dicha sopa es un plato tipico que es muy sabroso.
texts.en: Nely is 45 years old. She lives in the Barrio Victoria neighborhood and sells snacks and soft drinks. She runs her business out of her house, where she prepares delicious treats like tacos, enchiladas, sliced plantain with meat, grilled beef, fried chicken, etc. Nely lives with her husband and a daughter. She is a serious woman and doesn't smile much, but she is friendly and is known to be very responsible. Her goal is to have a large business in the future where she can serve more customers comfortably. She will use the loan to buy ingredients for preparing food. Nely also sells tripe soup on Sundays. It's a typical dish of the region and is very delicious.

loan.use: to purchase tortillas, beef, pork, chicken, condiments, cabbage, onions, limes, oil, lard, beans, rice, plantains, cheese, butter, eggs, soft drinks, and disposable plates and cups.

loan.name: Bani Dolores

texts.es: La seora Bani es socia del banco comunal "Mujeres Triunfadoras" del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 34 aos de edad, est casada y tiene dos hijos. Son dos aos que viene trabajando con los prstamos de Manuela Ramos, tiene un restaurante situado en un lugar bien transitado y tiene clientela casi todo el da. Con su nuevo prstamo de S/. 1,500.00 nuevos soles mandar a refaccionar el lavatorio que se encuentra malogrado, comprar 2 tazones grandes, 3 ollas medianas, 2 fuentes, 1 sartn grande, 1 secador de arroz, 1 pelador de papas, 1 docena de jarritas de vidrio, 1 docena de vasos de vidrio. Este negocio le ha dado muchas satisfacciones para su familia, cada vez tiene ms ingresos y seguir implementandolo con otras cosas que anhacen falta. Agradece a Manuela Ramos por la ayuda econmica, ahora su hermana trabaja en su negocio, ya est generando empleo.
texts.en:
Bani is a member of the 'Mujeres Triunfadoras' community bank which is located in Calleria district, in Ucayali department. She is 34 years old, married, and has two children. She has been working with Manuela Ramos loans for two years. She has a restaurant in a busy area and has customers almost all day long.
Bani will use her new loan for 1,500 soles to have a sink, which is currently out of order, fixed. She will also buy 2 large bowls, 3 medium-sized pans, 2 dishes, 1 large skillet, 1 rice dryer, 1 potato peeler, 1 dozen glass pitchers and 1 dozen glasses.
This business has given Bani's family a lot of satisfaction. She is making more and more income and will continue equipping her business with other things that she needs.
Bani is grateful to Manuela Ramos for the financial help. Her sister now also works in her business. She is creating employment.

loan.use: to buy pans, pitchers, dishes, etc.

loan.name: Rosalbina

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Rosalbina; ella tiene 58 aos de edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia sigue en su negocio de tienda de abarrotes,ella vende arroz,azucar,leche y fideos,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,ella por medio de este engocio sigue sacando adelante a su familia,al socia quiere ampliar y seguir mejorando el negocio de tienda de abarrotes .La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar productos para la tienda de abarrotes como arroz,azucar,leche,fideos y galletas.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Rosalbina is 58 years old and married with two children. She has a grocery store where she sells rice, sugar, milk, and noodles. She works there from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. This business is helping her give her family a better life. She would like to expand and improve the business, and is requesting a loan to buy products for her shop like rice, sugar, milk, noodles, and cookies.
Rosalbina is very happy about this loan and promises to pay it off in full.

loan.use: to buy products for her shop like rice, sugar, milk, noodles, and cookies.

loan.name: Maria De La Luz

texts.es: La seora Maria de la Luz tiene 36 aos de edad, vive en la aldea el Pedrerito la Montaa y se dedica a la venta de golosinas desde hace 4 aos, sus ventas las realiza en las fincas meloneras y caeras de la zona sur del pais, sus clientes son empleados de estas fincas y sus ventas son al credito, Maria todos los dias se levanta muy temprano para preparar sus golosinas para luego salir a venderlas. Maria vive con su esposo y sus tres hijos, tiene casa propia. la meta de Maria es remodelar su casa para darles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Maria de la Luz is 36 years old and lives in the village of El Pedrerito la Montaa. She has been selling food for four years. She makes her sales on the melon and sugar plantations in the south of the country. Her customers are people who work on these farms and she makes her sales on credit. Every day, Maria gets up very early to prepare her food so that she can then go out and sell it.
Mara lives with her husband and three children. She owns her own home.
Mara's goal is to remodel her house so that she can provide her children with a better quality of life.

loan.use: to buy beef, pork, chicken, gas, tortillas, vegetables, oil, butter, seasonings, bread, eggs, beans, rice, soft drinks, and disposable plates and cups

loan.name: Ayudanos Seor 4 & 5 Group

texts.es:
Cita es una D. los miembros del Grupo Aydanos Seor 4 & 5 y est ubicado en L. ciudad turstica D. L. Romana, en unas D. las comunidades D. ms escasos recursos, rodeadas por campos D. Caa D. azcar tambin llamados Batey, donD. L. mayora D. los habitantes son inmigrantes haitianos, que vinieron a L. Repblica Dominicana, con L. finalidad D. mejorar su calidad D. vida.
Cita esta muy emocionada por recibir su tercer prstamo con Esperanza Internacional, desD. que el programa llego a su comunidad, decidi formar parte del grupo con L. finalidad D. mejorar su negocio, el cual estaba falto D. capital. ElL. opera un puesto D. ventas D. frutas, verduras, vegetales y pollo, desD. su pequea vivienda, L. cual comparte con su pareja, ya que parte D. su familia e hijos viven en Hait.
Piensa invertir este prstamo en L. compra D. vegetales, varios quintales D. pollo y frutas. ElL. les venD. a sus vecinos, ya que por lo regular, los bayetes son comunidades aisladas y lejanas a L. ciudad. Cita desea ahorrar sus ganancias, ya que sus planes futuro es poder tener su propia casa y un mejor negocio.
texts.en: Cita is one of the members of the "Aydanos Seor 4 & 5" (Help Us Lord 4 & 5) Group, which is located in the tourist city of L. Romana, in one of the poorest communities, surrounded by sugar cane fields. These communities are also called batey and most of their inhabitants are Haitian immigrants who came to the Dominican Republic with the aim of improving their quality of life. Cita is very excited to be receiving her third loan from Esperanza Internacional. When the program arrived in her community, she decided to join the group with the aim of improving her business which was lacking capital. She runs a fruit, vegetable and chicken stall from her small home which she shares with her partner, as some of her family and children live in Haiti. Cita plans to invest this loan in buying vegetables, several 100lb lots of chicken and fruit. She sells her products to her neightors as 'bateyes' (sugar worker towns) are isolated communities which are far from the city. Cita would like to save her profits as her future plans are to own her own home and to have a better business.

loan.use: to buy fruit, vegetables, chicken, groceries, etc.

loan.name: Maria Concepcion

texts.es:
Maria Concepcin tiene 48 aos de edad, vive con su esposo, y cinco hijos. Ella se dedica a diversas actividades productivas. Maria Concepcin vende pescado 2 veces por semana, otros das vende pan o verduras, o trabaja en sus cultivos de maz y frijol.
Maria Concepcin ha pedido un prstamo a Fundacin Campo para la compra de abono, pesticidas y herbicidas para su cultivo. Con la ayuda del prstamo ella podr comprar todo lo necesario para el cultivo, y seguir con las ventas de los otros productos. Sin el prstamo Maria Concepcin no podra seguir vendiendo los otros productos, ya que tendria que invertir su dinero en sus cultivos. El prstamo tambien le permitir el comprar todos los insumos al mismo tiempo, recibiendo mejor precio, y ahorrando dinero en transporte.
En un futuro Maria Concepcin quisiera poder cultivar sin tener que estar endeudada, y poder darle a sus hijos menores un estudio ms all del bachillerato. Maria Concepcin desea lo mejor para sus hijos por lo que trabaja fuertemente todos los das.
texts.en:
Maria Concepcin is 48 years old and lives with her husband and five children. She works in a number of different business activities. Twice a week she sells fish and on other days she sells bread or vegetables, or works on her corn and bean crops.
Maria Concepcin has requested a loan from Fundacin Campo to buy manure, pesticides and herbicides for her crops. With the help of this loan, she will be able to buy everything she needs for her crops and also continue selling her other products. Without the loan, Maria Concepcin wouldn't be able to continue selling her other products as she would have to invest her money in her crops. This loan will also allow her to buy all her supplies at the same time which means she will receive a better price and will save money on transport.
In the future, Maria Concepcin would like to be able to grow her crops without having to be in debt. She would also like to be able to provide her children with an education beyond the high school level. She wants the best for her children and she works hard every day in order to achieve it.

loan.use: to buy manure, pesticides and herbicides for her corn and bean crops

loan.name: Maria Mireya

texts.es: La seora Mara es socia del banco comunal Mujeres Trabajadoras del Distrito Calleria, Departamento D. Ucayali, tiene 49 aos D. edad, est casada y tiene cuatro hijos. Es una D. las fundadoras D. este banco comunal y se dedica a la venta D. productos D. belleza por catlogo, tiene tres hijos a su cargo, dos D. ellos estudian en un instituto y con el negocio que tiene ayuda a su esposo con algunos gastos. Con su nuevo prstamo D. S/. 1,800.00 nuevos soles comprar: 3 colonias para despus del bao, 2 talcos para pies, 2 labiales, 3 polvos para cara, 2 cremas para mano, 2 esmalte D. uas, 2 set D. sombras, 4 desodorantes. Su esposo trabaja como relacionista pblico D. un alcalD. D. un casero, tiene una pequea emisora D. radio que es con lo que mantiene a su familia. Estn muy agradecidos por todo lo que han logrado hasta el momento.
texts.en:
Mara is a member of the "Mujeres Trabajadoras" community bank which is located in Calleria district, in Ucayali department. She is 49 years old, married, and has four children.
Mara is one of the founders of this community bank. Her business is selling beauty products through a catalog. She is responsible for three children, two of whom are in school. Through her business, she is able to help her husband with some expenses.
With this new loan for 1,800 soles, Mara will buy 3 lots of after-bath cologne, 2 lots of foot powder, 2 lipsticks, 3 lots of face powder, 2 lots of hand cream, 2 lots of nail polish, 2 sets of eye shadow and 4 deodorants.
Mara's husband works as a public relations officer for the mayor of a small village. He also has a small radio station which is how he supports his family. The couple are grateful for everything that they have achieved up to now.

loan.use: to buy perfumes and cosmetics

loan.name: Mara Rosa

texts.es:
Mara tiene 42 aos, es casada y tiene dos hijos, viven en Salcedo que est ubicado a 20 minuto de Latacunga en la Sierra Centro de Ecuador. Se describe como una persona buena, tranquila, amistosa y cariosa.
Trabaja con su familia en la compra, crianza y venta de animales como son los cerdos, pollos. Es el primer crdito solicitado a Fodemi, el mismo que va a ser invertido en la compra de cras de cerdos, pollos para su engorde y posteriormente para su venta que generar buenos ingresos lo cual le ayudar a que sus hijos acaben de estudiar y mejoraran su calidad de vida.
Su sueo principal es que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Mara is 42 years old and married with two children. They live in Salcedo, which is located 20 minutes from Latacunga in the Central Sierra area of Ecuador. She is described as a good person, quiet, friendly and caring.
She works with her family in the buying, breeding and selling of animals such as pigs and chickens.
This is her first loan with Fodemi. She will use the loan to buy piglets to fatten, along with some chickens for later resale. The income she earns will help her children finish their education and improve their quality of life.
Her biggest dream is that her children become professionals.

loan.use: to buy piglets to fatten, along with some chickens for later resale

loan.name: Lady Mirian

texts.es: Mirian, como la llaman sus amistades, es socia del Banco Comunal San Miguel del distrito Ilave en el departamento Puno y tiene 23 aos. Vive con su conviviente y sus 2 hijos en una casa un poco alejado de su negocio. Est con Manuela Ramos desde hace cuatro aos y tiene su negocio desde hace tres aos. Vende dulces en su puesto (tienda). Fue idea propia de establecerlo y no cuenta con apoyo de nadie. Esta actividad le demanda casi todo el da pero cuenta con la compaa de sus hijos. El mayor est en el primer ao de primaria y cada da despus del colegio va a ver y acompaar a su mam en el negocio. El nuevo prstamo de S./ 2,500.00 lo va a invertir en compra de galosinas y la compra de una moto para movilizarse mejor. Su sueo es tener un negocio ms grande y una casa propia. Lo que le gusta de Manuela Ramos es que los prstamos se pagan rpido. Adems le gustan las reuniones donde se relaja y arpende de los temas educativos.
texts.en:
Mirian, as her friends call her, is a member of San Miguel Communal Bank in the Ilave district of the department of Puno. She is 23 years old and lives with her partner and two children in a house located somewhat far away from her business.
She has been with the Manuel Ramos movement for four years and has had her business for three years. She sell sweets in her store. It was her own idea to start the business and she has no help from anybody. The business is demanding almost all day, but she has the company of her children. The oldest is in the first year of elementary school, and every day after school he goes to the store to see his mother and keep her company.
She is going to use the current loan of 2,500 PEN to buy sweets and a motorcycle so she can get around more easily.
Her dream is to have a bigger business and her own house.
What she likes about Manuela Ramos is that the loans are paid off quickly. She also likes the meetings, where she relaxes and learns from the educational topics.

loan.use: to buy sweets and a motorcycle.

loan.name: Saby Carol

texts.es: Saby es socia del Banco Comunal Semillas del Futuro de la ciudad Puno en el departamento Puno. Vive con su pareja y tienen dos hijos de 9 y 11 aos. Saby confecciona y vende artculos deportivos en una tienda que es suya y que mantiene desde hace ms de cinco aos. Aprendi a confeccionar gracias a sus padres y tambin ha heredado las ganas de hacer negocio, como nos cuenta. Inici este negocio por idea propia y slo con la ayuda de su pareja. l se encarga de hacer las costuras y estampados, mientras que ella hace las compras y atiende a los clientes. Iniciaron su negocio con un capital de S./ 500,00. Saby lleva un ao con Manuela Ramos y su nuevo prstamos ser de S./ 1,000.00. dinero que invertir en la compra de telas para los polos y pelotas que confeccionar. Su meta es tener una mquina bordadora para facilitar el trabajo y ahorrar tiempo. Lo que le gusta de Manuela Ramos son las capacitaciones y las reuniones donde las mujeres comparten ancdotas.
texts.en:
Saby is a member of the communal bank Semillas del Future (Seeds of the Future) located in the city of Puno in the department of Puno. She lives with her partner and they have two children 9 and 11 years old.
Savy makes and sells sporting goods in her own store that she has had for more than 5 years. She learned this occupation from her parents and also she inherited from them the desire to be in business, so she tells us.
It was her own idea to begin this business only with the help of her husband. He is in charge of sewing and the patterns, while she takes care of purchases and assisting clients.
They began their business with 500 soles. Saby has been working with Manuela Ramos for a year and her new loan will be 1,000 soles that she will use in the purchase of materials needed to produce sport shirts and balls.
Her goal is to have an overlapping embroidery sewing machine to make their work easier and to save time. What she likes about Manuela Ramos is the training and the meetings where women get together and share their stories.

loan.use: to buy material at wholesale prices

loan.name: Sobeida Yanori

texts.es: la sra. Sobeida tiene 22 aos de edad, es soltera pero se a quedado sola ya que su familia vive en los Estados Unidos, Sobeida se dedica a la venta de refrescos en varios tamaos, tiene varios aos de estar atendiendo a sus clientes y este negocio es herencia de familia, Sobeida quiere seguir invirtiendo en el, ya que dichos refrescos se venden rapido y se les obtiene una buena ganancia, sus clientes son sus vecinos y amigos que tiene en diferentes caserios cercanos. el credito lo utilizara para la compra de mas refrescos, desea tener mas inventario ya que el carro repartidor solo pasa una vez por semana y en ocasiones a fines de semana se esta quedando sin producto. el sueo de Sobeida es casarse y tener hijos para formar una bonita familia.
texts.en: Sra. Sobeida, 22, is single and lives alone. Her family lives in the United States. Sobeida has a retail business, selling various sizes of soft drinks. She learned the business from her parents and has operated it for several years. She wants to continue investing in the business because soft drinks sell quickly and she earns a good living from the revenues. Her customers live in surrounding neighborhoods. Sobeida will use the loan to buy more soft drinks. She wants to keep more inventory because her distributor only passes through the area once a week and she sometimes runs out of product at weekends. Sobeida's greatest hope is to marry, have children and shape a happy home.

loan.use: to buy soft drinks for her retail business.

loan.name: Gladys

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Gladys; ella tiene 33 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; La socia sigue en su negocio de venta de frutas,ella vende manzanas,naranjas,uvas,platanos entre otras frutas y tambien se dedica a vender coronas de caridad,por medio de estos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar frutas como amanzanas,naranjas y platanos al por mayor y para comprar coronas de caridad.al por mayor.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Our member, Sra. Gladys, is 33 years old. She is partnered and has 3 children. She operates a fruit business, selling apples, oranges, grapes, bananas and other fruits. She also sells "coronas de caridad" [an offering of penitence or hope]. The business is her means of supporting her children. She is applying for a loan that she will use to buy wholesale supplies of fruits and "coronas de caridad".
Sra. Gladys is grateful for the loan and committed to repaying it in the agreed-upon time.

loan.use: to buy merchandise for her retail business.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to build a concrete side wall to finish the work he is doing in phases.

loan.name: Alejandrina Rosa

texts.es: Alejandrina es socia del Banco Comunal San Miguel del distrito de Ilave, en el departamento Puno. Tiene 45 aos, es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos entre 10 y 22 aos. Estudi enfermera y trabaja todo el da en un hospital. Adems tiene un negocio de venta de productos de belleza que lleva desde hace unos cuatro aos y que estableci copn el primer prstamo de Manuela Ramos. Inici con un capital de S./ 500,00 y gracias a su clientela fija y puntual su negocio est bien establecido. Cuenta que tiene algunos productos en stock, as que cuando alguien tiene la necesidad de un desodorante por ejemplo ella puede atenderlo de inmediato. Con ste prstamo de S./ 2,500 comprar nuevos perfumes y joyas. Dos de sus cuatro hijos ya estn estudiando una carera en la universidad y su sueo es que todos sus hijos sean profesionales. Adems tiene la meta de tener una tienda propia. Lo que le gusta de Manuela Ramos son las reuniones donde una se relaja y se olvide de los problemas.
texts.en:
Alejandrina is a member of the Communal Bank San Miguel in the district de Ilave in the department of Puno. She is 45 years old, living together with a partner, and has 4 children between 10 and 22 years old.
She studied to be a nurse and works all day in a hospital. Also, she has had a business of selling beauty products for some four years and had her first loan through the communal bank of Manuela Ramos.
She began with the amount of 500 soles and thanks to her customers she was able to make her payments on time and so when someone had the need for deodorant, for example, she could immediately assist them. With this loan of 2,500 soles she will buy new perfume and jewelry.
Two of her four children are studying for a career at the university and her dream is that all her children become professionals. She also has a goal of having her own store. What she likes about Manuela Ramos is the meetings where she can relax and forget her problems.

loan.use: to buy perfume and jewelry for resale

loan.name: Rosalva Virginia

texts.es: La seora Rosalva es socia del banco comunal Las Divinas del Distrito de Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 27 aos de edad, est casada y tiene 2 hijos. Lleva cuatro aos trabajando con los prstamos de Manuela Ramos y se dedica a la venta de comida, esta actividad la realiza los das domingos, su casa se encuentra cerca de un coliseo de gallos donde ese da las personas acuden masivamente a este local. Con su nuevo prstamo S/. 2,500.00 nuevos soles comprar: 2 juegos de mesas, un ciento de platos descartables, 1 ciento de tenedores descartables, 2 taper de plstico. Mas delante de acuerdo a las necesidades que tenga en su negocio pedir otro prstamo para seguir implementando su negoico. Su esposo es mecnico y es el que mantiene su hogar, ella de su parte est trabajando con la venta de sus comidas para generar sus propios ingresos y apoyar con otros gastos.
texts.en: Sra. Rosalva, 27, is a member of the Las Divinas del Distrito de Calleria in the Peruvian "departamento" of Ucayali. She is married and has 2 children. She has supported her business with loans from Manuela Ramos for the past four years. She operates a food-sales business on Sundays. Her house is near a place where many people gather on Sundays for local cockfights. She will use this loan, for S/.2,500 new soles to buy: 2 tables, disposable plates and cutlery and other supplies that she needs for the business. Sra. Rosalva plans to ask for other loans later that she will use to support the business. Her husband is a mechanic and provides for everyday family expenses. Her business provides her with an income of her own and pays for other family expenses.

loan.use: to buy tables and other supplies for her food-sales business.

loan.name: Ninoska Yamaly

texts.es: Ninoska tiene 21 aos de edad, esta soltera y vive con sus padres, Ninoska se dedica a la venta de productos de consumo diario, tiene una pulperia ubicada en su casa de habitacion, desea invertir el credito en compra de abarroteria para surtir su negocio, ya que sus clientes le estan pidiendo que tenga mas variedad de productos, y ella no quiere que sus clientes opten por comprar en otro lugar. el sueno de Ninoska es graduarse de la Universidad.
texts.en:
Ninoska is 21 years old, single, and lives with her parents. She has a business selling everyday consumer products from a store in her home.

Ninoska wants to invest this loan in the purchase of groceries to restock her business since her customers are requesting that she carry a wider variety of products. She does not want her customers to go shopping elsewhere.

Ninoskas dream is to graduate from university.

loan.use: to buy merchandise for her store.

loan.name: Titomangba Group

texts.fr: Le groupe TITOMANGBA est compos de deux personnes qui sont des cohabitants. C'est la quatrime fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALID, afin d'lever le niveau de leur activit. La reprsentante du groupe, du nom de Swanoud Suzanne est celle qui a la main leve sur la photo. Swanoud Suzanne est ge de 55 ans et vit au Bnin.Swanoud Suzanne est une veuve qui a cinq enfants tous scolariss dont trois restent encore sa charge. Swanoud Suzanne n'a jamais t l'cole.Pour subvenir ses besoins et ceux de ses enfants, Swanoud Suzanne mne comme activit depuis dix ans la vente des pommes en fruit.A ct de cette activit,Swanoud Suzanne prpare du frommage base du soja. Swanoud Suzanne sapprovisionne en pomme et en soja dans l'un des marchs du Bnin. Dans la qute de la satisfaction de sa clientle et pour accrotre son chiffre daffaires et son revenu Swanoud Suzanne sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe TITOMANGBA,un quatrime crdit. Les crdits reus antrieurement ont t bien rembourss.
texts.en:
The group TITOMANGBA is comprised of two persons who live together. This is the fourth time this group has requested financial aid from ALID to boost their business. The group's representative, by the name of Swanoud Suzanne, is the one in the photo with her hand raised. She is 55 years old and lives in Benin. She is a widow who has five children, all in school. Three of the children are still in her care.
Swanoud Suzanne has never been to school. To support herself and her children, she has been running a business for ten years selling apples. Aside from this business, she makes tofu. Her supplies of apples and soybeans come from one of the markets of Benin.
Seeking to satisfy her customers and increasing her sales and her revenues, Swanoud Suzanne and her group TITOMANGBA are requesting a fourth loan. The previously obtained loans have indeed been repaid.

loan.use: to buy fruit and soybeans

loan.name: Ftima Del Socorro

texts.es: Fatima sigue laborando en zona franca, el cual ejerce como operaria, lugar donde lleva varios aos trabajando, su hijo sigue creciendo, el cual le ha venido dando educacion sola, pero hoy en dia, tiene un compaero el cual labora como tornero, y esta en mejores condiciones moral y economica. Ella tiene su cuarto aparte, y que ha venido mejorando sola, con los prestamo que Afodenic ha dado. Lo que quiere hacer, con este nuevo financiamiento, es levantar las divisiones de concreto, ya que es de madera, aunque lo tiene bien adornado, pero ya esta muy viejo y se le hace incomodo ya. Es por tal razon comprara materiales de construccion en bloque, hierro, cemento, y hacer la mejora en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Fatima continues to work in the free trade zone where she has a job as an operator. She has worked in this place for several years. As her son continues to grow, Fatima is the only one providing for his education. Today she has a companion who works as a lathe operator. He provides both moral and financial support.

Fatima has a separate room, which was the only improvement that was undertaken with the loan given to her by AFODENIC. With this new loan, she will put up concrete room dividers since the current ones are made of wood. Although they are well-decorated, the dividers are very old and make her house uncomfortable. For this reason, she will buy construction materials such as blocks, iron, and cement, so that she can make this improvement to her home.

loan.use: to buy construction materials for putting up concrete room dividers.

loan.name: Jose Isabel

texts.es: Don Jose tiene 41 aos de edad, esta casado y es padre de tres hijos, Jose se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva para caballero, trabaja duro para sacar adelante a su familia, su esposa se dedica a la venta de carne de res, juntos trabajan para darles una mejor calidad de vida a sus tres hijos. Jose utilizara el credito para comprar ropa y asi tener mas variedad, Jose se esta preparando para la epoca navidea, asi podra tener mayores ventas y mas ganancias. la meta de Jose y su esposa es que sus hijos sean buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
Don Jose is 41 years old, married, and the father of three children. He sells new clothing for men. Jose works hard in order for his family to get ahead. His wife sells beef. They work together to provide a better quality of life for their three children.

Jose will use this loan to buy clothing so that he will have more variety. He is preparing for the Christmas season so that he will have better sales and more revenue. The goal of Jose and his wife is to see their children become successful professionals.

loan.use: to buy jeans, shirts, and undergarments.

loan.name: Augustina

texts.es:
Augustina es socia del Banco Comunal Semillas del Futuro de la ciudad Puno en el departamento Puno y tiene 57 aos. Es soltera y tiene a 5 hijos entre 15 y 32 aos. Dos de ellos cuentan con educacin superior. Durante la semana atiene un pequeo puesto de frutas en un mercado de la zona, mientras que durante el fin de semana vende sus productos en la puerta de su casa. Este negocio lo tiene desde hace unos 30 aos, nos cuenta que antes se dedicaba a vender zapatos. Siempre ha trabajado sla, su ex esposo no le apoy. Su meta es ayudar a sus hijos y con el nuevo prstamo de S./ 1,000.00 va a comprar frutas al por mayor como papayas, pepinos y pltano. Este negocio es sacrificado, adems que necesita de su fuerza para trasladar los paquetes de frutas desde su almacn a su puesto, por eso espera poder tener otro negocio pronto.
Lleva 7 aos con Manuela Ramos y le gusta el prstamo rpido y el compaerismo que experimenta en su Banco Comunal.
texts.en:
Augustina is a member of the Communal Bank Semillas del Futuro (Seeds of the Future) which is located in the city of Puno, Department of Puno. She is single and has five children between the ages of 15 and 32. Two of her children received their higher education.

During the week, Augustina manages a small fruit stand at the local market. On the weekends, she sells her products from the doorstep of her house. She has been in this business for about 30 years. Augustina says that she previously sold shoes. She always works alone since her ex-husband does not support her. Her goal is to help her children and with this new loan of 1000 PEN, she will buy fruits in bulk such as papayas, pepino melons, and bananas. This business requires sacrifice plus she needs her strength to carry packages of fruit from her warehouse to her stand. She hopes to start another business soon.

Augustina has been with Manuela Ramos for seven years and enjoys the quick approval of the loans and the camaraderie that she experiences through her Communal Bank.

loan.use: to buy papayas, pepino melons, and bananas.

loan.name: Norma

texts.es: La seora Norma es socia del banco comunal Mujeres Triunfadoras del Distrito Calleria, Departamento D. Ucayali, tiene 65 aos, est casada y tiene seis hijos mayores. Lleva cinco aos trabajando con Manuela Ramos, tiene una pequea bodega en su casa, todo el dinero que obtiene del prstamo lo invierte en su bodega, en su casa solo vive con su esposo que est convaleciente y tiene que atenderlo. Con su nuevo prstamo D. S/. 1,000.00 nuevos soles comprar: caja D. leche chica, 1/2 caja D. aceite D. medio litro, docena, 1 paquete D. sal, 5 casilleros D. huevo, 2 paquetes D. papel higinico, saco D. azcar, 5 paquetes D. fosforo, 1 paquete D. fideos para sopa. Son los productos que mas salida tiene y no tienen que faltar en su bodega, entre la bodega y los quehaceres D. su hogar se pasa casi todo el da y tambin en atender a su esposo. Su bodega no le da mucho dinero pero le sirve para poder cumplir con sus pagos a Manuela Ramos, es una socia muy fiel a Manuela Ramos porque es con la nica institucin que trabaja.
texts.en:
Sra. Norma is a member of the Communal Bank Mujeres Triunfadoras (Triumphant Women) which is in the District of Calleria, Department of Ucayali. She is 65 years old, married, and has six grown children.

Norma has been working with Manuela Ramos for five years. She has a small store in her home. All of the money she has obtained from her loans has been invested into her business. She lives at home with her husband, who is a convalescent and requires attention.

With this new loan of 1000 PEN, Normal will buy a half case of small milk containers, a half case of oil in half-liter containers, one packet of salt, five cases of eggs, two packets of toilet paper, a half sack of sugar, five packets of matches, and one packet of soup noodles. These are the products that sell more quickly, so she lacks these items in her store. Managing her store and performing the household chores take up most of Normas time and she also attends to her husband.

Her store does not generate much money, but it does allow her to complete her loan payments to Manuela Ramos. Norma is a loyal member of Manuela Ramos because it is the only organization in which she participates.

loan.use: to buy merchandise for her store.

loan.name: Elza

texts.en:
Elza is 45 years old. She lives in the village of Sairkhe in the Imereti Region of West Georgia. She is married and lives with her children: two sons (24 and 21 years old) and a daughter, 22 years old. Elza's sons are construction workers. They work on construction in their and nearby villages. Elza's daughter is a pharmacist. She works in a village pharmacy.
Elza leads the agricultural business of the family. They own a milk cow and sell dairy products in Zestaponi (a nearby town). Also the family has a small poultry farm. They sell eggs at the same market. Along with the above, Elza sells grapes, harvested from 200 family-owned vines. The total average monthly income of the family is 400 Laris (approximately $240).
Elza requested a loan to purchase a milk cow. She will increase her sales of dairy products and thus raise the income of the family. The family members will be able to purchase needed household goods and improve their living conditions.

loan.use: to purchase a milk cow

loan.name: Soso

texts.en:
Soso is from the village of Tskhratskaro. He is 65 years old, married, and lives with his wife Tsiuri. Soso works in the Zestaphoni Railway Company. Along with his regular job, he has an agricultural business. His family has a small dairy farm three cows, four calves and a bull. Soso and Tsiuri sell dairy products to the retailers in the Zestaphoni open market.
Along with the dairy farm, the family has two pigs. Their piglets are sold at the same market. The total average monthly income of the family is 800 Laris (approximately $480).
Soso requested credit for purchasing two additional milk cows. Soso and Tsiuri will produce more dairy products and increase sales. It will positively impact the income of the family. They will be able to spend more on satisfying the family's daily needs and improve their living conditions.

loan.use: to purchase milk cows

loan.name: Reyna Milagro

texts.es: Reyna tiene 21 aos de edad, esta soltera y se ha dedicado en los ltimos aos a la venta de productos varios, como ser hilos, madejas, cintas, toallas y otros productos de uso personal, abre su negocio de lunes a domingo y sus clientes son los vecinos de la comunidad y amigos que le visitan. el credito lo utilizara para comprar mas mercaderia y asi surtir un poco el negocio, ya que hay productos que ella no tiene en existencia y sus clientes le piden dichos productos. Reyna tiene el sueo de que en un futuro su negocio sea grande y ser una buena administradora. nos comento que se siente muy feliz ya que a su corta edad ya tiene negocio propio.
texts.en:
Reyna is 21 years old, single, and has spent the past few years selling different products such as thread, yarn, ribbons, towels, and other products for personal use. Her business is open from Monday through Sunday. Her customers consist of neighbors from the community and friends who visit her.

This loan will be used to buy merchandise so that she can restock her business a little more. There are products that she does not have but her customers are requesting.

In the future, Reyna dreams of having a large business and being a good manager. She says that she is pleased to have her own business at such a young age.

loan.use: to buy thread, yarn, towels, decorative ribbons, shampoos, hair conditioners, deodorants, lotions, crmes, baby oil, and soft drinks.

loan.name: Vladimer

texts.en:
Vladimer is 46 years old, single, and lives with his parents. He is a farmer from the Zovreti, Imereti Region in the western part of the country.
Vladimer leads his family's agricultural business. Specifically, they have three milk cows. Vladimer and his mother produce cheese and other dairy products and sell them in Zestaponi, a nearby town. Along with the dairy farm the family owns a 2000-square-meter vineyard. They sell grapes in the Zestaponi market as well. The total average monthly income of the family is 450 Laris, including the pensions of Vladimers parents.
Vladimer is requesting a loan, which he will use to purchase a milk cow. The family will be able to sell more dairy products and raise their income. Part of the increase in income will be reinvested in farming activities and the rest will be used for improving the family's living conditions

loan.use: to purchase a milk cow.

loan.name: Mayra Veronica

texts.es:
Mayra tiene 28 aos es casada y tiene tres hijos, vive con su familia en Machachi que est ubicado a 1 hora de Latacunga en la Sierra Centro del Ecuador. Mayra es una persona tranquila con el caracter fuerte para salir adelante con su esposo e hijos.
Mayra trabaja con su esposo en la crianza y venta de cerdos. Es el primer crdito que solicita a Fodemi el cual va a ser invertido en la compra de una chancha madre para hacerla reproducir, gracias a esta actividad podr incrementar la cantidad de cerdos y despus de criarlos podr tener ms ventas y mejores ingresos para ella y su familia.
Su sueo es llegar a tener 100 cerdos para convertirse en una proveedora a las empresas importantes.
texts.en:
Mayra is 28 years old, married, and has three children. She lives with her family in Machachi, which is located an hour away from Latacunga in the central mountains of Ecuador. Mayra is a peaceful individual with strong character. She wants to move forward along with her husband and children.

Mayra and her husband work together raising and selling pigs. This is the first loan she has requested from FODEMI and she will invest in the purchase of a sow for breeding. Thanks to her business, she will be able to increase the number of pigs she has on hand. Once they are grown, she wants to generate more sales and improve the income for herself and her family.

Mayras dream is to have 100 pigs so that she can become a supplier to large businesses.

loan.use: to buy a sow for breeding.

loan.name: Akaki

texts.en:
Akaki is from the village of Martkopi in East Georgia. He lives in the village with his parents. He is a worker. Along with his main job, he helps his parents with the family dairy farm. They have four milk cows and sell milk and yogurt in Tbilisi (the capital of the country). The total average monthly income of the family is 400 Laris (approximately $240).
Akaki requested a loan to purchase calves. The family has enough space in the cattle-shed. They will grow the calves during winter and sell them for a profit in the spring. The family will get additional income. Akaki plans to save it for purchasing a milk cow, in order to expand the dairy farm and increase the income of the family.

loan.use: to purchase calves

loan.name: Reyna Isabel

texts.es:
La seora Reyna, tiene 34 aos de edad, vive en la aldea La Esperanza. Vive en una comunidad rural del departamento de Colon. Ella es casada, pero su esposo vive fuera del pas. Tienen 2 hijos de 16 y 11 aos de edad, ambos estn estudiando.
Su actividad econmica que le genera ingresos es una pequea pulpera donde vende productos de la canasta bsica (manteca, cereal, arroz, sopas, ktchup, papel higinico, salsas, frijoles, sal, etc.).
Comenz su negocio desde el ao 2008, trabajando muy duro desde las 6 de la maana hasta las 7 de la noche lo que le a permitido incrementar su inventario de L.4,000.00 a L.16,000.00 acompaado de la buena administracin.
Ahora con ODEF va solucionar las dificultades de financiamiento que a tenido, por tanto solicito un prstamo de L.5,000.00 para surtir mas su negocio en productos de la canasta bsica o alimenticios y cumplir con su gran sueo de llegar a ser un mini sper.
Los ingresos que obtiene los destina para cubrir las necesidades bsicas del hogar, principalmente la alimentacin y educacin de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Reyna, age 34, lives in the La Esperanza village. This is a rural community in the Colon department. She is married, but her husband lives outside of the country. She has two children, ages 16 and 11. Both of the children are in school.
The financial activity that generates income for her is a small grocery store. That is where she sells everyday food products (butter, grains, rice, soup, ketchup, toilet paper, salsas, beans, and salt, etc.).
She has had her business since 2008, working hard from 6am to 7pm, which has allowed her to increase her investment from 4,000 lempira to 16,000 lempira. This increase has also been the result of good administration.
When she started her business she had difficulties because of the lack of financing to invest in the business.
She has currently requested a loan from ODEF for 5,000 lempira (HNL), which will allow her to solve some financing difficulties. She intends to use the loan to increase her inventory and hopes to use her earnings to establish a mini-supermarket.
She intends to use the income that she gets to cover the basic household necessities, primarily food and her childrens education.

loan.use: to stock her business with everyday food products.

loan.name: Gocha

texts.en:
Gocha is 45 years old. He lives in the village of Sartichala, East Georgia with his family: his wife Irma, two sons (22 and 21 years old), a daughter (16 years old) and his 71-year-old father. Gocha's daughter goes to school. His younger son is a student and the elder son works in a hospital, as a doctor's assistant.
Gocha and Irma lead the agricultural business of the family. Gocha's father helps them. The family has three milk cows and six calves. They produce cheese and sell it locally to dairy product retailers. Along with the dairy the family has small pig farm with two pigs. They sell piglets on local market. Also Gocha grows maize on a family-owned plot of land. Part of the harvested corn is sold to the wholesalers and the rest is used for feeding their livestock. The total average monthly income of the family is 1000 Laris (approximately $600).
With this loan Gocha plans to purchase 10 calves. He will raise them and sell the grown calves in the spring for a much higher price. This will bring additional income to the family. Gocha plans to reinvest part of the increased income in the family farm and the other part will be used for financing the children's education.

loan.use: to purchase calves

loan.name: Confianza En Dios 1, 2 & 3 Group

texts.es:
Mireya es una madre dedicada, tiene 2 hijos que viven con ella y su esposo (tambin el padre de ambos), ella se ha esforzado realizando diferentes trabajos para ayudar a su esposo con las necesidades de su hogar y poder llevar ingresos extra, quiere lograr unos de sus retos mas difciles, el cual es tener una casa propia.
Mireya es una de los miembros del Grupo Confianza en Dios 1, 2 & 3 y est ubicado en la ciudad turstica de La Romana, en unas de las comunidades de ms escasos recursos, rodeadas por campos de Caa de azcar tambin llamados Batey, donde la mayora de los habitantes son inmigrantes haitianos, que vinieron a la Repblica Dominicana, con la finalidad de mejorar su calidad de vida.
Mireya esta muy emocionada por recibir su primer prstamo con Esperanza Internacional, y lo invertir en la compra de diferentes tipos de ropas, para hombres y mujeres, tambin desea invertir en la compra de pescado, el cual vende frito. Ella lleva varios aos dedicada a la venta de ropas, y con este prstamo tiene los planes de hacer crecer su negocio y llevarlo a otro nivel, para as utilizar sus ganancias para realizar cambios en su vida, ahorrar, comprar su casa, ayudar mas a su familia.
texts.en:
Mireya is a dedicated mother who has two children who live with her and her husband (the children's father). She has done different jobs to help her husband with the household necessities and bring in extra income. She wants to accomplish one of her most difficult goals, to have her own home.
Mireya is one of the members of the Confianza en Dios 1, 2, & 3 group, which is located in the resort city of La Romana, in one of the communities without many resources. It is surrounded by sugarcane fields, also called Batey. A majority of the inhabitants are Haitian immigrants who came to the Dominican Republic to improve their quality of life.
Mireya is very excited to receive her first loan with Esperanza International. She will invest the loan in the purchase of different types of clothing for women and men. She also wants to purchase fish, which she will sell fried. She has worked selling clothing for many years, and with this loan, she plans to grow her business and bring it to another level. She can then use her earnings to make changes in her life, including saving money, purchasing a house, and helping her family.

loan.use: to purchase clothing and fish.

loan.name: Aquilina

texts.es: La seora es socia del banco comunal Las Triunfadoras del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 48 aos de edad, es madre soltera y tiene 4 hijos, solo dos de ellos estn a su cargo. Lleva recin 4 ciclos trabajando con los prstamos de Manuela Ramos, se dedica a la venta de comida en una de las calles del centro d la ciudad y lo hace desde el medio da, est cerca de una universidad y los alumnos son sus principales clientes. Con su nuevo prstamo de S/. 1,200.00 nuevos soles comprar: 3 fuentes de fierro enlozado, 2 cucharas para servir, 5 manteles de tela, 1 balde refresquero, 3 banquitos de madera, 1.5 metros de mantel de plstico. A pesar que tiene que salir de su casa para trabajar lo hace con mucho gusto porque es parte de su trabajo y le gusta lo que hace, gracias a ese negocio mantiene y educa a sus dos hijos, no cuenta con ayuda de nadie. Por ahora se siente tranquila porque cuenta con la ayuda de Manuela Ramos para ir implementando su negocio y mejorar cada dia.
texts.en:
Aquilina is a member of the Las Triunfadoras comunal bank in the Calleria district, Ucayali department. She is 48 years old and single. She has four children; only two of them are under her care. She has been working with loans from Manuela Ramos for four cycles. She sells food on one of the streets in the center of the city. She starts at noon. It is close to a university, and the students are her primary customers.
She will use her new loan for 1,200 soles to buy three kettles, two serving spoons, five cloth tablecloths, one ice chest, three small wooden stools, and a plastic tablecloth measuring 1.5 meters.
In spite of the fact that she has to leave her house to work, she does so with great pleasure. This is part of her work, and she likes what she does. Thanks to this business she supports and educates her two children. She does not have help from anyone.
At the present time she feels at peace because she has the help from Manuela Ramos to continue carrying out her business and improving every day.

loan.use: to buy kettles and other cooking utensils.

loan.name: Carlos Alfredo

texts.es:
Carlos tiene 20 aos de edad, es soltero y vive con su mam.
l se dedica desde los 14 aos de edad a trabajar con las estructuras metlicas, y este le genera buenos ingresos para su familia.
l compra los diferentes materiales que necesita para realizar su actividad, en una ferretera de la ciudad, para llegar ah debe recorrer 8 kilmetros, luego tiene que pasar por una colina para ir a preparar lo que sus clientes le solicitan y luego regresar con el producto ya hecho donde sus clientes, l no tiene medio de transporte por lo que debe pagar para que trasladen las estructuras metlicas.
Carlos solicita un prstamo para, complementar una construccin de un muro de retencin de la propiedad de su mam, ella ya inicio la construccin pero le falta material para concluirlo y Carlos desea ayudarle a ella. De esta manera evitara la erosin de tierra en su propiedad hacia el camino vecinal, al mismo tiempo mejorara su vivienda y el lugar donde realiza su trabajo, esto le ayudara para satisfacer la demanda de su trabajo.
texts.en:
Carlos is 20 years old, single, and he lives with his mother.
Since the age of 14 he has been working as a blacksmith and this generates a good income for his family.
He busy different materials that he needs for his work from a hardware store in the city. To get there he must travel 8 kilometers and he also has to pass over a hill to start making the items that his clients. He later delivers the product already made to his clients. He doesn't have a mode of transportation which is why he needs to hire someone to transport these metallic structures.
Carlos requests a loan to complete the construction of a retaining wall for his mother's property. She already started the construction but she still needs materials to finish it, and Carlos wants to help her. This way they will stop the erosion of the grounds of the property facing the neighbors. At the same time he wants to improve his house and the place where he works. This will help him satisfy the demand for his work.

loan.use: to finish building a retaining wall for his home.

loan.name: Leyda Luz

texts.es: La seora Leyda es socia del banco comunal Las Almendras del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 40 aos de edad, est casada y no tiene hijos. Se dedica a la venta de frutas de la regin y lo hace en el patio de su casa, de forma ambulatoria, se levanta muy temprano para ir al mercado a comprar frutas frescas para poner a la venta. Con su nuevo prstamo de S/. 1,000.00 nuevos soles comprar: 1 ciento de naranja, ciento de cocona, de ciento de limones, 3 pias, 4 bandejitas de plsticos, 1 mesa de madera. La fruta tiene que comparLa en pocas cantidades porque si no se pueden malograr y eso significa prdida. Como no tiene nios quiere ocupar su tiempo en algo til que le genere algunos ingresos, su esposo es docente y es el que mantiene el hogar.
texts.en:
Seora Leyda is a member of Las Almendras Community Bank in Calleria district in the department of Ucayali. She is 40 years old, married, and doesnt have any children.
Leyda earns her living by selling local fruit from a stall situated on the patio of her house. She gets up very early to go to the market to buy fresh fruit which she then sells.
With this new loan of S/.1,000 she will buy 100 oranges, 50 coconuts, 25 lemons, 3 pineapples, 4 lots of plastic bags, and a wooden table. She has to buy the fruit in small quantities otherwise they would turn bad and she would lose money.
As Leyda doesnt have any children, she wants to do something useful with her time which will earn her some money. Her husband is a teacher and he pays for household expenses.

loan.use: to buy fruit

loan.name: Exaltacion Group

texts.es:
La A.C. EXALTACIN iniciar su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Cascada, est compuesta por siete integrantes y est dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la seora Hilda. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociacin comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: Elaboracin de mantas, venta de hilos, venta de quesos, venta de refrescos, venta de mantas y lana, tienda de barrio, venta de verduras.
La seora Hilda, indica que es primera ves que trabaja con Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitacin de una promotora. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de quesos que viene trabajando hace un ao atrs.
El crdito que ahora sacar es para aumentar su capital (compra de queso), que comprara de Viacha y posteriormente lo vender en las ferias. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella es casada y tiene tres hijos.
En la fotografia acompaa al grupo la prima de la seora Juana, ella se esconde de cmaras.
texts.en:
The community bank "Exaltacin" started its first loan cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Cascade Center. It is made up of seven members and led by a board, which is headed by Hilda. The businesses that the members of the community bank own are different, including: making blankets, yarn sales, cheese sales, beverage sales, blanket and wool sales, a neighborhood store, and vegetable sales.
Hilda says that this is her first time working with Pro Mujer. She was invited to join the group by a promoter. She has a business selling cheeses that she started a year ago.
She will use this loan to increase her capital and purchase cheese. She purchases cheese in Viacha and then sells it at markets. This work allows her to generate income to support her family, since she is married and has three children.
In the photograph, Juana's cousin is also shown. She hides from cameras.

loan.use: to purchase cheese.

loan.name: Neftali

texts.es:
Neftali tiene 47 aos, es casado y tiene un hijo. Neftali comenzo a dedicarse a la agricultura desde los 12 aos. Dicho oficio lo aprendio de su padre, quien con el afan de ensearle a su hijo a trabajar no le permitio a Neftali ir a la escuela. Por ende Neftali tiene 35 aos de experiencia como agricultor, y le gusta lo que l hace.
Neftali ha pedido un prstamo a Fundacion Campo para 10,500 metros cuadrados de tierra, donde el cultiva maiz y frijol. Debido a que la zona donde vive y cultiva Neftali es muy rural, el transporte es muy escaso y a Neftali se le dificulta llevar todos los insumos a su cultivo. Con la ayuda del prstamo Neftali ha podido comprar todo los insumos que necesita de una sola ves, adquiriendolos a mejor precio y ahorrandose el costo de tener que hacer varios viajes.
En un futuro Neftali quisiera poder sembrar una mayor cantidad, y poder obtener mayores cosechas para la venta.
texts.en:
Neftali is 47 years old, married, and he has a son. Neftali started out in agriculture when he was 12 years old. He learned the business from his father, who, for the sake of teaching his son to work, did not let Neftali go to school. Therefore Neftali has 35 years' experience as an agriculturist, and he loves what he does.
Neftali has requested a loan from Fundacion Campo (Kiva Field Partner) to invest in the 10500 square meters of land where he cultivates corn and beans. The region where Neftali lives is very rural so transportation is very limited. Neftali's challenge is transporting all of the materials to his land. With the help of this loan Neftali has been able to purchase all of the materials he needs all at once, obtaining a better price and saving on the cost of making several trips.
