In the future Neftali would like to plant in larger quantities to increase his harvests for sale.

loan.use: to purchase fertilizers for the 10,500 square meters of farmland where he cultivates corn and beans.

loan.name: Enith Adelaida

texts.es: La seora Enith es socia del banco comunal las Almendras del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 65 aos de edad y 11 hijos, solo 1 a su cargo, los dems ya tiene sus respectivas familias. Tiene una vulcanizadora que funciona en su casa y su hijo es el que trabaja ah, lleva tres aos trabajando con Manuela Ramos y est contenta porque hizo nuevas amistades y se siente contenta por trabajar con ese banco comunal. Con su nuevo prstamo de S/. 1,000.00 nuevos soles comprara: una plancha de parches, un litro de pegamento, 1 docena de cmaras, cuando las cmaras estn muy picadas es mejor que sus clientes compren cmara nueva y para darles facilidad va vender las cmaras. Saca sus prstamos de acuerdo a las necesidades que tiene porque no quiere quedar mal con Manuela Ramos porque quiere seguir trabajando por mucho tiempo ms.
texts.en:
Seora Enith is a member of Las Almendras Community Bank in Calleria district in the department of Ucayali. She is 65 years old and has eleven children. Only one of them still lives at home; the others have families of their own.
Enith runs a repair shop out of her home. Her son also works there. She has worked with Kiva partner, Manuela Ramos, for three years and is very happy because she made new friends through this relationship with her community bank.
With this new loan of S/. 1,000 she will buy a box of patches, a litre of glue, a dozen inner tubes (when inner tubes are really perished, its better if her customers buy new ones, and she wants to have them available to sell).
Enith knows that she has to fulfill certain requirements regarding the loan if she wants to borrow money in the future from Manuela Ramos.

loan.use: to buy patches, glue etc.

loan.name: Huaramaya Group

texts.es:
La A.C. HUARAMAYA iniciar su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Cascada, est compuesta por seis integrantes y est dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la seora Rogelia. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociacin comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: crianza de ganado vacuno, venta de leche, confeccin de polleras y mantas.
La seora Rogelia, indica que es primera ves que trabaja con Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitacin de una promotora. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de leche que viene trabajando hace diez y seis ao atrs, ya que es un negocio familiar.
El crdito que ahora sacar es para aumentar su capital mediante la compra de una vaca lechera, que comprara de la feria de Villa Remedios y posteriormente lo procesado lo vender a las empresas lecheras. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella es casada y tiene cuatro hijos.
texts.en:
The Huramaya Communal Bank will begin its first cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Centro Cascada. It is made up of six members and it is managed by a board of directors headed by Rogelia. The communal bank's members have different businesses, among which we have the following: raising cattle, selling milk, and making skirts and blankets.
Rogelia tells that this is the first time she has worked with Pro Mujer, having joined on the invitation of a promoter. Currently, she has a business selling milk that she has had for 16 years now since it's a family business.
The loan she is now taking out is to increase her capital through the purchase of a milk cow. She will buy it at the Villa Remedios market and after processing it she will sell it to a dairy company. This kind of work allows her to generate the resources to support her family as much as possible, as she is married and has four children.

loan.use: to buy a milk cow

loan.name: Angela

texts.es: La seora ngela es socia del banco comunal Las Almendras del Distrito Calleria, Departamento D. Ucayali, tiene 66 aos D. edad, est casada y tiene cinco hijos mayores D. edad y con familia cada uno D. ellos. Lleva 10 aos trabajando con los prstamos D. Manuela Ramos y se dedica a la confeccin y arreglo D. prendas D. vestir, que lo realiza mayormente en horas D. la tarD.. Con su nuevo prstamo D. S/. 2,000.00 nuevos soles comprar: una maquina nueva semi industrial elctrica, porque la que tiene es una maquina antigua a pedal. El trabajo que realiza es en su casa, se da tiempo para estar con su esposo que es el que le ayuda en la casa porque l se encarga D. la cocina mientras tenga costura que realizar. Va seguir trabajando con Manuela Ramos porque capacitan en temas muy importantes adems D. los talleres para las socias que quieran aprender cosas nuevas.
texts.en:
Angela is a member of the Las Almendras Communal Bank from the Calleria District of the department of Ucayali. She is 66 years old, married, and has five adult children, each of whom has their own family.
She has been working with loans from Manuela Ramos for 10 years. Her profession is the sewing and repair of clothing, which she mainly does during the afternoon.
With her new loan of 2,000 nuevos soles she will buy a new semi-industrial electric sewing machine because the one she has is an old pedal sewing machine.
She does her work at home and she gives herself time to be with her husband, who is the one who helps around the house by taking care of the cooking when she has sewing to do.
She is going to continue to work with Manuela Ramos because they offer training on very important issues in addition to the workshops they offer for members who want to learn new things.

loan.use: to buy a sewing machine

loan.name: Olga Luz

texts.es: La seora Olga es socia del banco comunal Las almendras del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 35 aos de edad, tres hijos, est casada y su esposo se desempea como operador de maquinas pesadas. Lleva trabajando cuatro aos con los prstamos de Manuela Ramos y se dedica a la venta de mercaderas de uso personal, todo lo que son ropas, zapatos y carteras, negocio que viene realizando desde hace tiempo y que le da buenas ganancias. Con su nuevo prstamo de S/. 2,000.00 nuevos soles comprara: 6 pares de zapatos, 1 docena de camisas, 2 docenas de polos, 1 docena de pantalones, docena de shores. No es mucho lo que invierte solo trabaja con pedidos para traer la mercadera y entregarla inmediatamente, su hija mayor le ayuda a colocar/vender su mercadera. Est muy contenta por que ahora tiene un negocio propio y se pone horarios para salir a realizar su cobranza y para atender su hogar.
texts.en:
Olga is a member of the communal bank Las Almendras in the district of Calleria, in the department of Ucayali. She is 35 years old, has three children, and is married. Her husband works as a heavy machine operator.
She has been getting loans through Manuela Ramos for four years and works selling personal goods such as all types of clothing, shoes and handbags. Her business has been growing over time and is at present making good profits.
With this new loan of 2,000 soles she will buy 6 pairs of shoes, 1 dozen blouses, 2 dozen sport shirts, 1 dozen pair of pants, and 6 pairs of shorts.
It is not much of a risk because she buys and then immediately delivers, since she only takes orders. Her oldest daughter helps her find and sell the merchandise.
She is very happy because now she has her own business and she sets her hours working her own schedule and is able to take care of her house.

loan.use: to buy clothing and shoes for resale

loan.name: Sandra Marina

texts.es: La Joven Sandra Marina tiene 34 aos de edad y se dedica a la venta de ropa usada clasificada, tiene varios aos de dedicarse a este tipo de negocio, sus ventas las realiza de Lunes a sbado, tiene clientes fijos que viven en colonias aledaas a su casa de habitacion, as mismo sale a vender sus productos a otras colonias, vende la ropa al crdito y cobra en quince das, cerca de su casa hay un supermercado y las empleadas tambien son clientes de ella, el credito lo utilizara para comprar fardo de ropa usada clasificada, nos cuenta que gracias a los ingresos que ha recibido de su negocio a podido mantener a una sobrina que se la dejaron desde que tenia 6 meses y actualmente tiene 3 aos de edad. Tiene muchos planes para su negocio.
texts.en: Sandra Marina is a young woman of 34 who sells used clothing. She has been in this business for several years. She makes her sales from Monday to Saturday and has regular customers who live in surrounding neighborhoods. She also goes out to some neighborhoods to sell her products. She sells her clothes on credit and collects payment every two weeks. There is a supermarket near her home and the employees there are also customers of hers. Sandra will use her loan to buy a bundle of sorted used clothing. She tells us that, thanks to the income that she has made from her business, she has been able to support a niece who was left with her when she was six months old and is now three years old. Sandra has many plans for her business.

loan.use: to buy a bundle of sorted used clothing

loan.name: Mirian Rosmilda

texts.es: La seora Miriam es socia del banco comunal Las Almendras del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 31 aos de edad, est casada y tiene dos hijos. Son tres aos que viene integrando la familia de Manuela Ramos y se dedica a todo lo que son Manualidades, confecciona artculos de segn la temporada. Con su nuevo prstamo de S/. 2,200.00 nuevos soles comprara: 6 pliegos de cartulinas, plumones delgados, plumones gruesos , 2 frascos de silicona, de escarcha de diferentes colores materiales para realizar los adornos para la temporada de navidad y lo est preparando con mucho tiempo de anticipacin y tenga una buena cantidad de adornos en la fecha prevista. Su trabajo lo realiza en su casa y le encanta, es muy creativa, tiene un buen gusto para hacer los adornos, su esposo es ingeniero forestal y siempre sale a trabajar a otra ciudad. Agradece a Manuela Ramos por permitirle trabajar con los crditos que dan a las mujeres emprendedoras.
texts.en:
Miriam is a member of the "Las Almendras" community bank which is located in Calleria district, in Ucayali department. She is 31 years old, married, and has two children.
Miriam has been a member of the Manuela Ramos family for three years. Her business is making all kinds of handicrafts. She makes items according to the season.
Miriam will use her new loan for 2,200 soles to buy 6 sheets of card, thin-tipped markers, thick-tipped markers, 2 jars of silicone, different colored glitter and other materials for making ornaments for the Christmas season. She is preparing her items well in advance so that she has a good quantity of ornaments ready when the Christmas season comes.
Miriam works from home and she loves it. She is very creative and has good taste for making ornaments. Her husband is a forestry engineer and is always going to another city to work.
Miriam is grateful to Manuela Ramos for allowing her to work with the loans that they give entrepreneurial women.

loan.use: to buy materials (card, markers, silicone, etc.)

loan.name: Yuliney

texts.es: Yuliney de 20 aos vive con su cnyuge y su hijo de 9 meses de edad al suroccidente de la Ciudad, all tiene una papelera, vende servicios de telecomunicaciones va celular e internet, adems de ofrecer los servicios de juegos de play Station y la venta de dulces. Yuliney se dedic desde nia al estudio y logr terminar una carrera tcnica pero no encontr un empleo para desempearse, por eso hace dos aos, se dedic al negocio actual, del que hoy genera ingresos y apoya a su familia. Su sueo ms adelante es lograr que su hijo obtenga una educacin, donde pueda desempearse exitosamente y por eso se esmera en trabajar al lado de su cnyuge da a da. Mientras esto ocurre rota sus inventarios cada 14 das y tiene una rentabilidad promedia, no menor del 41,49%, desde la que planea incrementar su capital. En la actualidad est aplicando a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que recibe de la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprar dulcera, un computador, 1 televisor, un juego de play Station, y tendr xito porque se acerca una poca de gran demanda en la cual programa darse a conocer an ms en el sector.
texts.en: Yuliney is 20 years old and she lives with her common-law partner and her 9-month old child. They live in the south-west of the city and she has there an school supply store from where she also sells telecommunications services via cellular phone and internet, Play Station gaming services, and sweets sales. Yuliney attended school since she was a girl and she managed to accomplish a technical career but she could not find employment. This is why two year ago she started up her current business. Today she generates and income and she is able to support her family. Her dream for the future is to send her son to school where he will apply himself successfully, which is the reason why she strives to work alongside her partner day after day. While this develops she has an inventory rotation of 14 days and she has an average profit of no less than 41.49%, which she hopes to increase with her capital. Currently she is investing her Kiva loan, the first loan she receives from Fundacion Mario Santo Domingo (Kiva Field Partner). She will purchase sweets, a computer, a television, and a Play Station game. She will be successful because the season when she sees the greatest demand approaches and she will strive to make herself even better known in her sector.

loan.use: to purchase sweets, a computer, a television, and a Play Station game.

loan.name: Santos Celis

texts.es:
Don Santos tiene 59 aos de edad, vive con su compaera de vida y sus tres hijos.
l vive en una zona rural y su nica diversin es el trabajo, es una persona luchadora y humilde que desde nio se dedico al trabajo de campo, por eso tiene una amplia experiencia y le satisface lo que hace, trabaja 8 horas diarias con el nico fin de tener lo necesario.
Don Santos compra los fertilizantes en una tienda situada a un kilmetro de su casa, el los compra y paga por que se los lleven a su casa, una vez los fertilizantes estn en su casa l los carga en la espalda durante 1.5 kilmetros hasta llegar al terreno donde tiene sus cultivos, ya que para llegar ah no hay acceso de vehculos.
l solicita un prstamo para invertirlo en la compra de fertilizantes, para terminar de cosechar la milpa que tiene sembrada desde mayo, que por el motivo de las lluvias abundantes se esta perdiendo. Con esto l podr comprar todos los insumos de una sola vez y podr recuperar la cosecha que se le esta perdiendo.
De esta manera podr tener el alimento para su familia, ya que l ha pasado momentos difciles y no quiere que sus hijos pasen por lo mismo. Santos desea que sus hijos estn sanos y que por medio de su trabajo logre educarlos y que se puedan ganar la vida de otra forma, ya con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Santos is 59 years old and he lives with is life partner and their three children.
He lives in a rural region and his only diversion is his work. He is a fighter and he is humble. Since he was a boy he has dedicated himself to working the land, which is when he has ample experience and he enjoys what he does. He works 8 hours per day and his only goal is to acquire what they need.
Santos buys the fertilizers from a store located one kilometer from his house. He buys and pays for the delivery all the way to his house. Once the fertilizers are at home with him he carries them on his back for 1.5 kilometers to his farmland. To get to his land there is no vehicle access.
He requests a loan to invest in the purchase of fertilizers to conclude his corn plantation that he started out in the month of May. Given the abundant rains the harvest is failing. with this he will be able to purchase all of the materials at once and he will be able to recover the harvest which is currently failing.
This way he will be able to secure nutrition for his family. He is experiencing difficult times and he doesn't want for his children to go through the same. Santos wants for his children to be healthy, and through his work, to send them to school in order to earn a living in a different way, by using their education.

loan.use: to purchase fertilizers for his cultivation.

loan.name: Edgardo Jose

texts.es: Con su credikiva anterior Edgardo compr cueros sintticos goma, suelas y herrajes,con ello le fue muy bien y ahora planea adquirir una mquina industrial para fabricar bolsos, y materias primas para producir sandalias, zapatos, bolsos y correas. "Estoy muy agradecido por la ayuda prestada que tnto beneficio ha traido a mi negocio y a mi familia. "
texts.en:
With his previous loan, Edgardo bought synthetic leather, rubber, soles, and buckles. He has done very well and now plans to acquire an industrial machine for making handbags and materials for producing sandals, shoes, purses, and belts.

Edgardo says, I am very grateful for the help that has been given to me because it has benefited my business and my family.

loan.use: to acquire an industrial machine for making handbags and materials for producing sandals, shoes, purses, and belts.

loan.name: Lourdes Narcisa

texts.es:
Lourdes de 51 aos, es una mujer independiente, responsable en su trabajo y ms que todo respetuosa. Es una empleada domestica, su actividad la realiza sola.
La dificultad de ella es cuando le da gripe, los dueos de casa no le permiten trabajar a ella cuando tiene gripe. Tiene una relacin de unin libre, su conjugue es taxista.
Ella solicita el prstamo para el mejoramiento de su vivienda. Su sueo es terminar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Lourdes, age 51, is an independent woman who is responsible in her work. Above all, she is respectful. She works as a housekeeper, a job that she performs alone.

One difficulty that she must deal with is whenever she comes down with the flu. Her employer will not allow her to work when she is sick. Lourdes is in a common-law relationship and her partner is a taxi driver.

She is requesting a home improvement loan. Her dream is to finish the construction of her house.

loan.use: to buy paint, cement, and sand for completing the construction of her house.

loan.name: Mapit Sartasiani Group

texts.es:
La A.C. MAPIT SARTASIANI iniciar el decimoquinto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Germn Busch. Est compuesta por ocho integrantes dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la seora Bertha. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociacin comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de comida, comercio de frutas, novedades (guantes y ganchos), artesana en ropa, comercio de fruta, tienda de barrio, venta de coca, aceitera.
La seora Bertha indica que hace dos aos que integra una asociacin comunal en Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitacin de su sobrina. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio venta de artculos de ocasin (venta por temporada) que viene trabajando hace cuarenta aos atrs, aprendiendo el mismo de su madre.
El crdito que sacar ahora es para el aumento de capital (compra de artculos varios) los que compra de Oruro y posteriormente lo en las ferias de forma ambulante (sin puesto fijo). Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella vive en unin libre y tiene dos hijos.
Cuando se le consulta qu le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las reuniones y el prstamo.
En la fotografia no se encuentra la seora Isabel, ya que tuvo consulta mdica.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank Mapit Sartasiani is starting its fifteenth loan cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Germn Busch Community Center. The group has eight members who are led by a Board of Directors headed by Sra. Bertha. The members of this Communal Bank engage in different businesses in order to get ahead such as selling food, selling fruit, selling novelties (gloves and hair pins), producing handmade clothing, managing a neighborhood store, selling coca leaves, and producing cooking oil.

Sra. Bertha says that she joined a Communal Bank with Pro Mujer two years ago after receiving a invitation from her niece. She currently has a business selling seasonal merchandise. Bertha has been in this business for 40 years and learned the trade from her mother.

The loan she is receiving now will be used to increase her capital for buying different goods in Oruro that she will eventually sell at the fairs as a traveling merchant (she does not have a fixed location). Working in this manner allows her to generate income to support her family as much as possible. Bertha is in a common-law relationship and has two children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, Bertha says she enjoys the meetings and the loans. In the photograph, Sra. Isabel is not present because she had an appointment at the health clinic.

loan.use: to buy seasonal goods for resale.

loan.name: Clara Del Rocio

texts.es:
Clara de 34 aos, vive en una zona periurbana llamada el fortn. Su negocio es una tienda-papeleria ubicada en la parte delantera de su vivienda.
Empez con esta actividad haces 12 aos, ya que tena poco capital ella pensaba ponerse otra clase de negocio, en la actualidad le va bien con este negocio.
Su trabajo lo realiza sola, el horario es de lunes a domingo, desde las 8:00am hasta las 20:00pm. No tiene dificultad, es soltera. Tienen 2 hijos uno de 3 y el otro de 7 aos, estudian en escuelas pblicas.
Solicita este prstamo para la compra de mercadera como: papeleria, bebidas, aceites etc. Su sueo es mejorar su casa de cemento y agrandar muchos ms su negocio y poder ayudar a sus hijos para que terminen sus estudios.
texts.en:
Clara is 34 years old and lives in a periurban district called Fortn. Her business consists of a general store and stationery shop located in the front part of her home. She started this business 12 years ago. With the little bit of capital that she had, Clara added another type of business and is now doing well. She works alone Monday through Sunday, from 8am to 8pm. Clara has not had any difficulties. She is single and has two children, a three-year-old and a seven-year-old who attends public school.

Clara is requesting a loan to buy merchandise such as stationery, beverages, oil, and other products. Her dream is to make improvements to her cement house and expand her business as much as possible so that she can help her children finish their studies.

loan.use: to buy stationery, beverages, oil, and other products.

loan.name: Maricela Mercedes

texts.es: Maricela de 34 aos, una mujer que a pesar de ser soltera trata de seguir adelante con sus hijos. Su negocio es la venta de algodn, empez esta actividad haces muchos aos con su hermano, iniciaron este negocio con un capital bajo. Actualmente le va yendo muy bien gracias a la voluntad de Dios. Ella solicita este prstamo para el incremento de su negocio y para la compra de ingredientes como: azcar y colorantes vegetal. El sueo de ella es hacer su casa de cemento y poder sacar a sus hijos adelante.
texts.en:
Maricela is 34 years old and she is a woman who strives to move forward with her children despite being single. Her business is the sale of cotton candy. She started out her business several years ago when she and her brother decided to start it out with a small capital fund.
It is going very well for her thanks to the Will of God. She requests this loan to increase her business and to purchase ingredients, such as: sugar and vegetable food colors.
Her dream is to rebuild her house with cement and to move her children forward.

loan.use: to purchase ingredients such as sugar and vegetable food coloring.

loan.name: Miriam Del Carmen

texts.es: Miriam de 51 aos, una mujer trabajadora que tiene aspiraciones de crecimiento de negocio. Su negocio es una librera en la cual la ha surtido con varias mercaderas como: bebidas, galletas, etc. El horario de ella es de lunes a domingo, desde las 8:00am hasta las 20:00pm. Ella solicita el prstamo para invertir en el negocio y para la compra de mercadera como: bebidas, galletas, entre otros. Su sueo es que su negocio incremente y donde pueda brindar empleo a los necesitados.
texts.en:
Miriam, age 51, is a hardworking woman who has aspirations of growing her business. She has a store that is stocked with different merchandise such as beverages, cookies, and other products. Her work schedule is Monday through Sunday, from 8am to 8pm.

Miriam is requesting a loan to invest in her business. She will buy merchandise such as beverages, cookies, and other items. Her dream is to increase her business so that she can provide jobs to those who need them.

loan.use: to buy beverages, cookies, and other products.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy spare parts for his taxi.

loan.name: Ana Ruth

texts.es:
La seora Ruth, es madre soltera, vive en casa propiedad de un hermano, convive con sus tres hijos: una hija de 19 aos que estudia un tcnico en agente de ventas, otra hija de 16 aos que estudia bachillerato y un hijo de 12 aos que cursa el quinto grado de bsica.
Por tradicin familiar se dedican a comprar y engordar cerdos, estos los compran pequeos, los engordan y los venden cuando ya son grandes. Esta actividad la realiza en un espacio del terreno de su casa. Debido a las exigencias econmicas de su familia y a que el negocio de engordar cerdos no le permitan obtener ingresos constantes, desde hace 8 aos se dedica a la venta de joyas enchapadas y productos cosmticos por catalogo. Esta actividad le ha permitido a su familia que viva dignamente y puedan realizar sus estudios.
Para alimentar los cerdos, ella compra suero que sale de la leche de vaca cuando se procesa, esta la compra todos los das a procesadores de lcteos de la zona y el concentrado lo compra en la ciudad que esta ubicada a 25 kilmetros de su vivienda. Para transprtalos hace uso de los autobuses, luego paga un pick up para que le lleve el producto hasta su casa de donde la deja el bus. Las compras las realiza una vez a la semana, debido a que si compra mucho el producto pierde su calidad. Las joyas y los cosmticos tambin los compra en la ciudad.
Ella solicita un prstamo para continuar engordando a 20 cerdos que tienen mes y medio de edad, alimentar 2 cerdas parinderas y un berraco (macho) y la otra parte para comprar productos nuevos para la venta. Esto le permitir a ruth continuar con sus actividades para generar ingresos para el sostenimiento de su familia y no deje de trabajar con las joyas y los cosmticos que son los que le generan un flujo constante a su familia.
Ruth desea a mediano plazo apoyar a sus hijos para que estudien una carrera tcnica y se puedan defender por su propia cuenta, tambin quiere construir instalaciones adecuadas para el engorde de los cerdos, y construir una casa en la propiedad que le heredo su mam, ya que actualmente vive en casa de un hermano.
texts.en:
Ruth is a single mother and she lives in a house that is owned by her brother. She lives with her three children: a 19-year old daughter who is studying commerce at a technical school; another daughter, 16 years old who is in high school. And a 12-year old son who is in grade five.
As a family tradition they buy and raise pigs. They are purchased as piglets and they raise them and sell them when they have grown. She carries out her business from a space on the property. Given the financial needs of her family and the fact that raising pigs does not permit them to have a steady source of income, she decided 8 years ago to sell fashion jewelry and cosmetics by catalogue. This business has permitted her family to live in a dignified manner and to send her children to school.
To feed her pigs, she buys the whey that is produced from cow milk when it is processed. And she busy every day from the daily producers in the region. The concentrated feed is purchased from the city, located 25 kilometers from her home. She uses public buses to transport her products and then she pays a pick-up truck service to take her products all the way to her house from the bus stop. She makes her purchases once per week, especially because the product loses its quality if bought in larger volumes. The jewelry and the cosmetics are also purchased in the city.
She requests a loan to keep raising her 20 pigs, which are 6 weeks old. She needs to feed her sows and a boar. The other part of her loan will be used to purchase more and new products for resale. This will let Ruth continue with her income generating activities for the support of her family. She must not stop selling the jewelry and cosmetics because they generate the constant source of income for the family.
Ruth wishes to support her children in the medium-long term, so that they will earn a technical career and so that they will earn themselves a living. She also wants to build adequate barns for the pigs and to build a house that was inherited to her by her mother. She currently lives in her brother's house.

loan.use: to purchase feed to raise her pigs, and to purchase fashion jewelry and cosmetics.

loan.name: Urania Marbelly

texts.es: Doa Urania, sigue con las ventas de ropa, zapatos, cosmeticos, en donde ha venido creciendo gracias a sus ventas altas, el cual lo ha logrado, saliendo mas a la calle y ofreciendo sus productos, asi como ha tenido mas encargo de ropa.anque sea cansado, pero es dinero seguro. Su esposo lo apoya, ya que tambien trabaja en el comercio, ayuda a sus tres hijos para que tengan una mejor educacion y lograr que culminen en un futuro, ya que ellos no tuvieron la oportunidad de terminar sus estudios. Con este nuevo financiamiento, invertira en compra de ropa, zapatos, cosmeticos por docena y seis pares de chinela, el cual son demandado por sus clientes, por ser de aprecios accesibles, a su cliente de trayectorias les da al credito dando la confianza asi como la instutucion le da la oportunidad de crecer en inventario, mediante los prestamos.
texts.en:
Urania continues to sell clothing, shoes, and cosmetics and her business has increased thanks to heightened sales. She has accomplished this by setting out to the streets selling her products more often. This is how she has received more orders for clothing. It is tiring work but it is a steady income. Her husband supports her and he also works in commerce. He helps their three children to have a better education and to achieve a future for themselves. They did not have the opportunity to finish their schooling.
This new loan will be invested in the purchase of clothing, shoes, and cosmetics by the dozens and six pairs of slippers. These have been in demand by her clients given the accessible prices. She offers her customers the ability to pay on credit, as does the institution to help her increase her inventory, through loans.

loan.use: to purchase clothing, shoes, and cosmetics.

loan.name: Amistad Group

texts.es: La Sr. MARTHA, de 43 aos de edad casada, tiene 1 hijo menor de edad de 8 aos en etapa escolar, mujer luchadora por salir adelante frente a los obstculos que se les presenta en la vida, socia de la alcanca comunal Amistad, se le renov el prstamo ya que en el ciclo anterior demostr puntualidad y responsabilidad en sus pagos. Ella se dedica en la actualidad a la confeccin bordados de fustanes de vestimentas tpicas de la regin. El Prstamo solicit para la compra de materiales como hilos, telas, etc. En el futuro desea exportar los fustanes al exterior del pas donde, as incrementar ms sus ingresos y poder brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. La clienta est ubicada parte superior de la fotografa vestida con ropa color celeste.
texts.en:
Martha is 43 year old. She is married and has an 8 year old child who attends school. She is a woman who struggles to get ahead in the face of lifes obstacles. She is a member of the Amistad Communal Bank. She is renewing her loan as she demonstrated punctuality and responsibility in her last loan cycle.
Currently, she embroiders petticoats for the traditional clothing worn in the region. She is requesting the loan to purchase thread, fabric, and other materials. In the future, she wishes to export the petticoats out of the country. This will enable her to increase her income and provide a better quality of life for her family.
The client is located in the upper part of the photograph, dressed in sky blue clothing.

loan.use: purchase thread and fabric for the embroidery of petticaots.

loan.name: Properidad2 Group

texts.es:
L. A.C. PROPERIDAD2 iniciar su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Cascada, est compuesta por siete integrantes y est dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por L. seora Basilia. Los negocios que las integrantes D. L. asociacin comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta D. comida, venta D. lega, macram, venta D. plsticos, venta D. carne D. ovejas y D. cordero.
L. seora Basilia, indica que es primera ves que trabaja con Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitacin D. una promotora. En L. actualidad elL. tiene un negocio D. venta D. comida que viene trabajando hace tres ao atrs.
El crdito que ahora sacar es para aumentar su capital (compra D. aceite, arroz, fideo, etc.) que adquirir D. L. feria D. L. Ceja y posteriormente elaborado lo vender en las ferias. Esta forma D. trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues elL. es soltera y tiene dos hijos.
Cuando se le consulta qu le gusta D. Pro Mujer, elL. responD. que le gusta L. capacitacin D. crdito y salud.
texts.en:
The Prosperidad2 Communal Bank will begin its first loan cycle with Pro Mujer. The group is part the Cascada Center and is comprised of seven members. They have a board of directors, headed by Basilia. The members of the communal bank are engaged in varied businesses. They sell food, bleach, macram crafts, and plastic products, as well as sheep and lamb meat.
Basilia states that this is her first time working with Pro Mujer, which she joined at the invitation of a promoter. Currently, she is engaged in food sales and has been working in this business for the past three years.
The purpose of the current loan is to increase her working capital in order to purchase oil, rice, noodles, etc. She will acquire these products from the market in L. Ceja, prepare the meals, and sell them later at the markets. Basilia is unmarried and has two children, so this type of work enables her to generate income to support her family.
When asked what she liked about Pro Mujer, she responded that she likes the loan training and the health benefits.

loan.use: to purchase rice, noodles, oil, etc.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy spare parts for his vehicle.

loan.name: Wilfredo

texts.es: El seor Wilfredo tiene 48 aos de edad y es talabartero, elabora Fajas, sandalias, llaveros, monturas de caballos, todos estos productos elaborados a base de cuero genuino, sus productos los vende en distintos departamentos de todo el pais, como ser Olancho, Comayagua, Choluteca y Danli, tiene varios clientes que le hacen pedidos grandes, cuenta con dos empleados para la elaboracion de sus productos, gracias a las ganancias que le genera su negocio ha logrado graduar a sus hijos y tambien realizarle mejoras a su vivienda. don Wilfredo es bien carismtico y amable, se le nota que le gusta su trabajo, sus productos son de buena calidad y con diseos para todos los gustos. el credito lo utilizara para la compra de cuero, hebillas, broches y pegamento.
texts.en: Wilfredo is 48 years. He is a leather craftsman. He makes belts, sandals, keyrings, and horse saddles. All of these products are made from genuine leather. His products are sold in various departments around the country including Olancho, Comayagua, Choluteca y Danli. He has various customers who place large orders. He has two employees who make his products. Thanks to the profits generated by his business, his sons have graduated from school and he is also making improvements to his home. Wilfredo is very charismatic and friendly. He notes that he likes his work, and his products are of good quality and designed for all tastes. The loan will be used to buy leather, buckles, fasteners, and glue.

loan.use: to purchase leather, buckles, fasteners, and glue.

loan.name: Juan Jose

texts.es: Juan hombre humilde, trabajador, comerciante, su compaera de vida trabaja para una empresa privada, siendo un ingreso mas. Su proyecto es mejorar su nivel de vida mediante las utilidades obtenidas del negocio. Su negocio consiste en brindar el servicio de entretenimiento de billares y a su vez ofrece comida, fritanga, bebida entre otros productos. Al quedar sin trabajo hace un tiempo atrs siendo una dificulta para sobrevivir, se le presento la oportunidad de iniciar con su negocio, siendo su mayor fuente de ingreso econmico que hasta este tiempo le ha permitido ir mejorando la infraestructura de su vivienda. Con el prstamo solicitado lo invertir en la compra de materiales de construccin: cemento, bloques, hierro, estribu, arena, piedrines, alambr amarre, clavos, tablones de madera. Para levantar la pared del costado sur de su vivienda y colocarle el piso en donde est el negocio ya que es de tierra perjudicando la salud de sus clientes y de su familia.
texts.en:
Juan is a humble man and a hardworking businessman. His life partner works for a private business, this being additional income.
His project is to improve his quality of life with the profits obtained from his business. His business is the entertainment service of billiards, and at the same time he offers food, fried snacks, drinks, and other products.
When being without work some time ago made it difficult to survive, the opportunity of starting his business came up. This is a greater source of economic income that, up to now, has allowed him to work on improving the infrastructure of his home.
He will use the requested loan to buy construction materials: cement, cinderblocks, iron, rods, sand, gravel, wire, nails, and wood planks. He will build the south wall of his house and put in the floor for the business, since it's made of dirt, which is detrimental to the health of his customers and his family.

loan.use: to buy construction materials.

loan.name: Carmen Delia

texts.es:
La Seora. Carmen es socia del banco comunal Mara Reina de la Paz, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que tiene una belleza que encanta a sus visitantes, es patrimonio cultural de la humanidad desde 1999, la cultura de su gente y las tradiciones de sus pueblos la hacen aun mas encantadora, su variedad en la gastronoma cautiva el paladar de propios y extraos.
La Seora Carmen tiene 38 aos, es divorciada y en su unin conyugal ha concebido 4 hijos de 23, 20, 16 y 14 aos de edad, sus dos primeros hijos trabajan para sus gastos personales y le ayudan con los gastos del hogar, sus dos ltimos hijos estn estudiando en un colegio de la ciudad. No tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.
La Seora. Carmen se dedica a la venta de bisutera, actividad que la desempea hace 8 meses y solo en sus tiempos libres ya que trabaja cuidando a una nia hace un ao de lunes a viernes todo el da.
En el banco comunal se encuentra hace 3 aos y su nuevo crdito lo va a invertir en la compra de bisutera para continuar en esta actividad.
Su sueo es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Carmen is a member of the Mara Reina de la Paz Community Bank. She lives in the city of Cuenca, a city whose beauty charms its visitors, and which has been a cultural heritage site since 1999. The culture of its people and the traditions of its villages make it even more charming, and the variety of food captivates the palates of its residents and visitors.

Carmen is 38 years old, divorced, and with four children from her previous marriage. Her children are 23, 20, 16 and 14 years old. Her two older children work to support themselves and help her with the expenses of the home, and her younger two children are studying at the local high school. She does not have her own home but rents a place.

Carmen works selling costume jewelry, and has been doing so for 8 months. She only does this during her free time as she has spent the last year providing daycare for a girl from Monday to Friday.

She joined the community bank three years ago and will use this new loan to invest in the purchase of costume jewelry to continue with this business. Her dream is to have her own house.

loan.use: buy costume jewelry

loan.name: Valentina

texts.es: La seora Valentina tiene 53 aos de edad y se dedica a la venta de productos de consumo diario, tiene poco tiempo de haber iniciado con su negocio, el cual lo abre de lunes a domingo y los sabados temprano elabora y vende Donas, las que vende en las pulperas y a sus vecinos, sus hijas le ayudan con el negocio ya que va dos veces por semana al mercado para la compra de abarroteria y granos basicos, doa Valentina es muy amable y se nota que le gusta mucho lo que hace, es trabajadora y trata que su producto sea de buena calidad. el credito lo utilizara para la compra de abarroteria y granos basicos. gracias a su negocio y al apoyo que le brinda su esposo ha logrado educar a sus hijas y hacerle mejoras a su vivienda.
texts.en:
Valentina is 53 years old and works selling everyday products. It wasn't too long ago that she started her business, which she opens from Monday through Sunday, and early on Saturdays. She makes and sells doughnuts, which she sells in grocery stores and to her neighbors. Her daughters help her with the business since twice a week she goes to the market to buy groceries and basic grains.
Valentina is very nice and you can tell that she likes what she does very much. She is hardworking and tries to make sure she has a high-quality product.
She will use the loan to buy groceries and basic grains.
Thanks to her business and her husband's support, Valentina has been able to educate her children and make improvements to her home.

loan.use: to buy rice, beans, coffee, sugar, salt, eggs, lard, oil, margarine, and soft drinks.

loan.name: Armando Jose

texts.es: Don Armando de profesion albail, cada dia sigue trabajando para el bienestar comun, sus trabajos los hace por contrato, y cuando termina busca rumbo en el vecindario, y cuando no encuentra, su esposa lo apoya, ya que ella trabaja en servicio domestico, su hijo sigue cursando el ao escolar. Como objetivo ha sido la mejora a su casa, el cual la va construyendo toda de concreto, esta feliz, por poder dar a su familia, un techo digno y con mayor seguridad. Va por parte ya que su liquidez es poca por que tiene que pagar los otros gastos familiar. Con el credito anterior, logro la terminacion de baos e inodoro, condicion que vino a mejorar la higiene, ahora con este nuevo prestamo podra comenzar la pared de concreto frontal y lateral, dejando una mejor vision, y seguridad.
texts.en:
Armando is a mason by trade, and works every day for for the common good. He provides contracted labor, and when he finishes, he looks for new work in the neighborhood. If he doesn't find any, his wife supports him. She works in domestic service. Their son is studying at school.

His goal has been to improve his house, and he is building it all of concrete. He is happy to be able to give his family a dignified home with greater security. He works on it in portions as he does not have much extra money after paying for the other household expenses.

With his previous loan, he was able to finish the bathrooms and toilet and improve their hygiene. With this loan, he will be able to start the front and side concrete walls, creating a better appearance of his home and improving security.

loan.use: build front and side concrete walls to have greater security at his house.

loan.name: Ana Maria

texts.es: La seora Ana Maria esta casada y es madre de dos hijos, Ana se dedica a la venta de lacteos y abarroteria en general, sus clientes son los vecinos y amigos, tambien los pescadores que desde muy temprano vienen a comprarle, ellos se preparan con alimentos para comenzar su faena diaria, doa Ana es muy amigable y se considera una mujer muy trabajadora y de buenos principios. el credito lo utilizara para la compra de lacteos y abarroteria ya que desea surtir un poco ms su pulpera.
texts.en:
Ana Maria is married and the mother of two children. Ana sells dairy products and general groceries. Her clients are neighbors and friends as well as fishermen who go to buy from her very early. They prepare to do their jobs by buying food. Ana is very friendly and considers herself to be a hardworking woman with good principles.
She will use the loan to buy dairy products and merchandise to stock her small store.

loan.use: to buy milk, cheese, butter, cottage cheese, ham, bologna, chicken, beef and pork, juice, churros, beans, rice, sugar and lard.

loan.name: Mara Narcisa De Jess

texts.es:
La Seora. Mara es socia del banco comunal Mara Reina de la Paz, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que tiene una belleza que encanta a sus visitantes, es patrimonio cultural de la humanidad desde 1999, la cultura de su gente y las tradiciones de sus pueblos la hacen aun mas encantadora, su variedad en la gastronoma cautiva el paladar de propios y extraos.
Doa Mara tiene 45 aos, es divorciada y en su unin conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 23, 14 y 12 aos de edad, su primer hijo est estudiando en la universidad y sus dos ltimos hijos en el colegio. La casa en la que habita es de su propiedad.
La Seora. Mara es comerciante, ella se dedica a la venta de cosmticos de la marca Yanbal y Avon, esta actividad la desempea hace 6 meses sin horario ni da fijo.
Es socia del banco comunal hace 14 aos y su nuevo crdito lo va a invertir para la compra de cosmticos para tener un mayor surtido.
Su meta es tener un negocio ms grande como un bazar.
texts.en:
Mara is a member of Mara Reina de la Paz Communal Bank. She lives in Cuenca, a beautiful city that visitors love and that has been a World Heritage Site since 1999. The culture of the people of Cuenca and the traditions of its communities make it even more charming. Its gastronomic variety captivates the palate of locals and visitors.
Mara, 45, is divorced and has three children from her marriage, ages 23, 14, and 12. Her oldest child is studying in the university and the other two are in high school. The house in which she lives is her own.
Mara is a businesswoman. She sells Yanbal and Avon cosmetics. She has been doing this work for six months without a set schedule.
She has been a member of the communal bank for 14 years, and she's going to invest her current loan in buying cosmetics to have a bigger supply.
Her goal is to have a larger business, like a store.

loan.use: to buy cosmetics.

loan.name: Maria Azucena

texts.es: Mara casada, su esposo taxista, sus hijos estudiantes de secundaria, trabaja para un laboratorio como empacadora desde hace un tiempo. Sus planes son mejorar poco a poco la infraestructura de su vivienda. Tambin tiene como otros ingresos el alquiler de cuartos. Con el prstamo comprara materiales de construccin como: cemento, arena, piedrn, lminas de zinc, ladrillos, barrillas para soldar, perlines, entre otros materiales. Que sern utilizados en el cambio de los perlines de madera por los perlines de hierro, as tambin el cambiar el techo que est en mal estado que se le pasa el agua, el repecho de las paredes y colocacin de ladrillos ya que su suelo es embaldosado. Al realizar estas mejoras obtendr comodidad, seguridad ante cualquier desastre y prevenir enfermedades. Agradece a la financiera por el apoyo de lograr unas de sus metas y la oportunidad del crdito. Siendo de gran impacto de cambio en su vida.
texts.en:
Mara is married and her husband is a taxi driver. Her children are in secondary school. She has worked for a laboratory as a packer for some time. Her plans are to improve the infrastructure of her house. She also has other income from renting rooms.
With the loan, she will buy construction materials such as: cement, sand, gravel, zinc sheeting, bricks, rods for welding, metal beams and more. These will be used to replace the wooden beams with the iron ones as well as replace the roof, which is in such poor condition that water is coming through. The walls will be re-plastered and bricks put down on the floor because her floor now is slab. With these improvements, she will have comfort, security against disasters and disease prevention. She is She is thankful to the bank for its support in achieving one of her goals. This will have a big impact and change her life.

loan.use: to buy construction materials and do some home improvements.

loan.name: Lucia Jacqueline

texts.es:
La Seora. Lucia es socia del banco comunal Mara Reina de la Paz, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que tiene una belleza que encanta a sus visitantes, es patrimonio cultural de la humanidad desde 1999, la cultura de su gente y las tradiciones de sus pueblos la hacen aun mas encantadora, su variedad en la gastronoma cautiva el paladar de propios y extraos.
La Seora. Lucia tiene 34 aos, es casada y fruto de su unin conyugal ha concebido 5 hijos de 10, 8, 6, 4 y 1 ao de edad, sus tres primeros hijos estudian en la escuela. Su esposo labora como mecnico industrial en su taller, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive en casa de sus suegros pero independientemente.
Doa Lucia se dedica a la cra y venta de pollos y lleva 2 aos en esta labor. Tambin vende ropa, zapatos y perfumes hace 8 aos y los fines de semana trabaja como mesera.
En el banco comunal se encuentra en su segundo crdito y lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos.
Su meta es terminar su casa ya que se encuentra en construccin.
texts.en:
Seora Lucia is a member of the communal bank Maria Reina de la Paz. She lives in the city of Cuenca, a city whose beauty enchants its visitors. It has been a World Heritage site since 1999. The culture of its people and the traditions of its towns make it even more enchanting. Its gastronomic variety captivates the palates of its own people and of strangers.
Seora Lucia is 34 years old. She is married and has five children, ages 10, 8, 6, 4, and 1. Her three oldest children are in school. Her husband works as an industrial mechanic in his workshop. They do not have their own house, so they live in the house of her in-laws, but they live independently.
Doa Lucia raises and sells chickens. She has had this business for two years. She also sells clothing, shoes and perfumes, and she has been in this business for eight years. On weekends she works as a waitress.
This will be her second loan from the communal bank, and she is going to invest it in the purchase of chickens.
Her goal is to finish her house, which is now in construction.

loan.use: to buy chickens.

loan.name: Maria Elemena

texts.es: La seora Maria Elemena radica en la ladea altos de la flor, tiene casa propia y vive con sus tres nietos, Maria se dedica a la venta de productos de consumo diario, tiene un negocio de pulpera en su casa de habitacion, ahi vende productos como ser: granos bsicos, manteca, aceite, frijoles, azucar, papel, candelas, refrescos, churros, pan, galletas, cafe, arroz, pastillas, plantanos, huevos, aceite, sopas, pastas, salsas, condimentos, baterias, etc. Maria tambin tiene un molino de moler maiz y tambien presta dichos servicios. doa Maria es una mujer trabajadora y con deseos de superarse, el credito lo utilizara para la compra de una vaca lechera ya que ella compra leche y la procesa convirtindola en mantequilla y cuajada, con dicha vaca lechera dejara de comprar leche y asi los costos de la produccion de mantequilla y cuajada seran menos y obtendra mas ganancias cuando venda la mantequilla y la cuajada.
texts.en:
Maria Elemena in the town of Altos de la Flor. She has her own house and lives with her three grandchildren. Maria sells products of daily consumption. She has a small grocery store business in her house. She sells products such as : basic grains, lard, oil, beans, sugar, paper, candles, beverages, churros, bread, cookies, coffee, rice, pills, eggs, oil, soup, pasta, sauces, batteries, etc.
Maria also has a corn mill and offers that service. Maria is a hardworking woman who wants to get ahead. She will use the loan to buy a dairy cow since she buys milk and processes it to make butter and cheese curd. With the dairy cow, she will stop buying milk and the productions costs for milk and cheese curd will be lower and she will have more profit when she sells the butter and cheese curd.

loan.use: to buy cow's milk.

loan.name: Maria Catalina

texts.es: Doa Maria tiene 41 aos de edad, vive en la Aldea el Zapote y se dedica a la cria de cerdos, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitacion, Maria desea estar preparada para la epoca de navidad que es cuando mas se venden los cerdos enteros, desea comprar cerdos para tenernos bien gorditos y asi dentro de dos meses venderlos y obtener buenas ganancias. Maria en sus tiempos libres visita la iglesia de su comunidad.
texts.en:
Mara, 41, lives in Aldea El Zapote and works raising pigs. Her business is at her house.
Mara wants to be prepared for the Christmas season, which is when whole pigs are most in demand. She wants to buy pigs to have them really fat and sell them within two months to make a good profit.
Mara likes to visit the church in her community in her spare time.

loan.use: to buy pigs and pig feed.

loan.name: Silvia Lorena

texts.es:
Doa Silvia tiene 33 aos de edad y tiene una pulperia, ahi vende todo tipo de abarroteria, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitacion en el caserio San Bernardo, Namasigue. Silvia se levanta todos los dias a las 5 de la maana para atender su fiel clientela. Silvia es madre de 2 hijos los cuales los tiene estudiando en el centro educativo de la comunidad.
juntos con su esposo trabajan duro para sacar adelante a sus hijos. en sus tiempos libres Silvia cria gallinas.
texts.en:
Silvia is 33 years old and she has a small grocery store. She sells all kinds of grocery items. Her business is located in her home in the small town of San Bernardo, Namasique. Silvia gets up every day at 5:00 in the morning to tend to her loyal customers. Silvia is mother to 2 small children. They are studying in the local school in the community.
She and her husband work hard together to help their children get ahead.
In her free time, Silvia raises chickens.

loan.use: to buy beans, tortillas, flour, eggs, soft drinks, juices, sugar, coffee, bread, dairy products, oatmeal, cereals, toilet paper, sanitary napkins, candies, chips, soups, pastas, and soaps

loan.name: Maria Enriqueta

texts.es: La seora Mara Enriqueta es una mujer emprendedora que le gusta el oficio del negocio, el cual se dedica a la venta de accesorios que ella misma elabora para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar. Hace 6 aos el esposo adquiri una vivienda de inters social donde actualmente viven, por una u otra cosa no han podido realizarle mejoras, por tal motivo solicita de un prstamo para comenzar un cuarto en la parte de enfrente para extender su sala comedor y hacer mas amplio uno de las recamaras. Para realizar su proyecto necesita comprar cemento, varilla, arena y pagar mano de obra.
texts.en: Seora Maria Enriqueta is an entrepreneurial woman who likes the duties of her business, which is selling accessories that she herself makes in order to help her husband with the household expenses. Six years ago her husband acquired a house in publicly subsidized housing where they now live. For one reason or another, they have not been able to make improvements, and for this reason she is applying for a loan to begin building a room at the front of the house to extend the dining room and enlarge one of the bedrooms. To carry out this project, she needs to buy cement, reinforcing rods, and sand and pay for labor.

loan.use: to buy cement and sand and pay for labor.

loan.name: Arcelia

texts.es: La seora Arcelia y su esposo son una pareja estable que ya tienen varios aos de casados, que con ahorros formaron su propio patrimonio. La casa donde viven ya tiene 20 aos a la cual le han ido haciendo mejoras para que permanezca en buenas condiciones. En este momento Arcelia no cuenta con el capital necesario para reparar las paredes y pintar de un color a su gusto para dar mejor aspecto. Para que Arcelia realice su proyecto necesita comprar pintura, cemento y arena.
texts.en: Arcelia and her husband are a stable couple that have been married for several years. They used their own savings to build their assets. The house where they live is 20 years old and they have been making improvements to it so that it will remain in good condition. At this moment, Arcelia doesnt have the capital necessary to repair the walls and paint them a color she likes to make them look better. In order for Arcelia to finish her project, she needs paint, cement, and sand.

loan.use: to buy paint, cement, and sand

loan.name: Virgen Del Rosario Ii Group

texts.es:
La Sr. N. de 44aos edad madre soltera con 01 hijo menor de edad de 15 aos en etapa escolar, mujer luchadora por salir adelante frente a los obstculos que se les presenta en la vida,socia de la alcanca comunal "virgen de Rosarios II"
tiene Restaurantes Marino Ceviche prepara platos a base de carnes de pescado. El Prstamo solicit para la compra de mesas, sillas, cubiertos, etc. As poder incrementar ms sus ingresos y poder brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. La clienta est ubicada tercera lado izquierdo co ropa color verde.
texts.en:
N. is 44 years old and a single mother with 1 minor son, aged 15 who is still in school. She is a mother who struggles to get ahead while faced with the obstacles life can present. N. is a member of the Virgen de Rosario II communal bank.
N. has a seafood and ceviche restaurant and prepares seafood dishes. She is soliciting this loan to buy tables, chairs, tableware, etc. Thus, she will be able to increase her income in hopes of offering a better quality of life for her family.
In the photo, N. is located on the left in the 3rd row, wearing green clothes.

loan.use: buy supplies for her seafood restaurant, which specializes in ceviche.

loan.name: Constantina

texts.es: La seora Constantina es una mujer dedicada al hogar y al bienestar de sus hijos. La casa donde actualmente vive es de inters social que compro su esposo, con el fin de no pagar renta y tener su propio patrimonio. La casa es muy pequea por tal motivo Constantina quiere que se construya un cuarto en la parte de enfrente para que viva mas cmoda la familia. Para que el cuarto se construya se necesita comprar material de construccin como, arena, varilla, cemento y pagar mano de obra.
texts.en: Constantina is a woman who is dedicated to her home and to the well-being of her children. The house where she now lives is a social interest house that her husband bought so they wouldnt have to pay rent and would have their own assets. The house is very small, which is why Constantina needs to build a room in the front part of the house, so that the family can live more comfortably. In order to build the room, she needs to buy construction materials, such as sand, rebar, and cement and pay for labor.

loan.use: to buy construction materials to build a room

loan.name: Pura Concepcin

texts.es: La seora Pura Concepcin es una mujer muy trabajadora desde hace 30 aos es costurera donde realiza trabajos como levantar bastillas, colocacin de cierres, vestidos de novia y quince aos, vestidos de graduacin y ms. Hace aos su esposo falleci por lo que quedo sola y tuvo que dedicarse de lleno a la costura ya que sera la nica forma en que recibira ingresos. En este momento Pura necesita de un prstamo para comprar tela, hilos y otros para que sus ventas incrementen.
texts.en: Pura Concepcin is a very hardworking woman who has been a seamstress for 30 years. She does work such as raising hems, sewing in zippers, wedding dresses, quincaera dresses, graduation dresses, and more. Her husband passed away several years ago, which meant she was alone and had to work full time in sewing because that was the only way she could have an income. Pura now needs a loan to buy fabric, threads, and other items so that her sales can increase.

loan.use: to buy fabric and threads for her business

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy construction materials (cement and sand) to finish her project

loan.name: San Roque Group

texts.es: La Sra. M. de 43 aos de edad casada, tiene 1 hijo menor de edad de 13 aos en etapa escolar, mujer luchadora por salir adelante frente a los obstculos que se les presenta, socia de la alcanca comunal San Roque. Se dedica en la actualidad a la Preparacin de Platos Tpicos de la Regin como la Pachamanca este plato tpico est preparada a base de papas doradas, carnes asadas,etc. El prestamo solicito para la compra de platos,cubiertos y otros. En el futuro desea exportar la Pachamanca enlatado, as incrementar ms sus ingresos y poder brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. La clienta est ubicada la cuarta lado derecha vestida de casaca blanca polo color celeste.
texts.en:
M. is 43 years old. She is married and has one child who is 13 years old and is in school. She is a woman who works hard to get ahead in spite of the obstacles that present themselves. She is a member of the San Roque community bank.
She currently works at making typical foods of the region, such as Pachamaca. This dish is prepared with roasted potatoes as a base, grilled meats, etc. She is asking for the loan to purchase plates, silverware, and other products. In the future she would like to export canned Pachamanca and thereby increase her income and be able to provide her family with a better quality of life.
She is the one who is fourth from the right, dressed in a white jacket with a blue polo shirt.

loan.use: to purchase plates and silverware

loan.name: Celia

texts.en:
Celia is 50 years old and lives in Bacolod; Ozamiz City. She is married with five adult children.
Celia owns a motorcycle and uses it as her business, operating it within Ozamiz City. She earns approximately 3000 Philippine Pesos (PHP) each month doing this type of work. She has a requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase equipment for her motorcycle.
Celia has been a member of PMPC for one year. In the future, Celia hopes that she will not encounter failure in her business and can purchase a lot of motorcycles within five years.

loan.use: to purchase equipment for her motorcycle

loan.name: Liza

texts.en:
Liza is 44 years old and lives in Malaubang, Ozamiz City. She is married with eight school-aged children.
To earn a living, Liza has a food stall selling a food called fried chicken neck. She earns about 3000 Philippine Pesos (PHP) each month doing this type of work. Liza has a requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase ingredients for her fried chicken neck.
Liza has been a member of PMPC for four years. In the future, Liza would like to put up a permanent store in Ozamiz for her business.

loan.use: to purchase ingredients for making fried chicken necks

loan.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is married with two children. She is 30 years old and lives in the Philippines.
Gina is a farmer and grows pigs to earn a living. She has been doing this for three years. She has requested a loan of 12,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) to purchase breeding pigs to raise.
Gina has been a member of PMPC for one and a half years. In the future, Gina hopes to improve her family's house.

loan.use: to purchase breeding pigs to raise.

loan.name: Anita

texts.en:
Anita is married with five children. She is 53 years old and lives in the Philippines.
Anita is a farmer and grows rice to earn a living. She has been doing this for 30 years. She has requested a loan of 9,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) to purchase fertilizer for rice.
Anita has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, Anita hopes to see her children finish college.

loan.use: to purchase fertilizer for rice.

loan.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 50 years old and lives in Purok Rizal Bacolod, Ozamiz City. She is married and has 3 children. Teresita has a tractor for her business and earns approximately PHP 10,000 each month doing this type of business. She has requested a loan to purchase another farm tractor.
Teresita has been a member of PMPC for 1 year. In the future, she hopes to improve her living conditions.

loan.use: buy a tractor

loan.name: Joyas Para Cristo 1 & 2 Group

texts.es:
Carolina es la coordinadora del Grupo Joyas para cristo 1 & 2; compuesto por 10 mujeres empresarias, dedicadas a diferentes actividades de negocio desde ventas miscelneas, de comestibles, salones de belleza, ventas de calzados, frutas y vegetales, entre otros. Sus ventas son realizadas en su comunidad y otras zonas cercanas, ubicada al noreste de la ciudad de Santo Domingo, donde cada da, estas microempresarias buscan mejorar su calidad de vida.
Carolina est recibiendo su cuarto prstamo con Esperanza Internacional, varios de su familia son comerciantes y desde que pudo iniciar su negocio hace unos 5 aos, necesito inyectar un poco de capital y fue cuando decidi participar en un grupo que se iba a formar en su comunidad. Su negocio es la venta de productos de belleza, para el cabello, cosmticos, entre otros. Invertir su ultimo prstamo en mercancas para ampliar su inventario.
Carolina es una madre viuda con 4 hijos, de los cuales solo 3 aun viven con ella, a los cuales debe cuidar y ayudar con sus sustento, y su educacin, dice que su reto mas difcil ha sido superar la muerte de su esposo. Disfruta trabajar en belleza, por lo que espera poder tener un saln, muy pronto y dedicarse a esta actividad de negocio. En nombre de su grupo da la gracias a todos ustedes por su apoyo.
texts.en:
Carolina is the coordinator of Joyas para Cristo 1 & 2 Group, 10 businesswomen dedicated to various business activities, from miscellaneous sales to food, beauty salons, shoe sales, fruits and vegetables, and others. They sell in their community and in nearby areas, located in the northeast of the city of Santo Domingo, where every day these micro-businesswomen look to improve their quality of life.
Carolina is receiving her fourth loan with Esperanza Internacional. Several members of her family work in business, and since she managed to start her business some five years ago, she needed to put in a bit of capital; that was when she decided to participate in a group that was going to form in her community.
Her business is selling beauty products, hair products, and cosmetics, among other products. She will invest her current loan in merchandise to expand her inventory.
Carolina is a widowed mother of four children, three of whom still live with her and whom she has to care for and help with her sustenance and education. She says her biggest challenge has been getting over the death of her husband. She enjoys working with beauty products, and hopes to be able to have a salon very soon and dedicate herself to this work activity.
In the name of her group she thanks all of you for your support.

loan.use: to buy beauty products and cosmetics.

loan.name: Jocelyn

texts.en: Jocelyn is married with five children. She is 44 years old and lives in Poblacion, Sapang Dalaga. Jocelyn has a general store that helps her earn a living, and she has had this business for three months. Each month, she earns 3,600 Philippine pesos (PHP) doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 14,900 PHP to purchase stock for her general store. Jocelyn has been a member of PMPC for one year.

loan.use: to purchase stock for her general store

loan.name: Sofronio Jr.

texts.en: Sofronio is from the village of Sta. Filomena. He is 48 years old, married, and has four children. Sofronio Jr. owns and operates a coffee farm. He has been engaged in this business for over three years and earns approximately 5,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) a month. He has requested a loan of 30,000 PHP to purchase fertilizers for his coffee farm.

loan.use: to purchase fertilizers for his coffee farm

loan.name: Litas

texts.en: Litas is from the village of Obay, Polanco, Zamboanga del Norte. She is 46 years old, married, and has 3 school-aged children. Litas has a general store. She earned PHP 3000 each month doing this activity. She has requested a loan of PHP 14,900 to purchase stocks for her general store. Litas had been a member in Paglaum MPC for 3 years.

loan.use: buy stock for her store

loan.name: Helen

texts.en:
Helen is 44 years old and lives in Malintuboan, Labason, Zamboanga del Norte. She is married and has 4 children. Helen works in the fishing industry and resells as well as catches fish for a living. She has been doing this for 5 years.
Helen has requested loan for PHP 3000 to purchase more fish to sell. Helen has been a member of PMPC for 2 years. In the future, she hopes to expand her business.

loan.use: buy fish

loan.name: Luzminda

texts.en:
Luzminda is 51 years old and lives in Malintuboan, Labason, Zamboanga del Norte. She is married with seven children.
Luzminda works in the fish industry and sells fish for a living. She has been doing this for five years. She has requested loan of 6,000 PHP to purchase three boxes of fish to sell.
Luzminda has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, Luzminda hopes to expand her business.

loan.use: to purchase three boxes of fish to sell.

loan.name: Lorrilie

texts.en:
Lorrilie is 33 years old and lives in Matugas Alto, Jimenez. She is married with two children.
Lorrilie has a services business and earns approximately PHP 15,000 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 40,000 to purchase new barber shop materials for her barber shop.
Lorrilie has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, Lorrilie hopes to have number of barber shops in the province.

loan.use: To purchase new barber shop materials for her barber shop.

loan.name: Romer

texts.en:
Romer is 59 years old and lives in Lawa-an Aloran, Misamis Occidental. He is married but has no children.
Romer has a fish vending business and earns approximately PHP 2,000 each month doing this type of work. He has requested a loan of 7,000 PHP to purchase more fish to sell.
Romer has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, Romer hopes to have a fishing boat.

loan.use: to purchase more fish to sell.

loan.name: Vicente

texts.en:
Vicente is 63 years old and lives in Lobogon, Aloran, Misamis Occidental. He is married with two children.
Vicente has a fisherfolk business and earns approximately PHP 5,000 each month doing this type of work. He has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase more fish to sell.
Vicente has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, Vicente hopes to have many fishing boats in order help their financial and daily needs.

loan.use: to purchase more fish to sell.

loan.name: Margarita

texts.en:
Margarita is 53 years old and lives in Upper Rizal, Oroquieta City. She is married with five children.
Margarita has a snack vending business and earns approximately PHP 500 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 5,0000 to purchase raw ingredients for her snacks.
Margarita has been a member of PMPC for a month. In the future, Margarita hopes to have a food stall. She is a hard-working mother and MIGS member of PMPC.

loan.use: to purchase raw ingredients for her snacks.

loan.name: Narcisa

texts.en:
Narcisa is 53 years old and lives in Palayan, Aloran, Misamis Occidental. She is widowed with six children.
Narcisa has a sari-sari (variety) store business and earns approximately PHP 2,000 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 3,000 PHP to purchase more stock for her general store.
Narcisa has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, Narcisa hopes to have a grocery store. She is a MIGS member of PMPC. She has a happy family, is a good mother, and she takes good care of her family.

loan.use: to purchase more stock for her general store.

loan.name: Rosa

texts.en:
Rosa is 59 years old and lives in Lubogon, Aloran, Misamis Occidental. She is married with six children.
Rosa has a fish vending business and earns approximately PHP 12,500 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 14,900 PHP to purchase more fish to sell.
Rosa has been a member of PMPC for 10 years. In the future, Rosa hopes to have a fishing boat. She is hard-working and has a happy family. She is a MIGS member of PMPC.

loan.use: to purchase more fish to sell.

loan.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites is 44 years old and lives in Lubogon, Aloran, Misamis Occidental. She is married with seven children.
Marites has a fish vending business and earns approximately PHP 10,000 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 14,900 PHP to purchase more fish to sell
Marites has been a member of PMPC for 10 years. In the future, Marites hopes to have a big capital.so that they can earn money for their children. Marites is a MIGS member of PMPC.

loan.use: to purchase more fish to sell.

loan.name: Leonidas

texts.en:
Leonidas is a widow with four children. Leonidas is 64 years old and lives in the Philippines.
Leonidas is a farmer and grows corn to earn a living. She has been doing this for 35 years. She has requested a loan of 20,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer for her corn.
Leonidas has been a member of PMPC for five years. In the future, Leonidas hopes to save money for her old age.

loan.use: to purchase fertilizer for her corn.

loan.name: Safia's Group

texts.en:
Safia is 37 years old, married with two children. One of them is studying while other is less than 4 years old. Her husband is a fruit seller. He sells different varieties of fresh seasonal fruit to his customers. The quality as well as the price of his fruit is very fair; thats why he makes a good number of sales and earns reasonably good profits from his business.
Safia herself is an active and efficient lady and performs her household duties very well. She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband because the winter season is coming and he needs new season fruit to sell to earn better profits.
He has been operating his business for the past four years and Safia is hopeful that an investment will help him make better profits from his business.

loan.use: to buy fresh seasonal fruit to sell.

loan.name: Shahla's Group

texts.en:
Shahla has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for the further expansion of her husbands spare parts business. He started his business 10 years ago with a small investment. Now he is well established in his business but he needs continuous investment to purchase spare parts for his shop. He is a very hard worker with a good business sense. Shahla is hopeful that her husbands business will bring more profits to him after making an investment into it.
She is a mother of five children. Two of her children are studying while her other three children are young and not of school-going age yet. Shahla is a very active and supportive lady who does her household responsibilities very well and tries her best to provide comfort to her family.
Note: In the photo, the lady with a book (called Asasah Passbook) is Shahla.

loan.use: To buy spare parts to sell

loan.name: Vilayat

texts.en:
Vilayat is 45 years old, married and has three children. He has been working as a farmer for many years. Vilayat is involved in growing fruit trees: pomegranate, apple, pear, etc. He sells seedlings and fruits in the local bazaar. He is also involved in fattening up and selling livestock.
This is his second loan from Kiva and AqroInvest. Vilayat used his earlier profits to buy three dairy cows.
He requested a loan in the sum of 1,500 AZN for the purchase of more seeds and fertilizer to improve his soil.

loan.use: to purchase more seeds and fertilizer to improve the soil.

loan.name: Rasoolan's Group

texts.en:
Rasoolan has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for the further expansion of her sons laundry business. With the loan, he will buy washing powder, bleach and an iron because he offers his customers an additional service of pressing their clothes.
Rasoolan is a very active lady who sells buffalo milk to her community clients. She has kept a buffalo for that purpose at her home. She takes its milk and sells on profit.
Her son started his business three years ago and is still working hard to get established in his business. Rasoolan is hopeful that after the loan investment, he will be able to increase his profits and improves his clientele base. She always remains worried about the future of her children because she couldnt provide quality education to her children due to poor financial conditions. Thats why she wants them to do well in their business and secure their future.
Note: In the photo, the lady holding a book (called Asasah Passbook) is Rasoolan.

loan.use: To buy washing powder, bleach and an iron for her laundry business

loan.name: Asia's Group

texts.en:
Asia is 33 years old. In order to financially support her husband, she sews clothes for her community clients. Due to the good quality of work, she receives regular orders every month.
Her husband runs a grocery store in the market. Through his store, he sells daily used items such as sugar, spices, lentils, rice etc. He is very fair in his rates and earns good profits from his business.
She has given birth to three children: one of them is studying while the others are very young and havent started their education yet. She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husbands grocery store business. With the loan, he will buy groceries in bulk, which will allow him to fulfill the client's orders and earn better profits. He is very experienced in his business and has been operating it for the past nine years. Asia is very sure that his business will be improved further after the loan investment.

loan.use: To buy groceries to sell

loan.name: Shazia's Group

texts.en:
Shazia is 36 years old, divorced and lives with her brother. He is a fruit seller. He sells fresh seasonal fruits to his customers at reasonable rates. Shazia started embroidery work 12 years ago. Now, she has become expert in her field and receives regular orders every month. She is the mother of a son who is a factory worker. Due to poor financial circumstances, she couldnt educate her son.
She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for the betterment of her embroidery business. With the loan, she will buy embroidery material in bulk, which will allow her to offer better quality embroidery works to her clients and increase her income. She doesnt want to become a burden on her brother and hopes that she will successfully be able to upgrade her business after the loan investment.

loan.use: To buy embroidery material

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase feed for calves

loan.name: Sughran's Group

texts.en:
Sughran is 44 years old. Her husband sells wheat. He purchases wheat from the wholesale market and sells to his local area clients for profit. Sughran is a seamstress. She started this business a few years ago to financially support her husband. She is very good at her work and receives a good number of orders every month.
Sughran is the mother of 4 children. Her eldest daughter weaves carpet while the others are studying in different classes. She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for the further expansion of her husbands wheat selling business. With this loan, he will buy wheat in bulk quantity to allow him to supply larger quantities of wheat to his client and earn more profit. He is an experienced person in his business and has been operating it for the past 5 years. Sughran is confident that an investment will help him improve his business further.
