loan.use: to buy wheat

loan.name: Galina

texts.en:
Galina lives with her husband in the city of Berdyansk. Her adult children live separately for a long time. Galina sells household goods and china on the central market of her city for eight years now. Galina does not have competitors on this market, she is the only one who sells such merchandise. Her merchandise is of very high quality. At this time her working capital is 50,000 hryvna.
Galina plans to use the 12,000 hryvna loan from Kiva to buy additional merchandise, such as pots, pans, dinner sets and etc, for successful resale in the future. By renewing the variety of her merchandise Galina will attract new customers, increase purchasing power and commodity turnover. Galina is entrepreneurial and always has a hardworking attitude towards her business, and is polite towards her customers. All these factors certainly have an impact in the successful growth of Galina's business.

loan.use: to purchase additional merchandise such as pots, pans, dinner sets and etc, for successful resale in the future.

loan.name: Oleg

texts.en:
Oleg works on the central market of the city of Berdyansk. He is in the flower business and has own flower pavilion in the flower aisle on the market. Oleg is married and has two adult daughters. Oleg's business has a big advantage: he offers a large variety of flowers at a minimal price in comparison with the competing neighbors on the market. At this time Oleg's working capital is 25,000 hryvna.
Oleg needs a loan in the amount of 15,000 hryvna to buy live flowers and house plants in wholesale for resale as well as related merchandise. This loan will make a positive impact on his business because by purchasing the flowers he will be able to increase the working capital and this way free up some cash for further growth of his business.

loan.use: to purchase fresh flowers and house plants in wholesale for resale, as well as related goods.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase of four heads of cattle.

loan.name: Nagdali

texts.en: Nagdali is a very hardworking man who has for the last 15 years earned a living by raising cattle and selling milk to local dairy wholesalers. He is married and has three children, two daughters and one son. He is seeking a loan of 1,200 AZN from AqroInvest and Kiva to buy more animals to raise and feed for them to eat. He believes that this will allow him to increase his income and improve his family's living conditions. This will be his fifth loan from our organization.

loan.use: to enlarge his herd and buy feed for his animals.

loan.name: Zeynab

texts.en:
Zeynab is from Imishli. She is 38 years old and lives with her family: her husband, two daughters, and 78-year-old mother. She operates a variety store adjacent to her house. To help her continue operating her business, she requested a loan of 1000 AZN to buy additional groceries for her grocery store, such as candies, canned goods and biscuits. She has a good loan history and this is her fifth loan from AqroInvest.
Zeynab hopes to be able to expand soon and dreams of being able to give her children a high-quality education through all her hard work in her business.

loan.use: to buy additional groceries for her store.

loan.name: Ousmane

texts.fr: Ousmane est un leveur depuis son plus jeune ge, il habite dans une ville situe l'ouest du Sngal. Il sollicite ce crdit pour renforcer son activit et pour acheter du btail (moutons, chvres, veaux) qu'il revend ensuite. Avec ce prt il envisage avoir du profit qui lui permettra d'pargn et d'achet un champ pour faire de l'agriculture.Il veut aussi tre capable de rpondre aux besoins de ses enfants de cot financier
texts.en:
Since his youngest age, Ousmane has been raising animals. He lives in a town in Western Senegal. He's seeking a loan to bolster her business and buy livestock (sheep, goats, calves) for resale.
With this loan, he foresees turning a profit that will enable him to put money away and buy a field for farming. He also wants to be able to provide financially for his children.

loan.use: to buy sheep, goats, and calves

loan.name: Dung

texts.en:
Dung, 41, is a married mother of two children. She lives with her husband and children in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband works for a local factory.
Dung runs a small food stall and store in front of her house. Her stall and store are very convenient for many customers and she provides food for breakfast such as breads and steamed rice. She also sells a range of metal racks and appliances. She has been in this business for twenty years.
Dung is seeking a loan to purchase foodstuffs to increase the variety of products that she sells to her customers. This will allow her to increase the turnover of her business and increase her income. She hopes that this will enabL. her to improve her family's living conditions.

loan.use: buy foodstuff

loan.name: Nhung

texts.en:
Nhung is 50 years old and married. She has three children and lives with them and her husband in Ho Chi Minh city. Her husband is a worker in a local factory.
Nhung works hard to provide for her family. She runs a food stall at her house to sell many kinds of food such as beef noodles and fried savoury rice flour cake for the people in her community.
Nhung would like to take a loan to buy new furniture and repair her stall. She is hoping that through the loan she will be able to save money to expand her business.

loan.use: buy furniture and repair her food stall

loan.name: Aida

texts.fr: Aida habite dans une localit proche de la capitale du Sngal. Elle s'active dans le domaine de la restauration depuis plus de 10 ans. Elle veut ce prt pour acheter des marchandises et de renforcer son stock qui est en manque permanent. Avec ce crdit elle veut avoir une activit continue et du profit qui lui garantira une autonomie financire afin d'aider son mari dans les dpenses quotidiennes
texts.en: Aida lives in a town near the capital of Senegal. She has been active in the restaurant business for over ten years. She wants this loan to buy goods and to bolster her stock, which is continuously lacking. With this loan, she wants to keep her business going and make a profit that will guarantee her some financial autonomy, so as to help her husband with day-to-day expenses.

loan.use: to buy merchandise

loan.name: Mensim

texts.en:
Mensim is 30 years old. He has had a grocery store for five years. He opened his store in 2006 because the neighborhood did not have this type of business. Mensim started with a small amount of capital. He sells milk, eggs, pasta, sugar, and other products.
Mensim is requesting his first loan from AqroInvest for 800 AZN, which he will use to buy supplies for his store. His dream is to own a store adjacent to his house and expand his business.

loan.use: to purchase supplies for his grocery store.

loan.name: Thao

texts.en:
Thao, 30, is married and has two children. She lives with her children and husband in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband helps to support the family by operating a cell phone shop.
Thao has been in the beauty salon business for three years. She plans to use her loan partly to buy cosmestic products to sell and partly to support her husband's business by investing in cell phone accessories to sell. In the future, she would like to expand her business, repair her house and improve her family's living conditions.

loan.use: buy cosmestic products and cell phone accessories

loan.name: Diep

texts.en:
Diep is a 39-year-old beautician. She lives in Ho Chi Minh city. Diep runs a beauty shop from her house. She began working in this profession eight years ago.
Diep is requesting a loan to buy hair dryers, steamers, stretching machines and other basic supplies for her beauty shop. She also wants to take part in some courses related to makeup art. She hopes that this will enabL. her to better serve her existing customers and attract new customers.
Diep hopes that through this loan she will be abL. to generate a higher income and set aside some savings for the future.

loan.use: buy beauty shop equipment and take makeup classes

loan.name: Fakhar-Un-Nissa's Group

texts.en:
Fakhar-un-nissa sells clothes to financially support her family. She has good business sense. She keeps herself updated on the latest fashion and trend, which helps her understanding her clients' demand. She purchases clothes from different cities and then sells them to her community clients on profit.
Fakhar-un-nissa is married and her husband has a construction supplies business. She is the mother of 8 children -- 3 of them work while the others are studying in different classes. Fakhar-un-nissa is also a very good mother and housewife. She fulfills her household responsibilities and her family respects her very much.
Fakhar-un-nissa has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for the further expansion of her business. With this loan, she will buy clothes in bulk which will allow her to offer more variety to her clients and increase her sales and profit. She has been operating her business for past 10 years and is confident about her success after the loan investment.

loan.use: to buy clothes to resell

loan.name: Dieynaba

texts.fr: Dieynaba est une commerante depuis plus de 5 ans, elle vie dans une rgion limitrophe de Dakar la capitale du Sngal. Elle demande ce crdit pour consolider son activit en renforant son stock de marchandises (tissus, habits prt--port pour enfants). Avec ce crdit elle compte avoir du profit pour mieux rendre visible son activit en achetant une cantine au march. Et d'aider ses frres dans leurs activits
texts.en: Dieynaba has been a merchant for over five years. She lives in a region bordering Dakar, the capital of Senegal. She is asking for a loan to strengthen her business by bolster her stock of merchandise (fabrics, clothing, and ready-to-wear for children). With this loan, she intend to make some profit by buying a stall at the market. And to help her brothers with their businesses.

loan.use: to bolster her stock of merchandise

loan.name: Luong

texts.en:
Luong, age 45, operates an Internet shop in front of her house. She lives with her husband and two children in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband is working for an electricity company.
Luong has been engaged in her current business for three years. She would like to request a loan to improve her business by upgrading some old computers and buying more games to attract more customers. She is confident that these additions will help her to run her business smoothly and earn a higher income for her family.

loan.use: upgrade computers for her Internet shop

loan.name: Thuy

texts.en:
Thuy is a 39-year-old beautician who lives with her husband and two children in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband works in the field of construction. Thuy runs a beauty shop from her house. She began working in this profession two years ago.
Thuy is requesting a loan to repair her house and buy skin care products and other basic supplies for her beauty shop. She hopes that this will enable her to better serve her existing customers and attract new customers. She also hopes that through the loan she will be able to generate a higher income and set aside some savings for the future.

loan.use: to repair her house and buy skin care products and other basic supplies for her beauty shop.

loan.name: Mai

texts.en:
Mai is a 38-year-old married woman living in Ho Chi Minh City with her children and husband. She and her husband have been running a motorcycle washing and repair business for nine years. She would like to take out a loan to expand her business by purchasing spare parts and equipment to serve a larger number of customers.
She hopes that through the loan her business will be able to generate more income, which will enable her to improve her family's living conditions and put aside savings for her children's education.

loan.use: To buy spare parts and equipment to serve a larger number of customers.

loan.name: Diep

texts.en:
Diep, 49, is a married woman with a son. Her husband works in a textile factory. They live in Ho Chi Minh City.
For nearly 14 years, Diep has supported her family through the income she earns from her food stall, which occupies the front of her house. She sells pork soup, fried corn, and a variety of other dishes. She intends to take a loan to buy new furniture and ingredients so that she can produce a larger quantity of food to better meet her customers' needs. She hopes her expanded business will help her improve her living conditions.

loan.use: To buy new furniture and ingredients for her food stall.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to repair his taxi

loan.name: Thu

texts.en:
Thu is 33 years old and married, with two sons. She lives with her husband and children in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband works in the construction field.
Thu has been making stuffed animals for 12 years. She receives the materials from toy dealers and makes the stuffed toys at her house.
Thu would like to take out a loan to buy a new sewing machine and materials for making stuffed toys. She hopes that through the loan she will be able to increase her income and improve the living conditions of her family.

loan.use: To buy a new sewing machine and materials for making stuffed toys.

loan.name: Sajida's Group

texts.en:
Sajida has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah to improve her husbands shoe-making business. He has been operating his business for the past 20 years and has a good number of business contacts. These days he has a big order to fulfill for which he wants to buy raw materials. With the loan, he will buy leather, nails, glue, and shoe polish.
She herself is a seamstress who sews clothes for her community clients to supplement the income for her family. She is the mother of four children and all of them stay at home.
Sajida is very confident that after investing the loan in her husband's business, her husband will be able to finish the order on time and make great profits.
Note: in the photo, the woman raising her hand is Sajida.

loan.use: To buy raw materials for her husband's shoe-making business.

loan.name: Huong

texts.en:
Huong is a 42-year-old married woman. She lives with two children and her husband in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband works in a local hospital. For four years, she has operated a food stall to sell beef and noodles to people in her community.
Huong would like a loan to repair her stall and buy new furniture, bowls, chopsticks, and good-quality food. She hopes this will enable her to better meet the needs of her customers and attract new customers. She also hopes that through her loan she will be able to increase her income and save money for any future difficulties facing her family.

loan.use: To repair her food stall and buy new furniture, bowls, chopsticks, and good-quality food to sell.

loan.name: Hong

texts.en:
Hong is a 59-year-old married woman with six sons and one daughter. She lives with her children and husband in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City.
She and her husband have run a food stall in front of their house for the past ten years. They sells soups and noodles to people in their community.
Hong would like to receive a loan to expand her business by purchasing more furniture, cooking appliances, and good-quality food from wholesalers. She hopes that this will enable her to increase the turnover of her business, earn a higher income and improve her family's living conditions.

loan.use: To expand her food business by purchasing furniture, cooking appliances, and good-quality food.

loan.name: Fareeha Naz's Group

texts.en:
Fareeha Naz is 32 years old. She couldnt complete her education due to financial constraints and had to leave her education after matriculation. She is married and her husband operates a grocery store in the market. He sells daily use items such as spices, sugar, cooking oil and lentils, at reasonable rates. He is very good in his customer dealings and has a good number of loyal clients who do shopping from him regularly.
Fareeha supports her husband financially by sewing clothes. She is very skillful and receives regular orders every month. She has given birth to a son and 3 daughters. All of them are studying except the youngest daughter who is only 3 years old.
Fareeha has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for the further expansion of her husbands business. With the loan, he will buy groceries in bulk that will allow him to fulfill his client orders on time and earn extra income. He has been operating his business for many years and Fareeha is confident that an investment will bring more profits to her family and improve its living standard.
Note: In the photo, the lady holding a book (called Asasah Passbook) is Fareeha Naz.

loan.use: to buy groceries to resell

loan.name: Van

texts.en:
Van is a 52-year-old married woman with a son. She lives with her family in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City.
Van and her husband earn an income to support their family by running a food stall in front of their house. They have been running their business for the past 15 years.
Van would like to receive a loan to purchase furniture, bowls, plates and chopsticks, as well as more food to sell. She hopes that this will enable her to earn a higher income, improve her family's living conditions, and set aside some savings for family emergencies.

loan.use: buy furniture, bowls, plates, chopsticks, and food

loan.name: Cay

texts.en:
Cay is 51 years old, married, and has three children. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband is a driver.
Cay supports her family by selling noodles in crab chowder to the local people. She is asking for a loan to repair her stall and buy new furniture and appliances. She hopes that this loan will enable her to improve the living conditions for her family.

loan.use: repair her food stall, buy new furniture & appliances

loan.name: Anh

texts.en:
Anh is 36 years old, married, and has two sons. She lives with her husband and sons in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband earns an income by repairing sewing machines.
For nearly 12 years, Anh has run a general store in front of her house. She sells beverages, instant food, and household necessities to the local community. She now intends to get a loan to buy a larger range and quantity of products in bulk for her general store. She hopes that through the loan she will be abL. to increase her income and improve the well-being of her family.

loan.use: buy products to sell

loan.name: Kim

texts.en:
Kim is 58 years old. He is single and lives in Ho Chi Minh City. He earns money by buying and selling vehicle spare parts and accessories. He would like to get a loan to buy a larger stock of spare parts and accessories to better meet his customers' needs.
Kim hopes that through the loan his business will increase its income and ensure that his family members have better living conditions.

loan.use: buy vehicle spare parts and accessories

loan.name: Perveen's Group

texts.en:
Perveen is married and is the mother of a son and a daughter. Her daughter works in a factory while her son is studying in the 9th class. Her husband is a rickshaw driver. He provides transport services to his passengers, which also include school children in his community.
Perveen is an embroidery expert. She prepares beautiful-looking embroidered clothes for her clients for reasonable rates. She is also a very good housewife and performs her household duties very well.
Perveen has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for the betterment of her embroidery business. With the loan, she will buy embroidery materials in bulk quantity to allow her to make different kinds of beautiful-looking embroidered clothes and increase her sales and profits. She is very confident that this investment will help improve her business and also the living standard of her family.
Note: In the photo, the lady raising her hand is Perveen.

loan.use: to buy embroidery materials

loan.name: Ha

texts.en:
Ha is a 28-year-old woman. She is married and has a son. She lives in Ho Chi Minh City with her family and owns a general store to make a living. Her husband supports the family by buying and selling old motorcycles.
Ha started her business seven years ago. She sells a range of goods from basic family necessities to instant food to people in her community. Ha uses the income she earns to feed her family and send her son to school.
Ha is requesting a loan to stock her store with a greater range of different products such as dairy products and soft drinks. With the help of this loan she hopes to be able to offer a varied range of products to her customers and generate more income.

loan.use: restock her store

loan.name: Ngoc

texts.en:
Ngoc is a 49-year-old woman with 2 children -- 1 son and 1 daughter. She is divorced and lives with her children in Ho Chi Minh City.
For 10 years Ngoc has been earning income to support her family by selling soft drinks from the front of her house. Ngoc would like to take out a loan to buy a greater quantity and variety of beverages and products to sell. She believes that this will help her increase the turnover of her business.
Ngoc hopes that through this loan she will earn a higher income and be able to give her family members a better quality of life.

loan.use: buy soft drinks to sell

loan.name: Najma's Group

texts.en:
Najma is married and is the mother of 6 children, 3 of them work to financially contribute to the family. Her husband is a scrap dealer. He sells scraps to different factories and to other scrap dealers. Najma herself is a seamstress. She sews clothes for her neighboring clients and earns a reasonable income.
Najma has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband's scrap business. With the loan, he will buy scrap materials like used paper and plastic bottles in bulk quantities. This will allow him to fulfill his clients' orders on time and provide them with larger quantities of scraps and increase his profits. He is very experienced in his work and has been operating his business for the past many years. Najma is confident that an investment will help her husband increase his profits.
Note: In the photo, the lady raising her hand is Najma.

loan.use: to buy scrap materials to resell

loan.name: Bokk Diom 23 Group

texts.fr: Soda est la prsidente du groupement. Ce groupement s'active dans le commerce et leur localit se situe l'ouest du Sngal. Soda s'active dans le commerce depuis plus de 10 ans. Elle sollicite ce crdit dans le but de renforcer son stock en marchandises en achetant des paniers de fruits (mangues, mandarines, papayes, arachides) qu'elle va revendre au march de la ville. Elle veut avoir beaucoup de bnfices dans son commerce et tre autonomie financirement afin de rpondre aux besoins de sa familles et de payer les frais de scolarisation de sa fille
texts.en: Soda is the president of this group. The members of this group work in commerce and they live in the west of Senegal. Soda has been working in commerce for more than 10 years. She is requesting this loan to strengthen her stock of merchandise. She will buy baskets of fruit (mangos, mandarins, papayas and peanuts). She will re-sell these products in the town market. Soda would like to make a lot of profit in her business and be financially independent so that she can respond to her family's needs and pay her daughter's school fees.

loan.use: to buy merchandise (fruit)

loan.name: Hang

texts.en:
Hang, 49, is married and has a daughter. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband earns an income working as a labourer in a seafood factory.
Hang supports her family by running a general store in front of her house. She started this business ten years ago. She sells sugar, soft drinks, confectionery, yoghurt and other household items to people in her community. She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying a greater variety of products, in particular foods and beverages, to stock her store and better satisfy her customers.
She hopes her business runs smoothly and will generate a higher income to assist her in improving her family's living conditions.

loan.use: buy food and beverages

loan.name: Mbayang

texts.fr: Mbayang est une commerante, elle s'active dans ce secteur depuis plus de 20 ans. Elle habite dans une ville situe l'ouest du Sngal. Elle sollicite ce crdit dans le but de s'approvisionner en marchandises comme des fruits de mer (pagnes, crevettes, crabes) dans la petite cte qu'elle va revendre dans sa ville tout cela pour avoir une pour feuille qui lui permettra d'tre autonome financirement et de rpondre aux besoins de sa familles
texts.en:
Mbayang is a retailer. She has been invovled in this line of work for more than 20 years.
She lives in a town in the western part of Senegal. She is requesting this loan to be able to buy merchandise such as seafood (ark clams, shrimp, crab) on the coast for re-sale in her town. Her goal is to have enough money to be financially self-sufficient and to meet her family's needs.

loan.use: to by merchandise.

loan.name: Nasreen's Group

texts.en:
Nasreen is married and has 6 children. All of them do different kinds of work to financially contribute to the family. Her husband is a rickshaw driver and provides transport services to his passengers. He is a very good driver and his passengers trust his driving and like to travel on his rickshaw. Nasreen is a housewife who stays at home and does her household responsibilities. She is very active and performs her household duties very efficiently.
She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner, Asasah, for her husband. With the loan, he will overhaul his rickshaw and also change its body, which will allow him to provide better quality transport services to his passengers and increase his income. Nasreen has a lot of confidence in her husband and she is very sure that after investing in his business, her husbands income will be increased. That will help her family to live a better financial life. Note: "In the photo, one of the members has an embroidery business. That's why she is holding cloth".

loan.use: To overhaul & change the body of the rickshaw

loan.name: Aminata

texts.fr: Aminata est une commerante qui vie dans une localit proche de la capitale du Sngal. Elle volue dans le secteur du commerce depuis presque une dizaine dannes. Elle sollicite ce prt pour renforcer son stock de marchandises en cahiers, stylo, livre, crayons, sacs. Avec ce prt elle compte avoir une bnfice qui lui permettra de se lanc la construction de sa cantine qu'elle a commenc en ville ce qui lui permettra d'tre plus visible sur le march. Elle veut au aider son mari dans les dpenses de la maisons.
texts.en: Aminata is a trader who lives in a town near the capital of Senegal. She has been trading for almost ten years. She is requesting this loan to strengthen her stock of merchandise (exercise books, pens, books, pencils and bags). With this loan, she expects to make enough profits to work on building a store that she has started in town. This will allow her to be more visible in the market. She would also like to help her husband with their household expenses.

loan.use: to increase her stock (by purchasing merchandise)

loan.name: Djeyi

texts.fr: Djeyi est une femme commerante, elle habite l'ouest du Sngal. Elle s'active dans le domaine du commerce depuis plus de 3 ans. Avec ce prt elle veut achet des marchandises (sacs d'arachides, du nib) qu'elle va revendre au march. Elle compte faire du profit pour aider ses enfants et participer sur les dpenses quotidiennes de la maison
texts.en: Djeyi is a retailer who lives in the west of Senegal. She has been working as a retailer for more than three years. With this loan, she would like to buy merchandise (bags of peanuts and black-eyed peas) which she will re-sell in the market. She plans to make profits which she will use to help her children and contribute towards her daily household expenses.

loan.use: to buy merchandise (peanuts and black-eyed peas)

loan.name: Razia's Group

texts.en:
Razia is 46 years old and is married. Her husband operates a lathe machine. He provides iron items and repair services for spare parts to his clients. He is very expert in his work and his clients are very satisfied with his work. Razia operates a clothes business at her home. She purchases clothes at wholesale and sells stitched and unstitched clothes to her clients, according to their demand. She makes good profits from her business every month. She is the mother of 3 children and all of them are getting their education by attending a nearby school.
She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner, Asasah, for the further expansion of her business. With the loan, she will purchase clothes in bulk quantity. That will allow her to offer more variety of clothes to her clients and will increase her profits. She has recently started her business and is very hopeful that her business will improve further after the loan investment.

loan.use: To buy clothes to sell

loan.name: Bokk Diom 15 Group

texts.fr: Rose est la prsidente de ce groupement dont leur activit principale est le commerce. Elle habite dans une ville limitrophe de la capitale du Sngal. L'activit principale de Rose est l'aviculture elle s'active dans ce domaine depuis plus de 10 ans. Elle sollicite ce crdit pour acheter des poussins et des aliments afin d'avoir une activit la chane. Elle compte avec le bnfice qu'elle va avoir ouvrir pargn pour construire un grand poulailler dans son champ. Elle veut aussi aider son mari dans la dpense quotidienne de la maison et de particip d'avantage dans la scolarit de ses enfants
texts.en:
Rose is the president of this group whose main business activity is commerce. She lives in a town which borders the capital of Senegal.
Rose's main business activity is agriculture and she has been in this line of work for more than ten years. She is requesting this loan to buy some chicks and feed in order to have a production line. She hopes to use the profits that she makes to open a savings account so that she can build a large henhouse in her field. She would also like to help her husband with their daily household expenses and contribute more towards their children's schooling.

loan.use: to buy some chicks and feed

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to travel abroad to buy merchandise for resale

loan.name: Kalsoom's Group

texts.en:
Kalsoom is 57 years of age and is a married woman. Her husband is a watchman by profession. His income is not enough to afford the living expenses of the whole family and so Kalsoom can't provide education to her children. Her eldest son is a rickshaw driver, while the other tow work in a factory. Kalsoom has applied for a loan from Kiva partner, Asasah, for her son, who wants to buy a rickshaw. He is currently driving a rented rickshaw. He is not able to make good income this way.
By purchasing a rickshaw, he will be able to work for longer hours without any time limitations and he can increase his profits. He has 3 years of experience in his work, and Kalsoom is confident about the improvement of her sons business after the loan investment.

loan.use: To buy a rickshaw

loan.name: Ousmane

texts.fr: Ousmane habite dans une rgion de l'ouest du Sngal. Il est commerant et s'active dans ce domaine depuis 1997. Il sollicite ce crdit pour acheter des marchandises au Sud du Sngal comme (miel, nib, huile de palme,). Avec ce prt il envisage renforc son activit en augmentant ses achats de marchandises afin d'avoir beaucoup plus de bnfices. Ce qui lui permettra d'avoir une autonomie financire et d'aider sa famille dans les dpenses quotidiens
texts.en:
Ousmane lives in a region in western Senegal. He is a merchant and has been active in this domain since 1997. He is requesting this loan to buy some goods (like honey, black-eyed peas, palm oil) in South Senegal.
With this loan, Ousmane envisions bolstering his business by increasing his purchasing in order to earn much more profit. This will enable him to have some financial autonomy and to assist his family with day-to-day expenses.

loan.use: to buy merchandise

loan.name: Ameer's Group

texts.en:
Ameer sells clothes in order to financially support her family. She purchases clothes at wholesale and sells at a profit to her community clients. She keeps herself updated about latest trends in fashion and makes reasonably good profits from her business. Her husband has a motorbike rental business. He gives bikes to his clients on a rental basis and charges by the hour. Ameer is the mother of 3 sons. One of them also sells clothes, while the other two are studying. Besides her business, she also performs her household duties very well. Her family is very happy with her for her good management qualities.
She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner, Asasah, for the further expansion of her clothes business. With the loan, she will buy clothes in bulk and of better quality. That will allow her to offer more variety to her clients and to increase her profits. She has been doing her business for the past 5 years and she is very confident about the success of her business after the loan investment.

loan.use: To buy clothes to sell

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy materials

loan.name: Aminata

texts.fr: Aminata habite dans une localit prs de la capitale du Sngal. Elle fait du commerce depuis 2 ans. Elle veut ce prt pour renforcer ses activits en achetant des fruits ( mangues, oranges et d'autres produits). Elle veut avec ce prt avoir du bnfice pour palier ses besoins et d'augmenter son pouvoir d'achat afin d'avoir une activit beaucoup plus rentable
texts.en:
Aminata lives in a town near the capital of Senegal. She's been a merchant for two years. She would like a loan to bolster her business by buying fruits (mangoes, oranges, and other products).
She would like this loan to increase the profitability of her business, and use her profits to provide for herself and increase her buying power.

loan.use: to buy fruits (mangoes, oranges)

loan.name: Sajida's Group

texts.en:
Sajida is very supportive and sells clothes to financially support her husband. She started her business many years ago. She makes good profits from her business which allows her to pay off the utilities and better manage her household expenses. Her husband is a daily wage laborer. She is the mother of 8 children: 7 of them are studying, while the remaining one is working.
Sajida has applied for a loan from Kiva partner, Asasah, for the further expansion of her clothes business. With the loan, she will buy clothes of different variety that will allow her to make more profits for her family. She is very confident about the success of her business after the loan.

loan.use: To buy clothes to sell

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy melons

loan.name: Juan

texts.es: El seor Juan trabaja realizando cortes y baando a perros a domicilio. El crdito lo requiere para la comprar herramientas de trabajo como ser: cepillos, shampoo, tijeras y dems insumos; as podr a futuro abrir un saln de belleza canina. Es la fuente de ingresos que tiene para cubrir sus gastos. Vive en casa de sus padres la misma queda ubicada en la zona de San Antonio de la ciudad de La Paz, es soltero y no tiene hijos. Es la primera vez que el cliente obtiene un crdito en IMPRO y en Kiva.
texts.en:
Sr. Juan provides dog grooming services from his home. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy supplies for his work such as brushes, shampoo, scissors, and other items. In the future, he would like to open a dog grooming salon. This job is how he earns income to cover his expenses. Juan lives at home with his parents in the District of San Antonio of the city of La Paz. He is single and has no children.

This is the first time he has obtained a loan from IMPRO and Kiva.

loan.use: to buy brushes, shampoo, scissors, and other items for his dog grooming business.

loan.name: Miriam

texts.es: La seora Miriam trabaja como secretaria y tambin percibe una renta de jubilacin. El crdito lo requiere para iniciar el negocio de venta de cosmeticos. Miriam va a comprar cosmticos para su venta a clientes que ya han comprometido la primera compra. Vive en casa en casa propia la misma queda ubicada en la zona San Pedro de la Ciudad de La Paz; es divorciada, tiene dos hijos. Es la primera vez que Miriam obtiene un crdito esperando mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Sra. Miriam works as a secretary, but she also receives income from a retirement pension. The loan she is requesting will be used to start a business of selling cosmetics. Miriam will buy cosmetics to sell to customers who have already promised to make their first purchase with her. She lives in her own home in the District of San Pedro in the city of La Paz. Miriam is divorced and has two children.

This is the first time she has obtained a loan and she hopes to improve the quality of life for her family.

loan.use: to buy cosmetics in bulk.

loan.name: Maria

texts.es: La seora Maria se dedica a la venta de ropa americana de primera calidad, tanto para varones como para mujeres. El crdito lo requiere para el aumento de capital y as adquirir dos fardos (son costales llenos de ropa) que contienen buena cantidad y variedad de ropa. Vive en casa en alquiler la misma queda ubicada en la zona Villa Copacabana de la Ciudad de La Paz. Esta ser la segunda vez que solicita un prstamo de Impro y la primera a travs de Kiva.
texts.en:
Sra. Maria sells American clothes that are of first-rate quality for men and women. The loan she is requesting will be used to increase her capital so that she acquire two bundles (sacks full of clothing) that are of good quality and contain a variety of items. Maria lives in a rented house in the District of Villa Copacabana in the city of La Paz.

This will be the second time she has requested a loan from IMPRO, but the first time through Kiva.

loan.use: to buy two bundles of American clothes.

loan.name: Martha

texts.es: La seora Martha se dedica a la venta de abarrotes y su esposo es chofer y tambin trabaja como mecnico. El crdito lo requiere para la compra de productos como ser: refrescos, dulces y conservas para surtir su tienda de abarrotes. Vive en casa de sus padres la misma queda ubicada en la zona Cotahuma de la Ciudad de La Paz; es casada y tiene dos hijos. Esta es la primera vez que solicita un crdito.
texts.en:
Sra. Martha sells groceries. Her husband is a chauffeur and also works as a mechanic. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy products such as soft drinks, candy, and preserves so that she can restock her store. Martha lives at the home of her parents in the District of Cotahuma in the city of La Paz. She is married and has two children.

This is the first time she has requested a loan.

loan.use: to buy soft drinks, candy, and preserves.

loan.name: Juan

texts.es: El seor Juan es empleado; trabaja en un taller de costura y su esposa trabaja con ayudante de cocina. El crdito lo requiere para cubrir un tratamiento medico para su cuado quien sufri un accidente automovilstico y no tiene ninguna clase de seguro laboral. Vive en casa de sus padres la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Pasankeri en la Ciudad de La Paz. Es la primera vez que solcita un crdito en IMPRO, y por el carcter social se lo canaliza a travs de Kiva.
texts.en:
Sr. Juan is employed. He works at a sewing workshop while his wife works as a kitchen assistant. The loan he is requesting will be used to pay for the medical treatment for his brother-in-law, who suffered an automobile accident and does not have any type of work insurance. Juan lives at home with his parents in the District of Pasankeri in the city of La Paz.

This is the first time he has requested a loan from IMPRO. Because of his social character, his loan is being referred to Kiva for funding.

loan.use: to pay for his brother-in-law's medical treatment.

loan.name: Ruben

texts.es: El seor Rubn es agricultor y maestro albail; tambin se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado y su esposa lo ayuda con las actividades agrcolas. Con el dinero del crdito cubrir el costo de una motobomba de agua que mejorar el cultivo en sus tierras. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Vicarani en la provincia Aroma; es casado y tiene cinco hijos. Es la primera vez que el cliente obtiene un crdito tanto de Impro como de Kiva.
texts.en:
Sr. Rubn is a farmer and master bricklayer. He also buys and sells cattle. His wife helps with the farming activities. With the money from this loan, he will be able to pay the cost of a water pump so that he can improve the crops on his land. Rubn lives in his own home in the town of Vicarani in Aroma Province. He is married and has five children.

This is the first time he has obtained a loan from IMPRO and Kiva.

loan.use: to buy a water pump so that he can improve his crops.

loan.name: Gladiz

texts.es: La seora Gladiz es comerciante y se dedica a la venta de edredones a profesoras; adems es jubilada. Con esta actividad de venta de edredones cubre sus gastos. El crdito lo requiere para la compra de edredones para variar y satisfacer los gustos de sus clientes. Vive en casa propia la misma queda ubicada en la zona Norte en la Ciudad de La Paz; es casada y tiene dos hijos. Esta ser la segunda vez que solicita un crdito a travs de Kiva y la quinta vez que solicita un crdito de Impro.
texts.en:
Sra. Gladiz is a merchant who sells quilts to teachers. She is also retired. Through her business of selling quilts, Gladiz is able to cover her expenses. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy various quilts so that she can cater to the preferences of her customers. Gladiz lives in her own home in the northern part of the city of La Paz. She is married and has two children.

This is the second time she has requested a loan through Kiva, but this is her fifth loan with IMPRO.

loan.use: to buy quilts of various colors and sizes.

loan.name: Catalina

texts.es: La seora Catalina es comerciante de carne en uno de los mercados de la ciudad de La Paz y con esta actividad cubre sus gastos. El crdito lo requiere el aumento de capital y comprar 150 kilos de carne de res y de cerdo. Vive en casa en alquiler la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Obispo en la Ciudad de La Paz; es viuda y tiene cinco hijos pero ya estn casados. Catalina es cliente desde el ao 2007 y esta ser la tercera vez que su crdito se canaliza a travs de Kiva.
texts.en:
Sra. Catalina is a meat merchant at one of the markets in the city of La Paz. This business helps to cover her expenses. The loan she is requesting will increase her capital so that she can buy 150 kilos of beef and pork. She lives in a rented house located in the District of Obispo in the city of La Paz. Catalina is a widow and has five children who are already married.

She has been a client since 2007 and this is the third time her loan has been referred to Kiva.

loan.use: to buy 150 kilos of beef and pork.

loan.name: Fidel

texts.es: El seor Fidel es sastre y confecciona trajes para varn. El crdito lo requiere para el comprar materia prima como ser: telas, hilos, forros, botones y dems insumos requeridos para su especialidad. Vive en casa propia la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Tembladerani en la Ciudad de La Paz; Fidel es casado y tiene dos hijos. Fidel se encuentra muy satisfecho con los crditos que obtuvo anteriormente pues le ayudaron a mejorar la situacin econmica de su familia. Tambin es cliente antiguo de Kiva, pues esta es la tercera vez que solicita un crdito a travs de Kiva, y la sexta a travs de Impro.
texts.en:
Sr. Fidel is a tailor who makes mens suits. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy materials such as thread, fabric, lining, buttons, and other supplies that are required for his specialty. He lives in his own home in the District of Tembladerani in the city of La Paz. Fidel is married and has two children.

He is very pleased with the loans he received previously because they have helped to improve his familys financial situation. Fidel is also a long-time client who has appeared on Kiva. This is the third time he has a requested a loan through Kiva, but it is his sixth loan from IMPRO.

loan.use: to buy thread, fabric, lining, buttons, and other supplies for making men's suits.

loan.name: Felipe

texts.es: El seor Felipe es empleado; trabaja como mesero para eventos sociales todos los fines de semana y algunos das durante la semana cuando lo contratan. Felipe tambin da clases de msica. Con estas actividades cubre sus gastos. El crdito lo requiere para el pago de estudios universitarios, Vive en casa de sus padres la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Alto San Pedro en la Ciudad de La Paz; es soltero y no tiene hijos. Es la primera vez que el cliente obtiene un crdito en Impro y en Kiva.
texts.en:
Sr. Felipe is employed. He works as a waiter at social events every weekend and on some days during the week when he is hired. Felipe also teaches music classes. With these jobs, he is able to cover his expenses.

The loan he is requesting will be used to pay for his university studies. He lives at home with his parents in the District of Alta San Pedro in the city of La Paz. Felipe is single and has no children.

This is the first time he has obtained a loan from IMPRO and Kiva.

loan.use: to pay the registration fees and tuition for his university studies.

loan.name: Marcia

texts.es: La seora Marcia es empleada, trabaja en una empresa de telecomunicaciones como mensajera y como portera; con esta actividad cubre sus gastos. El crdito lo requiere para el pago de estudios universitarios, pues necesita pagar la matricula y las mensualidades. Vive en las mismas instalaciones de su trabajo, donde existe un pequeo departamento, que queda ubicada en la zona de Alto San Pedro en la Ciudad de La Paz; es casada y tiene dos hijos. Marcia es cliente de Impro desde el ao 2010 y esta es la segunda vez que su crdito se canaliza a travs de Kiva.
texts.en:
Sra. Marcia is employed at a telecommunications company where she works as a messenger and as the building superintendent. This job helps to cover her expenses. The loan she is requesting will be used to pay for her university studies. Her tuition and monthly fees are due. Marcia lives on the company property where she has a small apartment. She resides in the District of Alto San Pedro in the city of La Paz. Marcia is married and has two children.

She has been a client of IMPRO since 2010 and this is the second time that her loan has been referred to Kiva.

loan.use: to pay for her university tuition and fees.

loan.name: Genaro

texts.es: El seor Genaro es chofer y tambin trabaja en una estacin radial en un programa relacionado con deportes y con estas actividades cubre sus gastos. El crdito lo requiere para el pago de estudios universitarios en la carrera de comunicacin social. Vive en casa de sus padres la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Alto San Pedro en la Ciudad de La Paz; es soltero y no tiene hijos. Genaro ya obtuvo un prstamo anterior a travs de Kiva y esta ser la segunda vez que solicita otro prstamo.
texts.en:
Genaro is a chauffeur, but he also works on a sports program at a radio station. These activities help him to cover his expenses. The loan he is requesting will be used to pay for his university studies. He is working on a degree in Social Communications. Genaro lives at home with his parents in the District of Alto San Pedro in the city of La Paz. He is single and has no children.

Genaro obtained his previous loan through Kiva and this will be his second loan request.

loan.use: to pay for his university tuition and fees.

loan.name: Blanca

texts.es: La seora Blanca es comerciante de productos de belleza y tambin trabaja como profesora, de tal manera que con estas dos actividades cubre sus gastos. El crdito lo requiere para el aumento de capital y comprar cremas para las manos, para la piel, hidratantes, etc. Vive en casa propia la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Vino Tinto en la Ciudad de La Paz; Blanca est separada y tiene un hijo. Esta es la segunda vez que Blanca desea que su crdito sea canalizado a travs de Kiva.
texts.en:
Sra. Blanca is a merchant who sells beauty products. She also works as a teacher. Both of these activities enable her to cover her expenses. The loan she is requesting will be used to increase her capital so that she can buy hand creams, skin creams, moisturizers, and other products. Blanca lives in her own home in the District of Vino Tinto in the city of La Paz. She is separated from her spouse and has one child.

This is the second time her loan has been referred to Kiva.

loan.use: to buy hand creams, skin creams, moisturizers, and other products.

loan.name: Paraiso Poty Group

texts.es: El comit PARAISO POTY se form con la unin de varias vecinas de la ciudad de Santan. Todas las integrantes del comit desarrollan actividades independientes, como son las ventas. Las integrantes formaron un grupo muy unido y capaz de realizar conjuntamente actividades que fortalecen su compaerismo. Actualmente esta integrado por 14 mujeres, las cuales trabajan dentro de un ambiente de respeto y ayuda mutua. Una de las miembros es la seora Hipolita, la cual es una seora trabajadora, luchadora, sacrificada y muy emprendedora. Comenta que se dedica a la cra y venta de animales, lo cual le genera los ingresos necesarios para mantener a su familia. Le gustara poder seguir con su trabajo, por lo que ella junto al comit acuden a la fundacin. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra de animales y alimentos para los mismos.
texts.en:
The Paraso Poty" committee was created through the union of several neighbors from the city of Santan. All the members of the committee carry out their own independent business activities such as selling products. The members created a very united group. They are capable of carrying out activities together to strengthen their camaraderie. The group currently has 14 female members who work in an atmosphere of respect and mutual help.
One of the members of this group is Hipolita, who is a hard-working, tenacious, self-sacrificing and very entrepreneurial lady. She says that she raises and sells animals which makes her the income she needs to support her family. She would like to be able to continue in her work and so she and her committee are approaching Fundacin Paraguaya. She is requesting her loan to buy animals and feed for the animals.

loan.use: to buy animals and nutritionally-balanced feed

loan.name: Carlos

texts.es: El seor Carlos es sastre. El crdito lo requiere para la compra de telas, hilos, broches, botones, etc.; con esta actividad cubre los gastos de su familia. Vive en casa en alquiler misma queda ubicada en la zona de 14 de septiembre en la Ciudad de La Paz; es casado y tiene tres hijos pero ya estn casados. El cliente se encuentra muy satisfecho con los crditos que obtuvo anteriormente pues hizo crecer su negocio y ahora tiene ms trabajo, por lo cual necesita el prstamo. Esta ser la cuarta vez que toma la decisin de su crdito sea enviado a Kiva para fondeo.
texts.en:
Sr. Carlos is a tailor. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy fabrics, thread, clasps, buttons, and other items. This business helps to cover his familys expenses. Carlos lives in a rented house in the September 14th District of the city of La Paz. He is married and has three children who are also married.

Carlos is very satisfied with the loans he obtained previously because they have helped him to grow his business. Now that he has more work, he needs another loan. This is the fourth time his loan will be referred to Kiva for funding.

loan.use: to buy fabrics, thread, clasps, buttons, and other items.

loan.name: Ana Delmi

texts.es: Ana, se decidi por un nuevo prstamo debido a la necesidad de comprar papelera para el negocio, especficamente libros, obras, novelas, tintas de impresoras. Los prstamos han sido un gran apoyo para el negocio de Ana, su puntualidad en los pagos le ha permitido mantener a los clientes satisfechos, y mejorar las ventas.
texts.en:
Ana decided to take out a new loan because she needs to buy products for her business, specifically books, plays, novels and ink cartridges.
Loans have been a great support for Ana's business. Her punctuality in making her repayments has allowed her to keep her customers happy and improve her sales.

loan.use: to buy books and ink cartridges

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy tires and a gas tank for his vehicle.

loan.name: Elvia Noemi

texts.es: Elvia, necesita un nuevo prstamo para la compra de hilo de seda y comprara maz, estos materiales le ayudaran para continuar produciendo tanto tortillas como hamacas, esta ser un nuevo apoyo para mejorar el negocio. Ella ha contado con este apoyo que le ha ayudado para mantener a su familia, pues con los elementos que compra fabrica las hamacas y tambien compra maiz para hacer la venta de tortillas.
texts.en: Elvia needs a new loan to buy silk thread and corn. These materials will help her to continue producing both tortillas and hammocks. This will be a new support to her in improving her business. This support has helped Elvia to provide for her family. She uses the items that she buys to make her hammocks and also buys corn to make tortillas to sell.

loan.use: to buy silk thread and corn

loan.name: Valdivia

texts.es: La seora Valdivia es comerciante de ropa. El crdito lo requiere para la compra de material de construccin ya que realizara la obra fina del piso superior de su casa y colocado de cermica. Vive en casa propia la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Llojeta en la Ciudad de La Paz; Valdivia es casada y tiene tres hijos. Valdivia es cliente de Impro desde al ao 2005, sus pagos siempre han sido puntuales y esta ser la segunda vez que desea que su crdito pase a travs de Kiva y sus financiadores.
texts.en:
Sra. Valdivia is a clothing merchant. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy construction materials so that she can finish the upper floor of her house and install ceramic tiling. Her home is located in the District of Llojeta in the city of La Paz. Valdivia is married and has three children.

She has been a client of IMPRO since 2005. Her payments have always been on time and this will be the second time that her loan will be referred to the Kiva lenders for funding.

loan.use: to buy construction materials for finishing the upper floor of her house and installing ceramic tiles.

loan.name: Valentin

texts.es: El seor Valentn desempea el trabajo de albail y tambin es ayudante de costura. El crdito lo requiere para la compra de material de construccin, piedra, cemento, arena, ya que realizara la construccin de una habitacin. Vive en casa propia la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Munaypata en la Ciudad de La Paz; es casado y tiene dos hijos. Su historial de crditos data del ao 2007, con tres crditos anteriores completamente pagados. Esta es la segunda vez que Valentn ha pedido que su crdito sea financiado a travs de Kiva.
texts.en:
Valentn has a job as a bricklayer, but he is also an assistant tailor. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy construction materials such as stone, cement, and sand in order to finish the construction of a room. Valentn lives in his own home in the District of Munaypata in the city of La Paz. He is married and has two children.

His credit history dates back to 2007. Valentn has had three previous loans that were completely repaid. This is the second time he has requested a loan through Kiva.

loan.use: to buy construction materials in order to finish building a room in his house.

loan.name: Maria Esperanza

texts.es:
la seora Maria, ya es un cliente D. la Fundacin Campo, ella tiene un prstamo actualmente y es un miembro Kiva. ese prstamo lo utilizo para comprar productos para surtir su tienda como perfumenes, ropa, utiles escolares, etc. y ella esta muy contenta con los resultados obtenidos y agracese a la ayuda resivida por medio D. KIVA. actualmente ella solicita un nuevo prstamo, debido a que se avecina una temporada muy buena para la venta D. coronas y ramos, para el dia D. difuntos. El dia D. difuntos es una tradicin en El Salvador y se realizan los dias 1 y 2 D. noviembre, dias en los cuales las personas asisten a los cementerios donD. tienen enterrados a sus seres queridos: mam, pap, hermanos, tios, amigos, etc. y le llevan flores D. papel o naturales. Hay personas como Maria que se encargan D. elaborar lindas coronas con flores D. diferentes colores, tamaos y figuras, para venderlas a las personas para que se las lleven a las tumbas D. sus seres queridos.
Maria espera trabajar bien como lo hizo con el primer credito, para obtener ingresos que le ayuden a dar a sus hijos lo necesario y para que su negocio siga fuerte y prosperando
texts.en:
Maria is already a client of Fundacin Campo. She currently has a loan and is a Kiva member. She used her existing loan to buy products with which to stock her store such as perfumes, clothes, school supplies etc. She is very happy with the results she is obtaining and is grateful for this repeat help through Kiva.
Maria is currently requesting a new loan because a very good season is approaching for selling wreaths and bouquets. The Day of the Dead is a tradition in El Salvador which takes place on November 1st and 2nd. On these days, people go to cemeteries where their loved ones are buried (mom, dad, brothers, aunts, uncles, friends, etc.) and they take with them either paper flowers or fresh flowers. There are people such as Maria who make beautiful wreaths from flowers of different sizes, colors and shapes in order to sell them to people so that they can take them to the graves of their loved ones.
Maria hopes to work well as she did with her first loan, in order to make income which will help her to proviD. her children with what they need and help strengthen her business and enable it to do well.

loan.use: to buy supplies for making wreaths and bouquets for Day of the Dead

loan.name: Josefa

texts.es: La seora Josefa es agricultora y realiza la actividad de compra y venta de tubrculos (papa, chuo). Con el dinero del crdito cubrir el costo de una motobomba as mejorar el riego y la produccin de tubrculos. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Vicarani en la provincia Aroma; es casada y tiene un hijo. Es la primera vez que Josefa obtiene un crdito.
texts.en:
Sra. Josefa is a farmer who buys and sells tubers, such as potatoes and chuos (freeze dried potatoes). The money from this loan will cover the cost of a water pump so that she can improve the irrigation and production of her tuber crops. Josefa lives in her own home in the town of Vicarani in Aroma Province. She is married and has one child.

This is the first time Josefa has obtained a loan.

loan.use: to buy a water pump for improving the irrigation of her tuber crops.

loan.name: Leonardo

texts.es: El seor Leonardo es agricultor y maestro albail que realiza trabajos dos veces al mes y su esposa lo ayuda con las actividades agrcolas, produciendo papa. Con el dinero del crdito cubrir el costo de una motobomba as mejorar el riego para su produccin. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Vicarani en la provincia Aroma; es casado y tiene cinco hijos. Es la primera vez que Leonardo obtiene un crdito.
texts.en:
Sr. Leonardo is a farmer and master bricklayer who works on masonry jobs twice a month. His wife helps with the farming activities and growing potatoes. The money from this loan will cover the cost of a water pump so that he can improve the irrigation of his crops. Leonardo lives in his own home in the town of Vicarani in Aroma Province. He is married and has five children.

This is the first time Leonardo has obtained a loan.

loan.use: to buy a water pump to improve the irrigation of his crops.

loan.name: Nicacio

texts.es: El seor Nicacio es agricultor y maestro albail y tambin su esposa lo ayuda con las actividades agrcolas. Con el dinero del crdito cubrir el costo de una motobomba para facilitar las condiciones de trabajo en el riego para la produccin de tubrculos. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Vicarani en la provincia Aroma; es casado y tiene tres hijos. Es la primera vez que el cliente obtiene un crdito.
texts.en:
Sr. Nicacio is a farmer and master bricklayer. His wife helps with the farming activities. With the money from this loan, he will pay for the cost of a water pump that will facilitate irrigation for growing tubers. Nicacio lives in his own home in the town of Vicarani in Aroma Province. He is married and has three children.

This is the first time he has obtained a loan.

loan.use: to buy a water pump in order to facilitate irrigation.

loan.name: Esteban

texts.es: El seor Estaban es chofer y trabaja en el sindicato en uno de los sindicatos de transportistas de la ciudad de La Paz como socio asalariado. Con el dinero del crdito cubrir los gastos de una intervencin quirrgica de la vescula, pues los mdicos le han dicho que debe operarse. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la zona de Villa Yunguyo en al ciudad de La Paz; es soltero y no tiene hijos. Esta es la segunda vez que su crdito se canaliza a travs de Kiva.
texts.en:
Sr. Esteban is a chauffeur and works for one of the transportation unions in the city of La Paz as a salaried member. The money from this loan will be used to cover the cost of a gallbladder operation because his doctors have said that he needs this surgery. Esteban lives in his own home in the District of Villa Yunguo in the city of La Paz. He is single and has no children.

This is the second time that his loan has been referred to Kiva.

loan.use: to pay for an operation.

loan.name: Nilda Ramona

texts.es: La Sra Nilda, est casada hace 50 aos con el seor Francisco, quien es D. profesin comerciante, ellos tienen 3 hijos mayores, 2 mujeres y un varn quienes ya estn casados y viven en forma independiente, una D. las hijas vive y trabaja en los Estados Unidos. Nilda es D. profesin modista, vive en su casa propia, junto con su marido y una D. sus nietas, en la casa cuenta con un taller D. costura, y adems su esposo cuenta con una pequea despensa y venta D. artculos D. ferretera. Segn coment su esposo haba trabajado en una gran Ferretera y tiempo despus se jubil, y por esa razn se dedica tambin a la venta D. los artculos D. ferretera. La sra Nilda cuenta con una amplia clientela formada y realiza trabajos D. alta costura en especial para acontecimientos especiales. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra D. telas, hilos, agujas, cierres, botones y otros con los cuales podr surtir su taller.
texts.en:
Nilda has been married to Francisco for fifty years. He is a salesman by profession. The couple have three grown-up children (two daughters and one son) who are married and live independently. One of their daughters lives and works in the United States.
Nilda is a dressmaker by profession. She lives in her own home together with her husband and one of her granddaughters. She has a sewing workshop at home and her husband has a small general store / hardware store. She says that her husband used to work in a large hardware store. He retired and then decided to start selling hardware.
Nilda has a large, established customer base and she makes haute couture garments for special occasions.
Nilda is requesting this loan to buy fabric, threads, needles, fasteners, buttons and other supplies with which she will stock her workshop.

loan.use: to buy fabric, threads, needles, fasteners and buttons

loan.name: Zenon

texts.es: El seor Zenn es agricultor y trabaja como mecnico en la ciudad de El Alto y su esposa e hijos lo ayudan con los trabajos de agricultura y produccin de tubrculos. Con el dinero del crdito cubrir el costo de una motobomba as mejorar el riego y la produccin de tubrculos. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Vicarani en la provincia Aroma; es casado y tiene dos hijos. Es la primera vez que el cliente obtiene un crdito.
texts.en:
Sr. Zenn is a farmer, but he also works as a mechanic in the city of El Alto. His wife and children help with the farm work and with growing tubers. The money from this loan will cover the cost of a water pump so that he can improve the irrigation and production of tubers. Zenn lives in his own home in the town of Vicarani in Aroma Province. He is married and has two children.

This is the first time he has obtained a loan.

loan.use: to buy a water pump for improving irrigation.

loan.name: Maria

texts.es: Doa Maria tiene la edad de 55 aos, madre de ocho hijos, siete casados e independiente, y una nia de 13 aos que estudia la secundaria, hoy en dia su trabajo es de domestica, el cual ha venido desempeando por largos aos, asi mismo logro la construccion de su casa, junto a su excompaero. Este es su segundo credito en Afodenic, en donde su objetivo es la construcion de bao e inodoro, siendo de plastico y saco, cambio que no habia hecho por falta de capital, ya que tiene que complementar la alimentacion, gastos basicos, educacion, transporte, y sale alcansada cada mes. Ya que por muchos aos ha sido madre soltera. Pero sus hijos y ella se estan esforzando para hacer esta mejora, ya que es de gran necesidad para una mejor higiene de salud, ya que cuando llueve se ve fea la situacion. Es por tal razon comprara, inodoro, mas bloques, arena, cemento, hierro y tubos para aguas negras, pegamento entre otros productos. Para terminar la obra, que vendra ah dar mas comodidad, y limpieza a su familia.
texts.en:
Maria is 55 years old. She is the mother of eight children, seven of whom are married and independent. She has a 13 year old girl who is in secondary school. She currently works as a domestic worker, which she has done for many years. This is how she managed to build her house, next to her ex-partner.
This is her second loan with Afodenic. Her goal is to build a bathroom with a toilet. It is currently build of plastic sheeting and old bags. She had not made a change because she didnt have the capital, due to the fact that she must share in the cost of food, basic expenses, education, transportation, and she is out of money at the end of each month. She has been a single mother for many years.
However, she and her children are working hard to make this improvement since it is a huge necessity for better hygiene; when it rains, it is a bad situation. For this reason she will buy a toilet, cement blocks, sand, cement, re-bar, pipes for wastewater, glue, and other products. She will finish the project in order provide improved comfort and cleanliness for her family.

loan.use: to build a bathroom and install a toilet, which will improve her family's health, safety, and person hygiene

loan.name: Mujeres Alegres Group

texts.es: El comit "Mujeres Alegres"se origin a travs de promociones que se hicieron en el barrio de las miembros. El objetivo de cada de una de ellas es trabajar en equipo, fomentar el espritu solidario y llegar al nivel mximo del programa. La sra. Blanca es la presidenta del grupo, esta trabajando en la venta de ropa. Comenta que por medio de su sacrificio y trabajo ella ha podido sobresalir y ayudar a su familia. El deseo de ella es que todas las miembros puedan aumentar sus ingresos para el buen pago de sus obligaciones y logros de los objetivos del grupo. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra de prendas de verano, ya que estamos a punto de recibir a esa estacin del ao y siempre en esa poca tiene muchos pedidos.
texts.en:
The "Mujeres Alegres" community bank was formed through some promotional work which was carried out in the neighborhood where the bank's members live. The goals of each of the members are to work as part of a team, to promote a supportive spirit and to reach the top level of the program.
Blanca is the president of this group. Her business is selling clothes. She says that through her sacrifice and work, she has been able to do well and help her family. Her wish is for all the members of her group to increase their incomes so that they can meet their repayments and achieve the aims of the group.
Blanca is requesting this loan to buy summer clothes as we are about to enter that season and she always has a lot of orders at that time of year.

loan.use: to buy clothes to sell

loan.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras Group

texts.es: Este grupo de la ciudad de Encarnacin, surgi por contacto de una de las integrantes con la fundacin, el grupo se encuentra en el 1 ciclo, opera con la Fundacin desde este ao. Ellas se unieron con el propsito de generar mayores ingresos para todas y de esa forma mejorar las condiciones de vida de cada una de ellas. Una de las integrantes del grupo es la Sra. Elena, la cual tiene 3 hijos, est casada con Cristino, su marido trabaja como Sereno y ella tiene hace varios aos un Kiosko. Cuenta Elena que tiene buenas ventas siempre, pues los clientes siempre acuden hasta su local, lo cual le genera buenos ingresos. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra de comestibles y bebidas para su negocio para venderlos a sus clientes. Ve al crdito como una gran ayuda para seguir con su pequeo negocio.
texts.en:
This group from the city of Encarnacin was formed when one of its members contacted Fundacin Paraguaya. The group are in their first loan cycle and this is their first year with Fundacin Paraguaya. They came together with the goal of making more income for each member and thereby improving the living conditions of each of them.
One of the members of this group is Elena. Elena has three children and is married to Cristino. Her husband works as a night watchman and she has run a food kiosk for several years. Elena tells us that she always makes good sales as her customers always come to her business which makes her good income. She is requesting this loan to buy food and drink to sell to her customers. She sees the loan as a great help which will enable her to continue running her small business.

loan.use: to buy food and drinks

loan.name: Paula Francis

texts.es: Doa Paula sigue trabajando como domestica, al igua que su esposo en servicios de vigilancias, sus dos hijos terminando el ao escolar en la colegio del barrio. Como madre su objetivo ha sido la mejora a su casa, el cual con fondos propios y financiamiento en Afodenic, ha venido logrando mejorar la infraestructura, medio que se le hace mas facil por esta via, ya que equilibra los gastos del hogar. Con el credito anterior logro terminar muro, que vino a segurar mas su propiedad y seguridad para su familia. y hoy hara la mejora de las divisiones, ya que las que tiene, son de playbo teniendo ya muchos defecto y que ahora lo hara de concreto, asi como el comiemzo del cascote del porche, que espera ir trabajando poco a poco. Contenta por poder solucionar las necesidades, es por eso aunque se sienta cansada muchas veces, se anima al pensar en un futuro mejor.
texts.en:
Paula continues working as a domestic employee. Her husband continues working as a security guard. Their two children are finishing the academic year in a local school.
As a mother, Paula's goal has been to improve her home. Using her own funds and loans from Afodenic, she has been improving her home's infrastructure. It is easier to carry out this work this way as she is able to balance her household expenses.
Paula used her previous loan to finish building a perimeter wall in order to secure her property and provide security for her family. Now she will improve her home by building some dividing walls, as the ones she currently has are made from plywood. They have a lot of defects and she would like to be able to build them from concrete. She would also like to start building the foundations of a porch which she hopes to gradually develop. Paula is happy to be able to meet her needs and, for this reason, although she often feels tired, she is encouraged by the prospects of a better future.

loan.use: to build dividing walls from concrete and to start building the foundations of a porch in order to provide her family with better hygiene and space

loan.name: Elvis Axamir

texts.es: Elvis trabaja en su vehculo como taxista, siendo su fuente de ingreso econmico. Con el ciclo del prstamo anterior realizo grandes cambios con beneficios para su familia. Se le ha presentado dificultades de salud ya que para los tiempos de lluvia esta tendente a resfriarse ocasionando gasto de medicamentos y disminuyendo sus horas laborales en el taxi. Actualmente requiere comprar repuestos del automvil que le est dando problema de movilizacin. Con el prstamo comprara: llantas, batera, le dar mantenimiento a la direccional y la suspensin. Agradece a la financiera por el apoyo al crecimiento de su pequeo negocio.
texts.en: Elvis works as a taxi driver with his own car, which is his source of income. In the previous loan cycle, he made some big changes to his house that benefited his family. He has had health problems, because during the rainy season he has tended to get colds, requiring him to spend money on medicines and reducing his working hours in the taxi. Now he needs to buy spare parts for his taxi, because he's having some mechanical problems with it. With this loan he will buy tires and a battery, and he will have maintenance work done on the suspension and the turn signal. He thanks the lenders for this support to help him grow his small business.

loan.use: to buy auto parts and pay for maintenance work on his taxi

loan.name: Oscar

texts.es:
Oscar tiene 32 aos de edad, es casado, y tiene dos hijos. Oscar se dedica a la agricultura, oficio que aprendi en su niez. Dado que Oscar fue hurfano de padre a los 15 aos, l ha trabajado desde muy joven para llevarle el sustento a su familia. Por esta razn Oscar no pudo estudiar. Oscar tiene a sus hijos estudiando porque no quiere que ellos sufran como l por no saber escribir ni leer.
Actualmente Oscar se dedica al comercio de cerdos, ya que los ingresos que recibe de la agricultura no son suficientes. Para comprar los insumos que l necesita para su trabajo (concentrado y vitaminas para los animales), Oscar recorre una via que tiene muy mal acceso. Dadas las malas condiciones de la via, el bus solo pasa dos dias por semana. Cuando Oscar tiene alguna emergencia y necesita ir al pueblo un da que no pase el bus, l tiene que caminar dos horas para llegar. Si Oscar tiene que llevar algo de mucho peso, l tiene que contratar un vehculo que lo transporte por $30.
Oscar solicita un prstamo a Fundacin Campo para la compra de mas cerdos para la cria, y luego venderlos a buen precio. Con el prstamo Oscar tambien comprara el concentrado y las vitaminas necesarias para sus animales. Con mas cerdos Oscar podra tener mejores ingresos y as mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
En un futuro Oscar espera poder ampliar su casa y compara un vehiculo, asi no dependera de terceros para su trabajo. l tambien espera que sus hijos estudien una buena profesin y se preparen para ser personas utiles en su comunidad.
texts.en:
Oscar is 32 years old, married and has 2 children. Oscar is a farmer, something he learned as a child. Since Oscar's father died when he was 15 years old, he has worked since an early age to support his family. For this reason Oscar was not able to study. Oscar has his children studying because he does not want his children to suffer as he has by not being able to read or write.
Currently Oscar is in the pig business as the income he receives from farming is not enough. To buy the supplies he needs for his work (concentrates and vitamins for the animals). Oscar uses a road that is in a bad state of repair. Given the poor condition of the road, the bus only passes by twice a week. When Oscar has an emergency and needs to go to town on a day that the bus does not come by, he has to walk for 2 hours to get there. If Oscar has to transport something heavy, he has to hire a vehicle which costs $30.
Oscar is asking Fundacin Campo for a loan to purchase more pigs for breeding and then for later sale at a good price. With the loan Oscar will also buy the concentrate and vitamins needed by his animals. With more pigs Oscar will have a better income and improve the quality of life for his family.
In the future Oscar hopes to be able to enlarge his house and buy a vehicle so he would not have to depend on others for his work. He also hopes that his children study a good profession and will be ready to be useful people in their community.

loan.use: to buy pigs for breeding and selling.

loan.name: Gladis Humbertina

texts.es:
La seora Gladis tiene 37 aos de edad, es casada con dos hijos.
Ella se dedica desde hace dos aos a administrar su propia tienda, debido a que los ingresos de su esposo no eran suficientes para cubrir los gastos del hogar y tambin ellos identificaron que en el lugar donde viven esta bien ubicado para ejercer dicha actividad, ya que la mayor parte de los productos se los van a dejar los proveedores a su casa, por que tiene buen acceso y algunas pocas cosas las compra en el pueblo ms cercano. En la actualidad Gladis ha sabido administrar la tienda y todo marcha bien.
La seora Gladis, solicita un prstamo a Fundacin Campo, para surtir ms el negocio comprando granos bsicos, arroz, frijoles, azcar, caf, jabn, entre otros y poder comprar las cosas por mayor y de esta manera poder satisfacer la demanda de la comunidad. Ella opina que la necesidad ms grande es el capital de trabajo para invertirlo y ampliar ms el negocio.
Con el prstamo Gladis podr ejecutar sus proyectos y obtener mejores ingresos, para ofrecerles un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Ella desea que Dios le regale salud y fuerza para seguir adelante y crecer en su negocio, para salir bien con su compromiso con la Institucin para mantener las puertas abiertas y luego realizar otras cosas ms.
texts.en:
Seora Gladis is 37 years old, married with 2 children.
She has been working for 2 years managing her own store as her husband's income was not sufficient to cover the household expenses. They also identified the place where they live as a good location to set up the business because most of the products can be dropped off at their house by the suppliers as it has good access and the few other things she needs, she buys at the nearest town. In fact Gladis has known how to manage the store and everyhing is going well.
Seora Gladis is asking Fundacin Campo for a loan in order to stock her store more by purchasing dry grains, rice, beans, sugar, coffee, soap, among other products and in this way meet the demands of the comunity. She believes that the greatest need is for working capital to invest in and further expand the business.
With the loan, Gladis will be able to implement her projects and obtain a better income with which to offer her children a better future. She wishes that God gives her good health and strength so as to get ahead and grow her business and fulfill her obligations with the Fundacion Campo so as to keep the doors open and later do more.

loan.use: to buy more rice, beans, sugar, soap, among other things to stock her store.

loan.name: Ismael

texts.es: El seor Ismael esta agradecido por su cooperacin en el anterior crdito el cual invirti en comprar de cierta mercanca para la venta. Solicita un prstamo para invertir en compra de mercanca que es (material para construcciones y accesorios para el baos) ya que le esta haciendo falta esta mercanca a su negocio y nos quiere descapitalizar el negocio. Desea mejorar la inversin de su negocio y la calidad de vida y la seguridad de su familia. Con una parte de las ganancias que obtiene de las ventas del negocio planea pagar el crdito y que es la fuente de ingreso que tiene para su familia.
texts.en:
Seor Ismael is grateful for your cooperation with his previous loan, which he invested in purchasing some merchandise for sale.
He is requesting a loan to invest in purchasing merchandise (construction materials and bathroom accessories) which his business currently lacks, and he wants us to decapitalize his business.
He wants to improve investment in his business and into his quality of life and family security.
With part of the earning he will get from his business' sales, he plans to pay back the loan. His sales are his source of income for his family

loan.use: to invest in purchasing merchandise for his hardware business.
